name: Tango Arjaan by Rotana Istanbul Asia
address: Altaycesme Mah. Samanyolu Sok. No:23, Istanbul
description: Tango Arjaan by Rotana offers 5-star accommodation in Istanbul. There is also a fitness centre with a sauna, a swimming pool and a terrace. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at the hotel, such as free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a ballroom. Couples will enjoy the hotel's features like a concierge floor and massage services. The rooms at Tango Arjaan by Rotana have air conditioning and offer a kitchenette, a mini bar and a coffee maker. All have slippers, a kitchen and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Elements, the in-house eatery, is available for lunch and dinner and serves Turkish and international specialties. Room service is also available during certain times. Tango Arjaan by Rotana is within walking distance of Sureyya Plaji Railway Station, connecting guests with the surrounding area. It is also moments from Sea Of Marmara.Revato

name: Burgu Arjaan by Rotana Istanbul Asia
address: Altaycesme Mah. Samanyolu Sok. No:23, Istanbul
description: Burgu Arjaan by Rotana provides comfortable 5-star accommodation in Istanbul. It has a gym, as well as a ballroom, free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool. Guests can enjoy the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. All rooms are air conditioned and feature well-equipped kitchenettes with kitchenware, microwaves and coffee makers. Each provide slippers, a mini bar and a private bathroom with bathrobes. The hotel's restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and provides an ideal setting for those who would prefer to stay close to everything the property has to offer. Burgu Arjaan by Rotana is within walking distance of Sureyya Plaji Railway Station, connecting guests with the surrounding area. The staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Istanbul.Revato

name: Carina Gold Hotel
address: Mollafenari Mahallesi, Istanbul 34120
description: Ideally set in the centre of Istanbul, Carina Gold Hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. Private parking is available on site. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At Carina Gold Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and halal options. Speaking Arabic, English, Russian and Turkish, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Basilica Cistern, Blue Mosque and Column of Constantine. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International, 39 km from Carina Gold Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ramada Plaza by Wyndham Istanbul Sultanahmet
address: Kemalpasa Disctrict Fevziye Street No:1, Istanbul 34134
description: Ramada Plaza by Wyndham Istanbul Sultanahmet, located in a central location in the historical peninsula of the city, offers ideal accommodation options in Istanbul with its proximity to historical areas, congress and business centers. With its 211 elegantly and comfortably furnished rooms, it provides five-star service to its guests for both business and leisure stays. In its historical and authentic atmosphere, it offers delicious open buffet breakfast, contemporary Turkish and international cuisine to its guests. It hosts corporate events and weddings with its meeting hall equipped with modern meeting facilities and 3 meeting rooms of different sizes. Ramada Plaza by Wyndham Istanbul Sultanahmet; It is within walking distance of the Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, Basilica Cistern, Beyazit and the Blue Mosque, and provides easy access to Taksim and Istanbul Airport with the Vezneciler metro line.Wyndham

name: Loop Hotel Bosphorus Istanbul
address: Pürtelaş Hasan Efendi Mah. Hardal Sokak No:15, Istanbul 34421
description: Attractively located in Istanbul, Loop Hotel Bosphorus İstanbul features air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a terrace and a restaurant. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms have a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Loop Hotel Bosphorus İstanbul the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a halal breakfast. Popular points of interest near Loop Hotel Bosphorus İstanbul include Taksim Square, Taksim Metro Station and Istiklal Street. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 38 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: North Blue Life
address: Beşyol fabrıkalar CD 31 /888 AP. - Küçükçekmece, Istanbul 34295
description: Located in Istanbul, 3 km from Florya Beach, KUZEY MAVİ RESİDENCE provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a restaurant. The property is situated 18 km from Suleymaniye Mosque, 19 km from Spice Bazaar and 19 km from Halic Congress Center. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. At the hotel every room is equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms include a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a dishwasher. All units include a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and Italian options. Blue Mosque is 20 km from KUZEY MAVİ RESİDENCE, while Galata Tower is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.

name: The St. Regis Istanbul
address: Mim Kemal Oke Cad No 35, Istanbul 34367
description: Capture possibilities at The St. Regis Istanbul, where timeless glamor and modern innovation meet. Nestled by the cosmopolitan Nişantaşı district, our 5 star hotel offers Istanbul's best address, surrounded by designer boutiques, luxury fashion brands, local eateries and European edifices of the Art Deco and Art Nouveau eras. Our luxury hotel provides a shining beacon of hospitality, featuring our signature St. Regis Butler Service to attend to your needs. Experience exquisite rooftop dinner at Wolfgang Puck's Spago or savor international cuisine on the verdant terrace of St. Regis Brasserie. Luxuriate with a bespoke treatment inside our Iridium Spa, before drifting off to sleep in our award-winning hotel suites, adorned with original artwork and discreet balconies overlooking tomorrow's adventures. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets with their own special accommodation rates.Marriott

name: Selectum City Atasehir
address: Dudullu Cd. 29, Istanbul 34755
description: Set in Istanbul, 15 km from Maiden's Tower, Selectum City Ataşehir offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. All rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Selectum City Ataşehir have a sea view. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Selectum City Ataşehir can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The hotel offers 5-star accommodation with a hammam. Dolmabahce Palace is 19 km from Selectum City Ataşehir, while Dolmabahce Clock Tower is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Yasmak Sultan
address: Ebusuud Cad. 12, Istanbul 34410
description: Occupying a lively corner in Istanbul's historic Sultanahmet district, Hotel Yasmak Sultan offers spacious rooms with free WiFi. It features a traditional Turkish spa, indoor pool and a panoramic restaurant. Yasmak’s rooms are elegantly furnished and offer a private bathroom with marbled countertop basin and a bathtub. Each is equipped with a satellite TV while some rooms include a seating area. Hotel Sultan’s spa comprises a marbled Turkish hammam and a dry sauna. Guests can also enjoy a relaxing massage or work out in the gym. The Olive Restaurant serves Turkish and international cuisine with a scenic view, overlooking the Topkapi Palace and Bosphorus Straight beyond. A variety of refreshing beverages and snacks are offered at the Lobby Bar. Staff at Hotel Yasmak Sultan can provide a car rental service and advice on city excursions. Ataturk Airport is a 15-minute drive away while Istanbul Airport is 52 km away.

name: Le Méridien Istanbul Etiler
address: Cengiz Topel Caddesi No: 39, Etiler, Istanbul 34337
description: Rising a stunning 34 stories above the city, this 5-star hotel in prestigious Etiler district enjoys a prime location from which to explore the prolific historic landmarks and many stylish restaurants, bars and boutiques Istanbul has to offer. Bask in unique panoramic views over the Bosphorus and Istanbul iconic bridges. Unlock Istanbul's best experiences from our luxury hotel while relaxing in a private cabana by the outdoor pool, indulging in a traditional Hamam or savoring classic Turkish dishes with a modern twist. A creative tribute to modernity and tradition, our 255 rooms and suites blend chic contemporary artwork and furnishings with classic Turkish motifs. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame stunning uninterrupted views of the city and the Bosphorus. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a fee. Host your next meeting or event at our conference hotel. We offer over 2500 sqm of event space, plenty of on-site parking and superb catering.Marriott

name: Destinia Pera Suites
address: Tomtom Mahallesi Istiklal Caddesi Akansu Sokak no:8 Beyoğlu/Istanbul Daire:8, Istanbul 34433
description: Attractively located in the centre of Istanbul, Destinia Pera Suites is within 700 metres of Istiklal Street and less than 1 km of Taksim Square. This 4-star hotel offers room service and an ATM. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. All air-conditioned units at the hotel come with a fridge, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and DVD player. All rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Taksim Metro Station is 1.1 km from Destinia Pera Suites, while Galata Tower is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 36 km from the accommodation.

name: Mandarin Oriental Bosphorus Istanbul
address: Muallim Naci Avenue No 62, Istanbul 34345
description: Mandarin Oriental Bosphorus, Istanbul features a fitness centre, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Istanbul. Situated conveniently in the Besiktas district, this hotel offers a bar, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Mandarin Oriental Bosphorus, Istanbul offers a children's playground. Speaking Arabic, German, English and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Dolmabahce Palace is 4.5 km from the accommodation, while Dolmabahce Clock Tower is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 38 km from Mandarin Oriental Bosphorus, Istanbul.

name: Romance Istanbul Hotel
address: Hüdavendigar Caddesi No 5 Sirkeci, Istanbul
description: Only a 10-minute walk from the Grand Bazaar, Romance Istanbul Hotel Boutique Class is located in the historical centre of Istanbul. It is within walking distance to many sights such as Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace and Blue Mosque. It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with free WiFi. Guestrooms include wood furnishings and framed art work. They have a private bathroom and come equipped with a minibar and satellite TV. The Alaturca Restaurant serves international cuisine and traditional Turkish dishes. There is a café that serves salad and lighter fare, as well as a bar that offers cocktails. Guests can relax in the sauna. Staff at the tour desk assist with car hire and provide information on local attractions. Istiklal Street is less than 3 km from the Romance Istanbul Hotel Boutique Class. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and offers an airport transfer service on request. Istanbul Airport is 54 km away.

name: Wish More Hotel Sisli
address: 19 Mayis Mah. Halaskargaz Cad. NO: 196 Şişli/ İstanbul, Istanbul 34360
description: Featuring 5-star accommodation, Wish More Hotel Şişli is located in Istanbul, 1.6 km from Istanbul Congress Center and 3.3 km from Taksim Metro Station. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Each room includes air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at the hotel have a balcony. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. At Wish More Hotel Şişli you will find a restaurant serving Middle Eastern, Pizza and Turkish cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and dairy-free options can also be requested. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with an indoor pool, fitness centre and sauna. Taksim Square is 3.3 km from Wish More Hotel Şişli, while Dolmabahce Clock Tower is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 33 km from the hotel.

name: JW Marriott Hotel Istanbul Marmara Sea
address: Zeytinlik Mahallesi, Rauf Orbay Caddesi, Sahil Yolu No.1, Atakoy, Bakirkoy, Istanbul 34158
description: The 5 Star JW Marriott Hotel Istanbul Marmara Sea is where tranquility meets the much-loved, enthralling metropolis. Our luxury hotel offers a district-defining retreat in the heart of Ataköy with awe-inspiring sea views at every turn. Resplendent décor, world-class dining, and rejuvenating spa and wellness spaces where visitors can come together to socialize and create meaningful memories or escape and restore their sense of balance. Each and every one of our 204 rooms and suites spread across 17 stories, are spacious and equipped with the latest modern comforts, designed with luxury in mind. Easy access to the heart of Istanbul is of the utmost importance to us. The wondrous sights of the city such as Hagia Sophia, Topkapı Palace, Galata Port, Dolmabahce Palace, and Taksim Square are all within easy reach. Our hotel offers enriching experiences designed to bring guests fun-filled creative adventures thoughtfully curated to leave them feeling inspired and connected throughout their journey.Marriott

name: Wanda Vista Istanbul
address: Mahmut Bey Mah. Taş Ocağı Yolu Cad. No: 25/2, Istanbul 34218
description: Situated in Istanbul, 18 km from Suleymaniye Mosque, Wanda Vista Istanbul features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel offers an indoor pool, sauna and a kids' club. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Certain rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. At the hotel rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and Asian options. At Wanda Vista Istanbul guests will find a spa and wellness centre and a hammam. You can play table tennis at the accommodation. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English, Turkish and Chinese. Spice Bazaar is 19 km from Wanda Vista Istanbul, while Galata Tower is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 31 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel
address: Rauf Orbay Caddesi Sahilyolu, No:10, Istanbul 34158
description: It is a treat to experience one of the world’s oldest cities, Istanbul standing astride two continents upon a strait, with Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel privilege. Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel is an unmatched option for guests looking to indulge in an unforgettable hotel experience in this exceptional city. Overlooking a splendid Marmara Sea view, Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel spans over an area of 40.000 square meters of lush nature offers a relaxing feeling to its guests coming for both business & leisure purposes. The hotel offers bright, spacious rooms, a large club lounge and a stunning pool area.The Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel is also within walking distance to a variety of shopping centers and the marina, with cafes and restaurants nearby.Marriott

name: Qua Comfort Hotel
address: Peyami Safa Cd. 16, Istanbul 34218
description: Located in Istanbul, 15 km from Suleymaniye Mosque, SERENİTY COMFORT Hotel provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation features room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At SERENİTY COMFORT Hotel each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Russian, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Spice Bazaar is 16 km from the accommodation, while Galata Tower is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 31 km from SERENİTY COMFORT Hotel.

name: Sheraton Grand Istanbul Atasehir
address: Barbaros Mah, Mor Sumbul Sok, No:1, Istanbul 34746
description: The Sheraton Grand Istanbul Atasehir is located in the heart of Atasehir, an emerging residential and business center on the Asian side of Istanbul. With its central location, the hotel is well connected to all major transportation routes, 28 kilometers away from Sabiha Gokcen International Airport (SAW) and only 1 kilometer away from the Istanbul Finance Center development. Ulker Sports Arena is within walking distance. 165 stylish rooms and suites offer a variety of city and sea views of the Bosphorus and Princes’ Islands. A range of modern amenities include high speed internet access, a flat screen TV, a minibar, tea/coffee machine and a plush Sheraton Signature Bed.Marriott

name: Burdock Hotel Istanbul, Autograph Collection
address: Kemeralti Caddesi, Hacimimi Mahallesi No 33, Istanbul 34425
description: Burdock Hotel’s character is based on an inspirational look that reflects luxury, exclusivity, and sophisticated accommodation in karma of connection between community, ancient times, themes, and motivations of traveling passions. The Burdock Hotel is located on one of the most popular part of the city; the historical and mystic route, surrounded by authentic and contemporary art, design, and artisanal workshop hotspots. Therefore, The Burdock is more than a hotel; it’s a cocoon for insiders who need to live what’s precious and what’s next. It’s a hub of one-of-a-kind route Karaköy, and it’s motto is “living new inspirations.”Marriott

name: Occidental Taksim
address: Topçu Caddesi No:19, Taksim, Istanbul 34437
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Taksim Hote is in the Beyoglu district; a few meters from Taksim Square and near the promenade. Its privileged situation; staying in this city hotel is synonymous with rest and enjoy the best of the city of Istanbul. Its palaces; its lively shopping streets and its main areas of interest. The Occidental Taksim has 149 rooms; which offer all kinds of comforts. All of them make up a modern space; ideal for resting and enjoying both couples and all family members. Among other services; the hotel offers a Wellness and Spa center with sauna; traditional Turkish bath and massage service; as well as a gym and a fantastic pool.Barcelo.com

name: Radisson Hotel President Beyazit Istanbul
address: Tiyatro Caddesi 25 Beyazit, Fatih, Istanbul 34126
description: Conveniently located in the Old City of Sultanahmet, Radisson President Beyazit Istanbul is just 230 metres from Grand Bazaar and 160 metres from Beyazit Tram Station. The hotel is certified as eco-friendly by Ministry of Culture and Tourism. Panoramic views of Marmara Sea can be admired from the indoor pool and rooftop terrace of the hotel. Free WiFi, satellite TV and a laptop-size safe box are standard in hotel's modern rooms. All rooms have a coffee&tea setup and central heating and cooling system. Some rooms also offer views of the sea or historic city. The day starts with a rich open buffet breakfast including a wide range of cheese, salami and eggs among other varieties and fresh products. Breakfast is served in the Marmara dining room accompanied with views of the Marmara Sea. International cuisine is served as an à la carte menu for lunch and dinner at the Terrace Restaurant. You can also enjoy a drink at the English pub while watching sports however area can be closed from time to time so please contact with the hotel before making your reservations to check it's availability. Surrounded by floor-to-ceiling windows, the indoor swimming area offers panoramic sea views. Access to the state-of-the-art gym is free for guests of Radisson President Beyazit Istanbul. There is also a wellness centre offering massages, sauna, steam room and a hot tub however these areas can be closed from time to time so please contact with the hotel before making your reservations to check their availability. Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace are 1 km from Radisson President Beyazit Istanbul. Cemberlitas Hammam is just 500 metres away. It is also a 20-minute drive from CNR Expo Centre. Free private parking is available on site. Maximum vehicle height for parking garage is 2 meters. Istanbul Airport is 56 km from the property.

name: Hamitbey Hotel
address: Langabostanlari Sokak No 18, Istanbul 34130
description: Located 1.9 km from Suleymaniye Mosque, Hamitbey Hotel Yenikapı offers 4-star accommodation in Istanbul and features a bar. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a shared lounge, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options. At Hamitbey Hotel Yenikapı guests are welcome to take advantage of a Turkish bath. Spice Bazaar is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Blue Mosque is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International Airport, 37 km from Hamitbey Hotel Yenikapı.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Istanbul Pera
address: Evliya Celebi Mah. Refik Saydam Cad. No 19 Tepebasi Taksim, Istanbul 34430
description: Located in Pera district, the centre of culture, art, fine dining and nightlife, Radisson Blu Hotel Istanbul Pera has a restaurant with stunning views of the Golden Horn and old city Istanbul. Istiklal Avenue is just a few feet away with numerous restaurants, cafés, bars, shops and art galleries. Tastefully decorated, the rooms of Radisson Blu Hotel Istanbul Pera include complimentary tea and coffee set-up, a minibar and a digital laptop-size safe box. Air conditioning, free WiFi and a flat-screen TV are also standard in the rooms. Located on the top floor, Hamdi Restaurant offers traditional Turkish cuisine accompanied by spectacular views of the Golden Horn. Additional options include Luna Lounge where you can taste variety of coffee and pastry at Luna Lounge. Dream Spa & Fitness includes a gym, sauna, steam bath, spa bath, an indoor pool and a Turkish bath for relaxation. Massage facilities are also available at a surcharge. Please note that a reservation is required for massage services. The historical Tunnel is just 350 metres from the hotel. Pera Museum, Galata District and the Old City are within walking distance. Ataturk Airport is 18 km from the hotel while Istanbul Airport is 50 km away.

name: Baymari Suites Plus Florya
address: Florya Cd. 37, Istanbul 34153
description: Set in Istanbul in the Marmara Region region and Florya Beach reachable within 1.9 km, BayMari Suites Plus Florya offers accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. The apartment offers an outdoor fireplace. BayMari Suites Plus Florya has a garden and sun terrace, which can be enjoyed by guests if the weather permits. Menekse Beach is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Suleymaniye Mosque is 18 km from the property. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 40 km from BayMari Suites Plus Florya, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ajwa Sultanahmet
address: Emin Sinan Mah Piyerloti Cad No: 30, Istanbul 34122
description: Newly built and opened its door to guests in 2017, AJWA Sultanahmet - a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts is situated in famous Sultanahmet area, 10-minute walk from the Blue Mosque. This hotel is decorated in Ottoman-style and traditional accents. Featuring rooms with hand made carpets and Ottoman-style sofas, this hotel comes with a spa centre and an indoor pool. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests can admire selective pieces of art made by famous Azerbaijani artists such as Sattar Bahlulzade, Mahmud Mahmudzade, İslam İsrafilzade, Jamila Hashimova, Salam Salamzade, Mikayil Abdullayev, Nadir Akhundov and Maral Rahmanzade. Rauf Tuncer's paintings representing the old days of Istanbul are also featured in Amber meeting room. All rooms offer an Loewe Ultra HD TV, electronic curtains, air conditioning and under floor heating system. For indulgence, rooms feature handmade Tabriz-style silk carpets and M Line Slow Motion beds. You will also find hairdryer, tea and coffee setup in the room. Private bathroom features hand-painted tiles and Dornbracht vitrified items. After a work-out in the gym, guests can visit Zeferan Restaurant on the 8th floor, which provides breathtaking views of Marmara Sea, the Princes Islands and Sultanahmet. AJWA Sultanahmet - a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts's décor boasts unique pieces of solid wood handmade furniture with mother-of-pearl details made by craftsmen from Damascus. 24-hour front desk and room service are available. You can enjoy the hotel's library after a busy day in the city. The Grand Bazaar is less than 1 km from AJWA Sultanahmet - a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts. Sabiha Gokcen Airport is 45 km away where airport shuttle can be arranged upon request at a surcharge. Istanbul Airport is 53 km from the property.

name: Kaya Istanbul Fair & Convention
address: Gokevler Mahallesi 2317, Sokak No1, Büyükçekmece 34522
description: Located next to the Tüyap Exhibition Centre in Istanbul’s Büyükçekmece district, Kaya İstanbul Fair & Convention offers modern rooms with satellite TV. Its health club features panoramic views of the Sea of Marmara. The air-conditioned rooms at Kaya İstanbul Fair & Convention are decorated with dark wooden furniture. All rooms have a work desk, a minibar, and an en suite bathroom. Guests can get a relaxing massage at the Palaestra Health Club, which also features a Turkish hammam, an indoor pool, and a fitness centre. The hotel also offers table tennis classes, an outdoor pool, and a tour desk. Rich buffet breakfast is served every morning. The Rolling Rock Café offers exotic cocktails, rock & roll music, and American and Mexican specialties. The Summit Restaurant offers international cuisine and panoramic sea views. Kaya İstanbul Fair & Convention is located 35 km from Istanbul’s historic centre, where guests can visit Topkapi Palace, the Blue Mosque, and the Hagia Sophia Museum. The Marmara Park Shopping Centre is 5 km from the hotel. Istanbul Airport is 40 km away.

name: Point Hotel Taksim
address: Topcu Caddesi No.2 Taksim, Istanbul 34437
description: Located just 500 m from Taksim Square and less than 1 km from the Lutfi Kirdar Congress Center, Point Hotel Taksim offers rooms with free WiFi in modern Istanbul.The dcor of the rooms is light and features natural colours. Each room has double glazed windows for a quiet stay and a sofa. Included are an HD TV, Digiturk and LigTV (football channel). Some of the rooms also include free access to executive lounge.The top-floor View Point restaurant offers sweeping views of the Bosporus and is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. There is also an authentic Japanese restaurant and 2 caf bars.Point Hotel Taksim's spa area includes an indoor swimming pool, sauna and Turkish bath. A variety of massages and beauty treatments are also available at this Istanbul hotel.Shopping options and public transport are readily available in the hotels surroundings.Acbadem Taksim Hospital is 350 metres, Kolan Hospital is 5.5 km away. With elegants shops and cafs, Niantasi district is 2.5 km away. Zorlu Mall is 6.5 km and Kanyon Mall is 6.7 km from the property. Istanbul Congress Centre,Ataturk Cultural Center and Cemal Resit Rey Concert Hall are within 1 km distance. Istanbul Airport is 48.7 km from Point Hotel Taksim. Private parking at the hotel and airport transfer service is available at an additional fee.iHotelier/iStay

name: Mövenpick Living Istanbul Camlivadi
address: Hamidiye Mahallesi Ihlas Sokak C Blok No:13 Kagithane, Istanbul 34408
description: Cosy and comfortable accomodation experience at spacious apartments right in the financial and business district of Istanbul with forest view. Hotel is located just a few minutes away from the most elegant quarter of the town Vadistanbul and Vadistanbul Mall. All apartments are furnished and equipped as a home with state of teh art technology and contemporary design.accorhotels.com

name: Neorion Hotel - Special Class
address: Orhaniye Street, No: 14, Istanbul 34110
description: Located in the Old City of Istanbul, this hotel is within walking distance to Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace. It has an indoor swimming pool, a Turkish bath and massage services. Rooms have air conditioning, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms at the Neorion Hotel - Special Class are decorated with warm colours and wooden furniture. They include a flat-screen TV, a tea/coffee maker and a private bathroom with a bathrobe. In the mornings, guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast prepared with seasonal ingredients. During summer, you can enjoy the sunset on the rooftop of Neorion with a complimentary glass of wine. The hotel lounge includes an exhibit of more than 100 replicas of Anatolian Civilizations. Facilities at the Neorion Hotel - Special Class include car hire, ticket service and a tour desk where guests can arrange to visit local attractions. There is also a library stocked with books on Turkish culture and history. The hotel is a short walk from the Grand Bazaar and the Sea of Marmara. Eminonu Ferry Port, 450 metres away, allows easy access to the Asian side or Bosphorus boat tours. You can go to Taksim Square from Sirkeci Tram Stop, 250 metres away. Zorlu Shopping Center is 10 km and Cevahir Mall is 8 km away. Istanbul Airport is 53 km away.

name: Istanbul Marriott Hotel Asia

Boasting a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a year-round outdoor pool. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. Rooms are fitted with a coffee machine, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also boast pool views. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. The spacious private bathrooms include a bathrobe and slippers. The hotel’s restaurant serves local cuisine prepared with fresh, seasonal ingredients. Guests can enjoy Cappadocian wine on the sun terrace, or make use of the barbecue facilities in the lush garden filled with fruit trees. The hotel has a conference room able to accommodate 40 participants. The hotel has a tour desk that offers a bicycle rental service, assists with car hire and provides information on local attractions. Nearby leisure activities include hot-air balloon rides and hikes through the Cappadocia valley.

name: Sultan Cave Suites
address: Aydinli Mah. Aydinli Sok. No:40, Göreme 50180
description: Perched atop Aydinli Hill, this unique hotel offers cave rooms furnished with antiques from throughout Turkey. It features far-reaching views across Goreme from its panoramic sun terrace. Most guest rooms at Sultan Cave Suites are set into the hill, providing cool temperatures and tranquillity. The majority has a private terrace or balcony, and all have a seating area and modern en-suite bathrooms. Cave Suites Sultan features a stylish restaurant serving regional specialities from Cappadocia. After dinner you can relax with a drink on the terrace and watch the sun set over the village. The hotel arranges local excursions including hot air balloon flights and hiking tours. The picturesque landscapes of Goreme Tarihi Park are less than 2 km away. Free shuttle from the bus station and airport transfers for a small fee are available upon request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

name: Seraphim Cave Suites & Spa
address: Mustafapasa Koyu Davutlu Mevkii Cınar Sok. No:10 Nevsehir, Mustafapaşa 50420
description: Seraphim Cave Cappadocia brings you an exceptional and authentic Cappadocia experience combining flawless service and luxury facilities in a mansion listed on the historic register. With its cave rooms, leisure areas, a terrace bar ideal for taking in Cappadocia's famous sunsets and a serenely peaceful courtyard, Seraphim Cave Cappadocia brings you exclusive accommodations infused with a uniquely local sensibility.Welcoming guests in a historic mansion originally constructed in 1853, Seraphim Cave Cappadocia offers expansive grounds covering over an acre of gardens and rock formations. Each of our 21 luxury rooms is unique, with distinctive details designed to ensure your comfort. The mansion greets guests with its historic lion gate bearing an original inscription. In the local Greek dialect, the inscription reads:"Oh, son of man, if you are a friend, enter joyously;If you are an enemy or conceal bad intentions, stay far from this door.Today is mine, tomorrow another's, in truth no one's."Designated a protected building by the Turkish Ministry of Culture, the mansion has been lovingly restored, preserving its original fabric and decoration, combining them with the energy of the region to give you the most exclusive and authentic Cappadocia experience possible. The hotel's historic doors and its rarely encountered double-sided Greek fountain give you a taste of the region's historic flavor before you ever leave the hotel.After relaxing in your uniquely Cappadocian cave room, join us at the la carte Tasula Restaurant to discover the finest authentic local cuisine. Wash away the fatigue of your journeys of exploration in our wellness area, featuring a heated indoor pool, sauna, massage rooms and Turkish bath. The palpable sense of centuries of history that imbues our courtyard and gardens adds a new dimension to special events. At Seraphim Cave Cappadocia, you will bear witness to contemporary manifestations of the majesty of history while laying claim to your own indelible memories.iHotelier/iStay

name: Miras Hotel
address: Gafferli Mah. Unlu Sk. No:22, Göreme 50180
description: Set in the famous Cappadocia area with volcanic landscape formation and unique fairy chimneys, Miras Hotel offers accommodation with free WiFi and an outdoor swimming pool. The terrace is an ideal spot to enjoy the scenery of the sunrise and sunset along with colourful hot air balloons. You will find 24-hour front desk for your convenience. You can engage with tours around the area and hot balloon tours during your stay. The hotel arranges Turkish-style evening events, traditional dervish performance, horse riding activities and off-road tours upon request at a surcharge. Airport transfer can be arranged at an additional fee.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Avanos - Cappadocia
address: Yeni Mah. Kizilirmak Cad. No:1, Avanos 50500
description: Ancient culture, modern hotel accommodations The Doubletree by Hilton hotel Avanos - Cappadocia hotel is the perfect Central Anatolian outpost from which to discover the natural beauty and cultural heritage of Turkiye's unique Cappadocia region. From “fairy chimney” hoodoo rock formations to fascinating ancient underground cities, guests at our modern, upscale city center hotel in Avanos district can explore and relax in style. We're only 30 km/19 miles from Nevsehir Airport (NAV), or 90 km/56 mi from Erkilet International Airport (ASR) in Kayseri to the east. A first class hotel in Cappadocia You'll feel right at home in elegant, contemporary guest rooms and suites featuring pampering bath amenities, generous work surfaces, LCD TVs, luxuriant Sweet Dreams® beds and complimentary wireless internet access. Guests at the Doubletree by Hilton hotel in Cappadocia also enjoy many first class hotel amenities such as: • Complimentary onsite self-parking • Lush, beautiful gardens • Indoor and outdoor swimming pools • Health club with sauna, Turkish bath and massage facilities • Fitness Center by Precor® • 24-hour Room Service Relax, unwind and take in fantastic views while you dine at our contemporary hotel restaurant or share the day's experience over cocktails in our inviting Lobby Lounge. Start the day right at our extensive Doubletree Breakfast buffet. Enjoy freshly prepared Continental and local dishes for lunch and dinner daily. At the Doubletree, you'll find comfort, convenience and cuisine to suit any taste. Meet at the Doubletree hotel in Cappadocia Our well-appointed Cappadocia hotel provides the ideal venue for dynamic business meetings, seminars, themed gala dinners, awards ceremonies or team building events. Meeting and banquet facilities include the latest technology for total presentation and connectivity solutions. From small meetings to groups of 400, our flexible spaces, elegant ballrooms and variety of outdoor venues offer the perfect backdrop for your important business or social occasion. Experience the magic world of Cappadocia from the Doubletree Visit unique Cappadocia attractions from our well-located hotel in Central Turkiye. See the monastic valleys and painted cave churches at the Göreme Open Air Museum or Zelve, both UNESCO World Heritage sites. Enjoy the nightlife at a traditional Turkish show in Evranos. Take a balloon ride or sample cultural history and thousands of years of architectural wonders in underground cities, rock fortresses and ancient archeological sites. On your next visit to Turkiye, our friendly hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to beautiful Cappadocia with our signature warm Doubletree chocolate chip cookie at check-in.Hilton
