description: Located in the heart of Antalya's old city area Kaleici, Puding Hotel features 6 historical mansions, an outdoor pool and a pool bar. The property's location offers a unique panorama of mountains and the Mediterranean Sea, laying under the 30 meter high cliffs. Mermerli Beach and the old marina are within a 5-minute walk distance. Elegantly-designed rooms come with air conditioning, flat-screen TV, safety box, minibar and an electric kettle for your convenience. Private bathroom includes a hairdryer. You will also find free WiFi throughout the property. You can start the day with a buffet breakfast served at Puding Restaurant & Bar. 24-hour front desk service is at your disposal during the stay. Puding Hotel boasts a garden where you can relax after a busy day in the city. Kaleici district features many antique stores and historical mosques. Puding Hotel is just 500 metres from Hadrianus Gate. You can access to the tram line, located 700 metres from the property. Antalya Airport is just a 25-minute drive away.

name: Old Town Point Hotel & Spa Antalya
address: Altindag Mah. Anafartalar Cd. No:63, Antalya 07050
description: Featuring a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a shared lounge as well as a restaurant, Old Town Point Hotel & Spa Antalya is located in the centre of Antalya, 1.4 km from Mermerli Beach. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a spa centre. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room comes with a kettle, while selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge and a microwave. At Old Town Point Hotel & Spa Antalya each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a halal breakfast. Popular points of interest near Old Town Point Hotel & Spa Antalya include Old City Marina, Hadrian's Gate and Antalya Museum. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Lykia Old Town Antalya
address: Kilincarslan Mahallesi, Firin Sokak, No7, Antalya 07100
description: Set in Antalya, 200 metres from Mermerli Beach and 500 metres from Hadrian's Gate, Hotel Lykia Old Town Antalya offers accommodation with air conditioning and access to a garden. Complimentary WiFi is offeredthroughout the property. The bed and breakfast offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with slippers, a hair dryer and bidet. Vegetarian and halal breakfast options are available every morning at Hotel Lykia Old Town Antalya. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and Hotel Lykia Old Town Antalya can arrange a car rental service. Antalya Clock Tower is 600 metres from the bed and breakfast, while Old City Marina is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya, 9 km from Hotel Lykia Old Town Antalya, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Urcu Hotel
address: Barbaros Mah Hamit Efendi Sok No: 6, Antalya
description: Centrally located in the heart of Kaleici, old Antalya, the family-run Urcu is a small and friendly hotel offering traditional Turkish accommodation. Renovated in 2015, The hotel is housed in an old, yet beautifully restored historical mansion with many original architectural features. The Hotel Urcu has 12 guest rooms in total. Each is simply decorated and furnished in a traditional Turkish style. Some rooms offer pool view. The hotel is extremely well-placed for exploring the historical sights of Kaleici, as well as the touristic centre with its many shops, restaurants and bars. Konyaalti Beach and Antalya Museum are about a 20-minute tram ride away. Antalya Bus Terminal is 7.5 km and Antalya Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Can Adalya Palace Hotel
address: Asik Veysel Cd., No 2, Antalya 07300
description: In a prime location in Antalya, Can Adalya Palace Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the various facilities are a terrace, a bar, as well as a private beach area. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Can Adalya Palace Hotel also provide guests with a city view. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Can Adalya Palace Hotel offers a continental or halal breakfast. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving American and Turkish cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Hadrian's Gate is 4.4 km from Can Adalya Palace Hotel, while Antalya Clock Tower is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya, 6 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sealife Royal Suites
address: 9 623. Sokak, Antalya 07070
description: Located in Antalya, 2.7 km from Konyaalti Beach and 1.3 km from 5M Migros, Sealife Royal Suites provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a bar. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, quiet street views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and bathrobes. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a kettle. Sealife Royal Suites provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. A car rental service is available at the accommodation. Antalya Aquarium is 1.3 km from Sealife Royal Suites, while Antalya Aqualand is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya, 15 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Akra V Hotel
address: Lara Yolu, Antalya 07100
description: Situated in the centre of Antalya, Akra V Hotel is only 300 metres from the Mediterranean coast. It offers spacious guestrooms with free WiFi and has a 24-hour front desk. Rooms at Akra V Hotel include modern wood furnishings and a seating area with satellite TV. An electric kettle with tea/coffee set-up and a minibar are available in each unit. Some rooms include a furnished balcony with views of the sea. Guests can taste delicious croissants along with a cup of coffee or tea. You can sample a range of Turkish and international cuisine dishes at the hotel’s many dining options including the main Restaurant, fine dining restaurant, brasserie, pool bar, lobby bar, snack bar, and the patisserie. Guests can benefit from the facilities of Akra Hotel free of charge. The venue is only 100 metres away and it offers on-site Turkish bath, indoor and outdoor pool, fitness center and an access to the beach. Akra V Hotel is located 15 km from Antalya Airport and offers free on-site private parking. Nearby leisure activities include bowling and water sports.

name: Titanic Mardan Palace
address: Kundu Mah. Yasar Sobutay Bul. No: 450/1, Antalya 07110
description: This resort boasts one of the largest outdoor pools in Europe and 8 à la carte restaurants. Titanic Mardan Palace offers a private beach area and rooms equipped with luxury amenities. Each room has a balcony with views of Taurus Mountains, Mediterranean Sea or swimming pool. All rooms feature remote controlled air conditioning and lighting. Separate restaurants are dedicated to international cuisines. The main restaurant serves each meal. The rooftop bar offers views of the resort and the sea. The luxury spa offers therapies, a state-of-art fitness centre and a meditation room overlooking the indoor pool. The beauty therapy centre provides facial and body care. The centre of Antalya is just 15 km away and can be reached in just 20 minutes by car. EXPO 2016 Antalya is 17 km from Titanic Mardan Palace.

name: Mediterra Art Hotel
address: Barbaros Mah Zafer Sok No 5 Kaleici, Antalya
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Antalya City Center, Mediterra Art Boutique Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of outdoor pool, garden. Mediterra Art Boutique Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Antalya unforgettable.Agoda

name: Casa Sur Antalya
address: Barbaros Mah. Kandiller Sok. No 3, Antalya
description: Located in Antalya and with Mermerli Beach reachable within 600 metres, Casa Sur Antalya provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is situated 4 km from Antalya Museum, 6.8 km from Antalya Aquarium and 7.5 km from Antalya Aqualand. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Casa Sur Antalya each room comes with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers an à la carte or continental breakfast. At Casa Sur Antalya you will find a restaurant serving Greek, Mediterranean and Turkish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. There is an on-site bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Popular points of interest near Casa Sur Antalya include Hadrian's Gate, Antalya Clock Tower and Old City Marina. The nearest airport is Antalya, 9 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Melas Lara Hotel
address: Kemeragzi Koyu Tesisler Cad. Kundu-Lara 402, Antalya 07110
description: Just a few steps from the private beach, all-inclusive Melas Lara Hotel is set in Lara, one of the most popular points of Antalya. The hotel offers a garden, an outdoor pool with water slides, and an indoor pool. Free private parking is possible on site. Air-conditioned accommodations at Melas Lara come with a seating area, flat-screen satellite TV, and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a shower, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. Each features a balcony offering garden views, whereas some also have sea views. You can work out at the gym, or get a relaxation at the sauna. Leisure facilities include tennis, billiards, table tennis, darts, squash, mini golf and water sports. You can also have massage treatments, while the little ones can have fun in the children’s playground. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served buffet style. You can enjoy your meal on the terrace restaurant overlooking the stunning view of the Mediterranean Sea. Antalya Airport is 15 km from Hotel Melas Lara, and airport shuttles can be arranged upon request, at an extra fee.

name: Antalya Nun Hotel
address: Çaglayan Mahallesi 2051 Sokak No: 22, Antalya 07300
description: Modernly designed and decorated in a French style, Antalya Nun Hotel is set in Antalya, 8 km from historical Kaleici. It also features free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms at Antalya Nun Hotel are decorated with warm colours. Each room has an air conditioning, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a minibar. The rooms include a private bathroom with slippers and free toiletries. A customised breakfast is served every morning. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Luggage storage is also offered. Hadrian's Gate and Clock Tower are 8 km from Antalya Nun Hotel. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 13 km from Antalya Nun Hotel.

name: Pure Blanche Hotel
address: Lara Cd. 193, Antalya 07160
description: Pure Blanche Hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Antalya. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All units at the hotel include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, DVD player, and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Every room is equipped with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms include a terrace and others also provide guests with city views. At Pure Blanche Hotel rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers Full English/Irish, vegan or halal options. Blanche Beach is 300 metres from the accommodation, while Movida Beach is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 6 km from Pure Blanche Hotel.

name: Ozkavak Hotel Kaleici
address: Barbaros Mah Civelek Sok No 6, Antalya 07100
description: Located in the historic Kaleici district of Antalya, Ozkavak Hotel has an outdoor pool and a large garden with fruit trees. Built in 2 authentic houses, the hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Tastefully decorated, the rooms of Ozkavak Hotel include satellite TV, minibar and a private bathroom. 24-hour room service is available. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet. There is also an à la carte restaurant at the hotel. Hadrian’s Gate is only 100 metres from the hotel. Mermeli Beach is 300 metres away.

name: Delight Deluxe Hotel
address: Barbaros Mahhalesi, Civelek Sokak No:16, Muratpasa, Antalya 07100
description: Stop at Delight Deluxe Boutique Hotel to discover the wonders of Antalya. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the property's facilities and services. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, are at hand. Flat screen television, carpeting, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea can be found in selected guestrooms. The property's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include outdoor pool. For reliable service and professional staff, Delight Deluxe Boutique Hotel caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: White Garden Hotel-Adult Only
address: Kaleiçi Kılıçaslan Mah. Hesapçi Geçidi No : 9, Antalya 07100
description: Situated in Antalya, White Garden Hotel-Adult Only offers beachfront accommodation 200 metres from Mermerli Beach and features various facilities, such as a garden, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 4.1 km from Antalya Museum, 7.2 km from Antalya Aquarium and 8 km from Antalya Aqualand. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at White Garden Hotel-Adult Only also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms have a city view. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels. A halal breakfast is available each morning at White Garden Hotel-Adult Only. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Hadrian's Gate, Antalya Clock Tower and Old City Marina. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 9 km from White Garden Hotel-Adult Only.

name: Minyon Hotel
address: Kılınçaraslan Mahallesi, Tabakhane Sok. No: 31 Kaleiçi / Antalya, Antalya 07100
description: Minyon Hotel is situated in the historical Kaleici area of Antalya, only 3 km from the Konyaalti Beach. Featuring a mansion in Ottoman architecture, this hotel offers an outdoor pool surrounded by a green garden of fruit trees. The hotel has authentic rooms with wooden floors. Each room includes air conditioning, minibar and free Wi-Fi. A rich breakfast is served in the morning with cheese, olives, fresh eggs and homemade jams. You can enjoy your breakfast in the peaceful garden accompanied with a cup of traditional Turkish tea. The Hadrian’s Gate is just 600 metres from Hotel Minyon. The restaurants, bars and shops of the city are within walking distance. Antalya Airport is 10 km away.

name: Balmy Beach Resort Kemer
address: Baskomutan, Atatürk Cd. No:41, Block A, Antalya 07985
description: Near Beldibi Beach Park Located in Kemer, Balmy Beach Resort Kemer is a 1-minute drive from Beldibi Beach Park and 7 minutes from topçam. This spa hotel is 10.1 mi (16.2 km) from Konyaalti Beach and 13.4 mi (21.6 km) from Konyaalti Beach Park. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and coffee/tea in a common area. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Beldibi Beach Park - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi Champion Holiday Village - 4 km / 2.5 mi Topçam - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi DinoPark - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi Goynuk Canyon - 10.7 km / 6.7 mi Tunektepe Cable Car - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi Sarisu Beach - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi Antalya Trade Port - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi Konyaalti Beach - 16.2 km / 10.1 mi Liman Street - 19.2 km / 11.9 mi Kemer Marina - 19.4 km / 12 mi Nomad Theme Park - 19.8 km / 12.3 mi Moonlight Beach and Park - 20.9 km / 13 mi Kemer Merkez Bati Public Beach - 20.9 km / 13 mi Konyaalti Beach Park - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi The nearest major airport is Antalya Intl. Airport (AYT) - 43.1 km / 26.8 mi Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's many dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/cafe. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Need to unwind? Take a break with a tasty beverage at one of the 3 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Make yourself at home in one of the 148 air-conditioned rooms featuring free minibar items and espresso makers. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and 50-inch LED televisions are provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily.Ticket Package

name: Mrt Suites Lara
address: Yasar Sabutay Bulvari 99, Antalya 07230
description: With city views, Mrt Suites Lara is situated in Antalya and has a restaurant, room service, bar, garden, year-round outdoor pool and terrace. Complimentary WiFi is featured throughout the property. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A fridge, a microwave and stovetop are also available, as well as a kettle. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or Italian options. A car rental service and a private beach area are offered at the aparthotel. Kundu Public Beach is 1.4 km from Mrt Suites Lara, while Hadrian's Gate is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya, 6 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bacchus Pension
address: Kılıçaslan Mh. Zeytincıkmaz Sokak No 6, Antalya 07100
description: Welcome to Bacchus Pension, where you will find a homely atmosphere and traditional Turkish hospitality in this popular tourist town on the Mediterranean coast. Bacchus Pension offers you nicely decorated and comfortable rooms that should ensure an enjoyable stay by the beach in the picturesque town and tourist resort of Antalya. Situated in the centre of the town, the hotel is surrounded by Antalya’s historic buildings and ancient city walls. The rooftop terrace has a lovely sea view, but best of all are the friendly and helpful staff. Antalya Airport is 15 km away.

name: The Suite Apart Hotel
address: Kiliçarslan Mah. Kadirpasa Sok. No 12, Antalya 07100
description: Situated in the old city of Antalya and 350 metres away from Hıdırlık Tower, The Suite Apart Hotel offers spacious accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a large outdoor pool area. All the rooms at The Suite Apart Hotel have a private bathroom decorated with Ottoman touches. Some rooms have a private balcony and a kitchenette with a dining area. At the pool area, guests of The Suite Apart Hotel can use the barbecue facilities. The garden terrace gives plenty of opportunity for sunbathing and relaxing. The Yivli Minare Mosque is 100 metres away from the hotel. The Hadrian's Gate is within 500 metres.

name: Esperanza Boutique Hotel
address: Guzeloba Mah 2293 sk Muratpasa, Antalya 07230
description: Featuring a private blue-flag beach only 200 metres away and a seasonal outdoor pool, Esperanza Boutique Hotel offers accommodation in Antalya, 9 km from Hadrian's Gate. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms feature views of the sea or pool. Each room includes a private bathroom. Extras include slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can benefit from sun loungers and parasols for free. Broken Minaret is 9 km from Esperanza Boutique Hotel, while Clock Tower is 9 km away. The property offers two-way airport shuttle service for an additional fee. Antalya Airport is 7 km from the property.

name: Nox Suite
address: Caglayan Mahallesi, Antalya 07230
description: Nox Suite has garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Antalya, 2.1 km from Blanche Beach. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and a fridge, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a halal breakfast. Nox Suite offers a seasonal outdoor pool. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. A car rental service is available at Nox Suite. Hadrian's Gate is 8 km from the aparthotel, while Antalya Clock Tower is 8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 5 km from Nox Suite.

name: Lara Diamond Hotel
address: Lara Cad. Manolya Sok. No 5, Antalya 07100
description: Situated 600 metres from Lara Beach, this hotel features an outdoor pool with free sun loungers and parasols. Guests can enjoy various water sports activities at a surcharge. Free Wi-Fi in all areas and free on-site parking is available. All rooms at Lara Diamond Hotel include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a balcony with pool, garden or sea views. Private bathroom comes with free toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer. The hotel’s restaurant serves breakfast as an open buffet, and an à la carte menu for lunch and dinner with tastes from Turkish cuisine. The bar is ideal for refreshing drinks and snacks. Guests can enjoy their food and drinks either inside or outside by the pool area. You can play a game of table tennis or get a massage by the pool. Car rental, room service and a tour desk are available. Ornekkoy Beach is a 7-minute walk from the site. Antalya Airport is 11 km from Lara Diamond Hotel. Antalya city centre is 12 km away.

name: Sherwood Premio Hotel
address: Sirinyali Mah 1503 Sk No 4, Antalya 07160
description: Located on old Lara Street, Sherwood Premio Hotel offers a free Wi-Fi, air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and balcony overlooking the sea. Lara Beach is a 15-minute drive away. All the rooms at Hotel Sherwood Prize feature a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. A minibar is also standard. Daily breakfast is available in buffet style at Sherwood Premio Hotel. The front desk is available 24/7. You can also benefit from the airport shuttle service at a surcharge. Free public parking is available on site. The hotel is 500 metres from the shopping centres and cafés. Just 6 km to Antalya city centre, Sherwood Premio Hotel is less than 4 km to Duden Waterfalls. Antalya Airport is 10 km away.

name: Vib Best Western Antalya
address: Bolgesi 1. Kisim 5. Caddesi No: 3, Antalya 07190
description: Enjoy the privilege of staying in the elegant and technologically advanced Vīb® BestWestern Antalya. The Vīb® Antalya’s vibrant lobby, stylish design and focus on convenience and technology integration will exceed your expectations. The Vīb® Antalya allows you to keep moving at high speed. It facilitates its guest’s connectivity in public and private. Wi-Fi, USB access, and power ports are widespread throughout the hotel, while LED mood lighting creates different moods and spaces. Smart TVs in guest rooms allow for streaming on-demand content, while a customized media wall electrifies local attractions. It all equates to a vibrant, technology-centric experience. The Vīb® Antalya’s amenities include free Wi-Fi in the lobby and guest rooms, a Bistro stop area serving premium food and coffee, a state-of-the-art fitness center, and gaming cabanas that offer you reasons to stay in as well as options for going out. Open areas abound for social engagement, while the solo-minded can find pods for online streaming or gaming. You will experience the world's most characteristic tastes in addition to perfect accommodations prepared with great care; each dish is presented as a work of art. The professionalism of the Vīb® Antalya is your guarantee to make a perfect fairy tale out of your special days and events. Whether you are working, socializing, or just hanging out, the Vīb® Antalya aims to energize all the senses and do it in style. This is an adults-only hotel. Please note that children under 18 years old are not accepted in this hotel.bestwestern.com

name: Dinc Hotel
address: Güzeloba Lara Cad. No: 585, Antalya
description: Located 300 metres from the public beach along the Mediterranean shores, this hotel features an outdoor pool with free sun loungers and parasols. Air-conditioned rooms at Lara Dinc Hotel include a satellite TV, minibar and a balcony. Private bathroom comes with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel’s restaurant serves breakfast in buffet style. The meal can be enjoyed at the restaurant or by the pool. The pool bar is ideal for refreshing drinks. Free Wi-Fi is accessible throughout the hotel. Guests can benefit from the 24-hour front desk service, safety deposit box and room service. Antalya Airport is 7 km from Lara Dinc Hotel. Antalya city center is a 20-minute drive away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Tekeli Konaklari
address: Dizdar Hasan Sokak Kaleici, Antalya 07100
description: A restored Old Ottoman Pasha’s residence, Tekeli Konaklari offers charming, traditional Turkish houses surrounding a courtyard. The rooms feature an elegant, classic décor in the heart of historic Antalya. The residences at Tekeli Konaklari are all uniquely decorated, and include air conditioning and deluxe ensuite bathrooms. Guests can take advantage of Tekeli’s room service and enjoy a fine meal in the comfort of their room. Guests of the Tekeli Konaklari can take a swim in the pool or relax in the picturesque courtyard. Free Wi-Fi is available in all public areas. The Tekeli Konaklari has a fine restaurant onsite, serving traditional Turkish cuisine. The residences are just 100 metres form the Old Harbour. The Mermerli Beach is just 250 metres away. The Antalya Airport is just 8 km away. Free private parking is available.

name: Club Hotel Sera
address: Lara Yolu Park 444, Antalya 07003
description: Club Hotel Sera is located in Antalya, just seconds away from sandy Lara Beach. It offers luxurious rooms and has a spa, fitness centre and several swimming pools. Free WiFi is available on lobby area. All rooms at the 5-star Club Hotel Sera are well-equipped with central air conditioning and satellite TV, and the interior design reflects the opulence of Ottoman palaces. Club Hotel Sera offers body and face treatments at the full service spa and the Turkish bath. The fitness centre offers high-tech equipment and personal trainers. Children can have fun at the mini club, which provides a supervised environment with animation and games throughout the day. Guests can enjoy a variety of international and Turkish cuisine in Club Hotel Sera’s restaurant, while admiring the panoramic views of the Turkish Riviera. Antalya Airport is only a 15-minute drive from Club Hotel Sera.

name: Opera Suites
address: Altinkum Mah. 422. Sokak no 10, Antalya 07070
description: Located in Antalya, 3.1 km from 5M Migros and 4 km from Antalya Aquarium, OPERA SUITES Apart Hotel provides a restaurant, mountain views and free WiFi. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and slippers. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. Vegetarian and halal breakfast options are available daily at the aparthotel. OPERA SUITES Apart Hotel offers a year-round outdoor pool. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Antalya Aqualand is 4.7 km from OPERA SUITES Apart Hotel, while Antalya Museum is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya, 17 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Elegance East Hotel
address: Barbaros Mahallesi Atatürk Cad No: 42/c, Antalya 07100
description: Located in the historical centre of Antalya, spacious Elegance East Hotel features a traditional Kaleici architecture. It offers an outdoor pool. Featuring palace-like interiors, the rooms of Elegance East are decorated with luxurious furniture. They all include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a minibar. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Mermerli Public Beach and a 15-minute drive from Konyaalti Beach. The Hadrian's Gate and nearby shopping centres are within walking distance. Antalya Airport is 15 km from Elegance East Hotel.

name: Rixos Downtown Antalya
address: Sakıp Sabancı Boulevard,Konyaaltı Beach 3, Antalya 07050
description: Rixos Downtown Antalya offers guests a fabulous juxtaposition; an urban resort in the centre of Antalya where city and nature collide. With views over the Mediterranean Sea and the Taurus Mountains, the picturesque setting of the Rixos Downtown Antalya makes it a natural choice for anyone seeking rich and varied culture in a resort setting. From the yacht-filled harbour to Hadrian's Gate, a powerful reminder of Turkey's role in the creation of civilisation, it is easy to see the allure of Antalya.accorhotels.com

name: Falcon Hotel
address: Sirinyali Mah., 1540 Sok. No: 12, Antalya 07310
description: Set in the city centre of Antalya, Falcon hotel features a private platform beach, pools and a garden lawn that overlooks the Mediterranean Sea. It has a traditional Turkish bath, a sauna and tennis court. All rooms have parquet floors and a balcony with land & sea views. They have air conditioning and come equipped with a minibar and satellite TV. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer. The Falcon Hotel provides indoor and outdoor open buffet at Main Restaurant, which serves Turkish and international cuisine. Drinks are available from the restaurant and all bars. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage, or visit the fitness centre. The hotel has an outdoor pool with waterslides and a tennis court. WiFi access is free in public areas and rooms. Antalya’s historic Kaleiçi neighbourhood is just 5 km from the hotel and Antalya International Airport is 17 km away. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service and luggage storage.

name: Triana Hotel
address: Genclik Mah 1330 Sok No1, Antalya
description: Located 2 km from the Antalya Marina, Triana Hotel features an intimate, walled-in garden with a pool. It offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and room service. Each of Triana’s air-conditioned rooms is appointed with dark wooden furnishings and rich fabrics for a luxurious feel. They offer plenty of space and a private balcony for guests’ comfort. Guests can enjoy a rich Turkish breakfast at Hotel Triana’s restaurant, which also opens for lunch and dinner. Its bar serves a wide variety of beverages throughout the day. Triana Hotel is just a 20-minute drive from Lara Beach. The airport is a convenient 12 km away. Guests benefit from free parking during their entire stay.

name: Lorem Hotel
address: Çaglayan Mah. 2004 Sokak, Antalya 07230
description: Lorem Hotel has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Antalya. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 2.1 km of Blanche Beach. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Lorem Hotel rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Lorem Hotel. Hadrian's Gate is 8.4 km from the hotel, while Antalya Clock Tower is 8.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 5 km from Lorem Hotel.

name: Mic Royal Hotel
address: altinkum 415 sokak no4, Antalya 07070
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 27 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Property Location With a stay at Mic Royal Hotel in Konyaalti (Altınkum Mahallesi), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Konyaalti Beach and Konyaalti Beach Park. This hotel is 5.5 mi (8.8 km) from Old Bazaar and 5.5 mi (8.8 km) from Antalya Clock Tower. Dining At Mic Royal Hotel, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Airport shuttle fee: EUR 50 per vehicle (one-way) Airport shuttle fee per child: EUR 50 (one-way), (up to 12 years old) Early check-in fee: 30 percent of room rate (subject to availability) Late check-out fee: 50 percent of room rate (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed No onsite parking is available The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:30 AM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No cribs (infant beds) available Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property follows regional sanitization guidelines Safe Tourism Certification Program (Turkey) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Gap period enforced between guest stays - 24 hours Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Property follows sanitization practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global) Cashless transactions are available Masks are compulsory at the propertyViajes Exito Hotels

name: Santa Marina Hotel
address: Liman Mah 25 Sokak No 17 Konyaalti, Antalya
description: Just a short walk from Konyaalti Beach, Santa Marina features spacious and modern apartments with beautiful sea and mountain views, an outdoor swimming pool and free wireless internet access. Enjoy your complimentary buffet breakfast in the hotel’s cosy restaurant. Afterwards, you can have a refreshing dip in the large outdoor pool, while the children run around in the playground. The hotel’s friendly bar is the perfect place to have a relaxing drink after a day at the pool, or the nearby beach. Santa Marina Hotel is just 15 minutes away from the centre of Antalya, with its many shops, bars and restaurants. The hotel can arrange for you to rent a car and explore the surrounding landscape of this fascinating area. Santa Marina also provides free private parking for your convenience.

name: Siete Hotel
address: Lara Cd. 189, Antalya 07160
description: Facing the beachfront, Siete Hotel offers 3-star accommodation in Antalya and has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden and shared lounge. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 300 metres from Blanche Beach and around 1.6 km from Movida Beach. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a balcony. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Siete Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms include a seating area. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Siete Hotel offers a continental or halal breakfast. The hotel offers a sun terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Siete Hotel. Hadrian's Gate is 6.3 km from the accommodation, while Antalya Clock Tower is 6.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 6 km from Siete Hotel.

name: Amara Premier Palace Hotel
address: Bahcecik Mah. 38.Sok No:1 Beldibi Antalya, Göynük 07985
description: Located in the seafront of Beldibi, Amara Premier Palace Hotel offers a private beach, indoor and outdoor swimming pools and water slides. Spa facilities include a sauna, Turkish bath, massages and various treatments. Modernly decorated, the rooms of Amara Premier Palace Hotel include a flat-screen TV, minibar, an electric kettle and free WiFi. They all offer a balcony and sea, mountain or garden views. 24-hour room service is available. The main restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in open buffet style. There are 3 à la carte restaurants offering dishes of Far East, Italian cuisine and seafood(reservation with extra charge). Antalya Airport is 40 km away.

name: Baia Lara Hotel
address: Kemeragzi Mevkii Kundu Bölgesi Lara, Antalya 07000
description: Featuring a private sandy beach area and a wooden pier, this extensive hotel offers wide outdoor pools, Aqua Park with 9 slides and a heated indoor pool. Spa and sports facilities are all available. Rooms at Baia Lara Hotel include free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and floor-to-ceiling windows. Safety deposit box, minibar and an electric kettle are provided. Private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and a shower or bath. Baia Restaurant serves breakfast, late breakfast, lunch, dinner and midnight snack, all in buffet style. A la carte restaurant with Mediterranean and steak specialties are available, and reservation is needed. Bars and snack corners are scattered around the hotel. Guests can play a game of football, basketball and tennis on the fields offered. Bowling, beach volleyball and games room are available. You can also work out in the fitness centre and relax in the Turkish bath, sauna or in one of the 13 massage rooms. Antalya Airport is only 15 km from Baia Lara Hotel.

name: Veranda Suites
address: Güzeloba Mahallesi 2365 sokak 42 / C Muratpaşa/Antalya, Antalya 07230
description: Set in Antalya, 15 km from Hadrian's Gate, Veranda Suites offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. 15 km from Antalya Clock Tower and 15 km from Old City Marina, the property provides a bar and a private beach area. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms come with a shared bathroom with a bath, while selected rooms here will provide you with a terrace and others also have city views. At Veranda Suites rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. An American, vegetarian or halal breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The Land of Legends Theme Park is 18 km from the accommodation, while Antalya Museum is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 4 km from Veranda Suites.

name: Dogan Hotel
address: Mermerli Banyo Sok. No: 5 Kaleiçi, Antalya 07100
description: Dogan Hotel is located in the historic Kaleiçi District of Antalya only 100 metres from the beach. It has an outdoor pool with sun-lounger terrace and offers some of rooms with balconies and panoramic views. Guestrooms have hardwood floors and traditional décor. They include modern wood furnishings and come equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. In the morning, the hotel serves breakfast in the landscaped garden with orange trees. The hotel’s restaurant offers Turkish dishes and international cuisine. Guests can rent a bicycle and explore the harbor and nearby beaches. The Dogan tour desk assists with car hire and offers information on local attractions. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and the rooms. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Hadrian's Gate. The hotel provides 24-hour front desk service.

name: Gunduz Otel
address: 642. Sokak, Antalya 07070
description: Located in Antalya, 1.6 km from 5M Migros, ANTALYA Konyaaltı Gündüz Otel provides accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a garden. This 2-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and a shared lounge. Guests can have a drink at the bar. At the hotel, the rooms include a balcony. At ANTALYA Konyaaltı Gündüz Otel each room includes air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A continental, Italian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving African, American and Argentinian cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. ANTALYA Konyaaltı Gündüz Otel offers a sun terrace. Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English and Turkish. Antalya Aquarium is 1.7 km from the hotel, while Antalya Aqualand is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 15 km from ANTALYA Konyaaltı Gündüz Otel.

name: Oscar Boutique Hotel
address: Ataturk Cad. 1302 Sk. No:12, Antalya
description: No description found

name: Özkaymak Falez Hotel
address: Bahçelievler Mahallesi,Tarik Akiltopu Caddesi No:1 (Near Sakip Sabanci Bulvari; ex Konyaalti Falez Mevkii) Muratpasa, Antalya, Antalya 07050
description: Ozkaymak Falez Hotel offers 2 outdoor pools, a children’s pool, an indoor pool, and a water slide. The hotel has a spa centre and 4 tennis courts. Ozkaymak’s private beach is 200 metres away, and a shuttle is provided. The rooms of Hotel Ozkaymak Falez include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, air conditioning and a minibar. They all have a balcony or terrace with city, garden, land or pool views. Some rooms also offer sea views. Outdoor dining is possible at La Pergola Restaurant, which serves buffet-style dishes. À la carte specialities and panoramic views of the Mediterranean can be enjoyed at Mehtap Restaurant. In the evening, you can relax with drinks and live piano music in the lobby bar. Spa facilities include a sauna and a Turkish bath. Massage treatments and a fitness centre are also available. The hotel offers bike and car rentals. Antalya Airport is 16 km away.

name: Nebilux Hotel
address: Caglayan Mah. Lara Yolu 2048 Sok No 2, Antalya 07000
description: Located right across the Lara Beach, Nebilux offers an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. All rooms at Nebilux Hotel feature a satellite TV and refrigerator. A bathroom with shower and hairdryer is also standard. You can enjoy your buffet breakfast indoors or by the pool accompanied by sea views. The buffet restaurant at Hotel Nebilux also serves local cuisine. The pool area is ideal for sunbathing and relaxation. The front desk is available 24/7. Room service can also be provided by the hotel. Less than 2 km from Duden Waterfalls, Nebilux Hotel is a 20-minute drive to Antalya city centre. Antalya Airport is 8 km away. Free private parking is available.

name: Hotel Karyatit Kaleici
address: Kliçarslan Mah. Kadipasa Sok. No: 7, Antalya 07100
description: This beautiful family-run hotel is located in the historic Kaleici area, next to one of Antalya's most attractive parks. Offering convenient accommodation, a swimming pool and cosy restaurant facilities, the hotel is surrounded by narrow streets, ancient houses, inviting restaurants and shops. Situated next to a park, offering stunning views of the Toros Mountain and sea, along with the famous marina where you can take boat trips along the coast.

name: Liberty Hotels Lara
address: Kemeragzi Mevkii, Antalya 07100
description: With a private beach on the Mediterranean Sea, Liberty Hotels Lara offers an expansive pool area with palms and water slides. It offers bright rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and free WiFi. All rooms have a private bathroom. Some rooms also offer a balcony with sea views. Liberty Hotels Lara’s main restaurant offers world cuisine and poolside dining opportunities. Modern Turkish cuisine, an Italian restaurant and an original Yoruk tent serving custom-made pizzas complete the offer. Leisure activities include 2 tennis courts with a sea view, a fully equipped fitness centre and a beach volleyball court. Children can splash around in the shallow pool, enjoy a ride on the water slides or join the several activities of the kids club. For relaxation, the Liberty Hotels Lara’s spa includes a Finnish sauna, a mosaic hammam, and massage therapies. A corner of the outdoor pool is dedicated to adults, to read and relax in peace. Antalya Airport is 14.7 km from Liberty Hotels Lara.

name: Rixos Sungate
address: Göynük Mah. Baş Komutan Atatürk Cad. No:153-1/1 Kemer, Antalya,Türkiye, Antalya 07985
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Beldibi, Rixos Sungate Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. 24-hour room service, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are there for guest's enjoyment. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, mirror, slippers, separate living room. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site), before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Rixos Sungate Hotel.priceline.com

name: Stile Suite Family Hotel
address: Kuskavagi Mah. 526.Sokak No:18, Antalya 07070
description: Boasting a seasonal outdoor pool, Stile Suite Family Hotel in Antalya features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, garden views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and a private bathroom with bath and slippers. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also available, as well as a kettle. Stile Suite Family Hotel provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. A outdoor play equipment is also available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. 5M Migros is 2.2 km from Stile Suite Family Hotel, while Antalya Aquarium is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya, 16 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Kont Pension
address: Barbaros Mah. Kandiller Geçidi No:12 Muratpaşa, Antalya 07100
description: Located in Kaleici area, Kont Pension offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is just 500 metres from Mermerli Beach and 600 metres from Kaleici Marina. Lara Beach is 10 km away. Elegantly decorated, the rooms of Kont Pension include satellite TV and a wardrobe. They all have a bathroom with a toilet, shower and free toiletries. The day starts with a Turkish style breakfast. You can enjoy your breakfast in the garden. Konyaalti Beach is 3 km from the pension. Antalya Airport is 15 km away.

name: Sealife Kemer Resort Hotel
address: Yenimahalle Ataturk Bl., No:44, Antalya 07980
description: A stay at Sealife Kemer Resort Hotel places you in the heart of Kemer, within a 5-minute drive of Kemer Merkez Bati Public Beach and Liman Street. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Castle Old Town
address: Kilinçarslan M. Tabakhane Sokak, No 7 Kaleiçi, Antalya 07100
description: Located 200 metres from Mermerli Beach, Castle Old Town is located in Kaleici, the historical centre of Antalya. It offers an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by a garden, a terrace restaurant and air-conditioned rooms. Designed elegantly, the accommodation at Castle Old Town is furnished with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Each unit offers garden views. The private bathrooms come with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Daily breakfast is served buffet style. The à la carte restaurant and café offers other meals in the garden and on the terrace. Broken Minaret is 350 metres away and Hadrian’s Gate is 750 metres away. 24-hour front desk arranges airport shuttle services to Antalya Airport, 13 km away, for an additional fee.

name: Aspen Hotel - Special Class
address: Kiliçaslan Mah. Mermerli Sk. No:25, Antalya 7110
description: Situated just 200 metres from Mermerli Beach, the Aspen offers a courtyard pool and a terrace café with fireplace. The warmly decorated rooms have a modern, Turkish décor. Aspen's rooms and suites are surrounded by gardens and include an LCD TV, air conditioning, a safe and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites feature views of the Kaleici Marina and the Taurus Mountains. Guests can make use of Aspen Hotel Kaleiçi’s sauna. The courtyard with its beach umbrellas and cushions offers a relaxing setting for a lazy afternoon by the pool. A variety of alcoholic drinks and exotic cocktails are served at Aspen’s American Bar and pool bar. Guests can choose to dine beside the pool or in the hotel’s air-conditioned restaurant with its arched windows. Aspen Hotel Kaleiçi is situated less than 200 metres from Antalya’s marina. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange a shuttle service to Antalya International Airport, a 20-minute drive away. Free parking is provided.

name: Swandor Hotels & Resorts Topkapi Palace
address: Kundu Mah. Yaşar Sabutay Bulvarı. No:442, Kundu Koyu, Aksu, Antalya 07110
description: Situated on Lara Beach in Kundu, this hotel offers indoor and outdoor pools and a hammam. It features free public Wi-Fi and rooms with minibars and satellite TV. Fully renovated and refurbished in April 2019, all air-conditioned rooms and suites at Swandor Hotels Resorts Topkapi Palace include a safe, telephone, and a private bathroom with bathtub and hairdryer. Rooms for disabled guests are also available. International and Turkish cuisine is offered at restaurants Safir and Hanedan. Swandor Hotels Resorts Topkapi Palace offers a fitness centre and sport facilities including basketball, mini football and beach volleyball. Massage services and a children’s playground are also available. Tennis courts and tennis equipment are offered at a surcharge. In the nighttime, the hotel's amphitheater provides live shows. Music, dance and drinks can be enjoyed at Sultan Ahmet Square. Surrounding offers various options for entertainment. Swandor Hotels Resorts Topkapi Palace is 20 km from Antalya Airport. Free on-site private parking is possible.

name: Puding Suite Hotel
address: Barbaros Mah. Mescit Sok. No:25/1, Antalya 07400
description: Set around a secluded courtyard with swimming pool in Antalya’s historic Kaleiçi neighbourhood, Eski Masal Hotel (Former Puding Suite Hotel) offers suites with unique Ottoman décor and spa baths. Clock Tower Square is 200 metres away. The suites’ interior design creatively combines travertine, marble and wood. Each has plenty of seating and comes with satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and free WiFi. Besides a spa bath, the lavish marble bathroom includes a hairdryer. Breakfast made with organic products is served in the dining room with fireplace or on the charming courtyard. Eski Masal Hotel (Former Puding Suite Hotel) is just a 5-minute walk from Mermer Beach and marina.

name: Lucky Monkey Hotel
description: Featuring a terrace, bar and views of city, Lucky Monkey Hotel is located in Antalya, 1 km from Movida Beach. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a garden, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with sea views. At Lucky Monkey Hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or Full English/Irish breakfast. Lucky Monkey Hotel also features a wellness area, where guests can make the most of facilities like a hammam. The area is popular for snorkelling, and car hire is available at the hotel. Blanche Beach is 2.9 km from Lucky Monkey Hotel, while Hadrian's Gate is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: DoubleTree By Hilton Antalya City Centre
address: Adnan Menderes Bulvari No 61 Etiler, Antalya 07010
description: Welcome to DoubleTree by Hilton Antalya City Centre. Ideally located in the heart of this picturesque city, our brand new hotel is just 10 minutes’ walk from the historical old town, Kaleiçi and just 10 minutes by bus from the beautiful Konyaalti beach. We are also just minutes from MarkAntalya shopping center and Antalya Airport. Savor a DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie upon arrival and settle into your modern guest room or suite. Each stylish room features local design elements and contemporary amenities including a Smart HDTV, WiFi access and a Sweet Dreams® bed. Upgrade to our unique 114 sq. meter Presidential Suite for a touch of luxury. Our onsite restaurant, Sage is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner daily, serving delicious Turkish and International specialties. Enjoy cocktails and fresh pizzas by the rooftop pool at Gao Club or visit the Ocean Bar, open 24-hours. Maintain your workout routine in the fitness center or simply unwind at the Buta Spa and indoor pool. The hotel also features an elegant ballroom, ideal for meetings and events with up to 500 guests.Hilton

name: Limak Lara De Luxe Hotel
address: Kemeragzi Mevkii P.K. 34 Lara, Antalya 07034
description: This luxurious 5-star hotel is located in the coastal resort of Lara. It features 4 à la carte restaurants and an expansive spa. All guests are offered special benefits such as complimentary fruit basket and a bottle of wine upon arrival, free ironing service, special offers at SPA and restaurants. The spa at the Limak Lara features a Turkish/steam bath, indoor pools and a hot tub. A range of relaxation therapies are also available, including full-body massages, facials and pedicures. The air-conditioned rooms at the Limak Lara Deluxe Hotel & Resort Antalya have modern furnishings with Turkish influences. They include a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a hot tub and terrace with sea views. Guests will find a complimentary fruit basket in the room upon arrival. Guests can enjoy various international cuisines at the onsite restaurants, including Indian, Thai, Japanese, Italian, Mexican and Turkish. Meals can be enjoyed indoors as well as al fresco. The De Luxe Hotel is only a 10-minute drive from the Antalya city centre and offers free private parking.

name: Lara Barut Collection
address: Güzeloba Mah., Yasar Sobutay Mah. No:30, Antalya 07100
description: This beachfront hotel in Antalya features 8 à la carte restaurants and spa with Turkish bath. Just 10 km from Antalya Airport, it offers kids' club facilities, indoor and outdoor pools with water slides. Guests can enjoy the adults-only beaches. The large rooms at Lara Barut Collection include spacious balconies with tables and chairs. Each room has a seating area equipped with an LCD TV, DVD player (on request) and minibar. The hotel has a turn-down service in order to offer the utmost comfort to their guests. Guests can relax at the Tuva Eurasian Spa & Thalasso Center, which has spa facilities, saunas and a beauty centre. For the active ones, there are also tennis and squash courts, gym, mini golf and a water sports centre. The Lara Barut Collection restaurants serve rich international and local cuisine, both indoors and al fresco. Vegan, lactose-free and gluten-free menu is available. There is also a patisserie serving sweet delicacies and 5 bars for drinks. Entertainment shows are organised by Lara Barut Collection animation team and live music can be enjoyed in the evenings at the on-site nightclub.

name: Holiday Inn Antalya - Lara
address: Lara Guzeloba 2290, Sk Muratpasa, Antalya 81657
description: A contemporary Antalya hotel offering free WiFi, an outdoor pool, a seaview terrace bar and a spa Holiday Inn® Antalya - Lara hotel places you just a 15 minute walk from sandy Lara Beach. A 15-minute drive from the hotel takes you to the international brand name stores and restaurants of TerraCity Shopping Centre. Beach Area, 15 minutes’ drive away, and free parking is also available.A 30-minute drive from the hotel, the winding streets of Kaleiçi Old Town are home to Roman ruins and ancient city gates.The nearby Antalya Museum tells the city’s history through displays of archaeological artefacts, including Byzantine mosaics. Just 10 minutes drive from the hotel, the impressive Düden Waterfalls, surrounded by a leafy park, cascade down cliffs into the Mediterranean Sea.Business guests can host events for up to 120 delegates in the hotel's three flexible meeting spaces. They both come equipped with state-of-the-art AV equipment to ensure presentations go well. And there's free WiFi throughout the hotel.You can swim in the outdoor pool, work out in the fully equipped fitness centre, or relax over drinks on the seaview terrace bar, before dining on international cuisine in the open lobby restaurant. Unwind with a steam bath, sauna or massage in the spa, or enjoy a night in with 24-hour room service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Sealife Lounge - Adult only
address: Arapsuyu Mah 7. Cadde No1 Konyaalt, Antalya 07050
description: Located 300 metres from Konyaalti’s nightlife, Sealife Lounge has a garden and an outdoor pool with free parasols and sun loungers as well as towels. Free Wi-Fi and free public parking are also available. Accommodations of Sealife Lounge come with a balcony, seating area, flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. A 24-hour reception provides room service and currency exchange. Car rentals and shuttle services are available. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services are also possible at an extra charge. Breakfast is served buffet style. The hotel has a restaurant with both indoor and outdoor dining areas and a pool bar. Sandy beaches of Konyaalti are 350 metres from Sealife Lounge, and Antalya’s city centre is 7 km away. Shuttle services to Antalya Airport, which is 20 km away, are arranged at a surcharge.

name: Akra Hotel
address: Lara Yolu, Antalya 07100
description: Located on the seafront, this 5-star hotel is set in the city centre where you can enjoy the lively streets of the city accompanied by the calm and warm atmosphere of the Mediterranean landscape. Balconies with views of the Mediterranean or the Taurus Mountains are featured in all Akra’s rooms. The contemporary-style rooms include flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and free WiFi. Akra Hotel features multiple restaurants and bars. Pablito Bistro serves selective dishes from Turkish and international cuisines. It serves variety of dishes to indulge yourself including seafood, freshly-made breads, pizzas, grilled dishes and pastas. Organic food and a range of snacks are available. Featuring views of stupendous Bey Mountains, the Mediterranean Sea and the city, Asmani Restaurant is located on the 10th floor of the hotel. The wellness centre includes sauna, Turkish bath and a range of massages. Guests can train at the well-equipped gym, or play some tennis on the resort’s courts. Akra Hotel is situated 3 km from Terracity Mall and the old town area with many cafés and bars. Antalya International Airport is about 15 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: Kartal Hotel
address: Arapsuyu Mahallesi 639 Sok. No: 6 Konyaaltı, Antalya 07070
description: Located 200 metres from Konyaalti Beach, Kartal Hotel features a garden and an outdoor pool offering free parasols and sun loungers. Free Wi-Fi access is available in air-conditioned rooms, and free private parking is possible as well. All rooms at Hotel Kartal come with satellite TV and a balcony with pool views. The private bathroom includes a shower, slippers and free toiletries. A 24-hour front desk provides room service and currency exchange. Laundry, ironing and trouser press services are possible upon request. Airport shuttle services can also be arranged at a surcharge. Daily breakfast is served in buffet style. The accommodation also provides a variety of non-alcoholic drinks. Antalya city centre is 7 km, and Antalya Airport is 22 km from the premises. Shopping districts are within 2 km.

name: Catamaran Quality Times
address: Göynük Mah. Baskomutan Atatürk Cad. 99, Göynük
description: Boasting panoramic views of the green Beydaglari Mountains and the turquoise Mediterranean Sea, this seaside resort offers an aqua park with water slides, a tennis court, mini-golf course, sauna and a hammam. The beach area is equipped with a jetty and sun loungers where you can enjoy your day by the sea. The air-conditioned rooms of Catamaran Quality Times are decorated with wooden furniture and carpeted floors. All rooms have a private balcony, satellite TV, safe box and a minibar. Some rooms have a seating area. Catamaran Resort’s entertainment staff organises live music and dance, pool games and Turkish theme nights. Children can have fun at the kids club. Free Wi-Fi is available in the hotel’s public areas. Guests can enjoy authentic Turkish dishes at the Pasa Restaurant, which has panoramic views of the beach. The Alesta Snack Bar and Restaurant offers light meals, snacks, and cocktails. Kemer is 15 km from Catamaran Quality Times, and Antalya’s city centre is 20 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Sealife Family Resort Hotel
address: Konyaalti Sahil Seridi Antalya 7070 TR, Antalya 07050
description: Sealife Family Resort Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Antalya, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. All the necessary facilities, including 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, convenience store, daily housekeeping, are at hand. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, carpeting, mirror, internet access wireless. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Sealife Family Resort Hotel.priceline.com

name: Aspendos Suites
address: Altinkum Mah 413 Sk No 10 Konyaalti, Antalya 07070
description: Offering an outdoor pool and views of the sea, Aspendos Suites is set in Antalya, 300 metres from the beach and 2.4 km from Antalya Aquarium. ANTALYA AQUALAND is 3 km from the property. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All units are air conditioned and feature a satellite flat-screen TV. Some units include a dining area and/or terrace. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a microwave. A refrigerator and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. Each unit is equipped with a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Towels are provided. Aspendos Suites also includes a year-round outdoor pool. The property also offers grocery delivery. 5M Migros is 3.2 km from Aspendos Suites, while Antalya Museum is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Lara Otel
address: Güzeloba Mah. Lara Cad. No:142, Antalya
description: Lara Otel features an outdoor pool set on a cliff-top and featuring panoramic sea views. Located 5 minutes’ drive from Lara beach, the hotel offers a sauna and Turkish bath. All rooms have a simple interior and are fitted with air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Each one has sliding glass doors opening onto balcony which boasts scenic sea views. At Lara Otel’s à la carte restaurant, guests can order Turkish delicacies such as mezze or try some of the international cuisine. Turkish tea, coffee and cold beverages are also available. Historic Antalya and Kaleiçi is 6 km from Lara Otel. Car rentals can be arranged at the front desk and free parking is available on site.

name: Fame Residence Lara & Spa
address: Kemeragzi Mevkii Lara, Antalya
description: Located on the Mediterranean coast, this seafront hotel offers a private blue flag beach, spa centre and a large outdoor pool with water slides. The hotel features luxurious interiors, modern rooms and free Wi-Fi in public areas. All rooms of Fame Residence Lara & Spa are air-conditioned and decorated in soft colours to provide a comfortable accommodation. Some rooms offer beautiful views of the Mediterranean Sea. Meals are served at the elegant restaurants of Fame Residence and can be enjoyed both indoors and outdoors. Guests can taste Italian and Chinese cuisine as well as Turkish cuisine. Delicious drinks are provided by the hotel’s bars. The spa centre includes a Turkish bath, sauna and massage rooms where guests can have aromatherapy massages and masks. There is also an on-site football field, tennis court and a fitness centre for sporty guests. Little ones can have fun in the children's playground and kids' pool. Antalya city centre is within 20 km. Antalya Airport is a 10-minute drive from Fame Residence Lara & Spa.

name: Tamara Business Antalya Hotel
address: 466. Sk. 4, Antalya 07100
description: Well set in the centre of Antalya, TAMARA Business Otel provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a fitness centre, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation offers a shared lounge, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. All units include a wardrobe. Breakfast is available daily, and includes vegetarian, vegan and halal options. Popular points of interest near TAMARA Business Otel include Mermerli Beach, Hadrian's Gate and Antalya Clock Tower. The nearest airport is Antalya, 8 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Nfk The House Hotel
address: Altinkum Mah 427 Sok No 23, Antalya 07070
description: Offering an outdoor pool, NFK The House Hotel is located in Antalya and only 500 metres to the beach. The hotel has a sun terrace and views of the garden, and guests can enjoy a drink at on-site bar. NFK The House Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Air-conditioned rooms of NFK The House Hotel include a French balcony. Pool view is offered in certain rooms. Private bathrooms come with a shower and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Luggage storage is also available at NFK The House Hotel. Antalya Aquarium is 2 km from NFK The House Hotel, while ANTALYA AQUALAND is 2.6 km from the property. The centre of Antalya is 8 km away with many shops, bars and restaurants. Hadrian's Gate is 9 km away while Kemer is 36 km from the property. Camyuva is 42 km and Tekirova is 52 km. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 21 km from the property.

name: Best Western Plus Khan Hotel
address: Kazim Ozalp Cad. No.55 Antalya, Antalya 07040
description: Experience breathtaking views of the Mediterranean Sea at this Antalya, Turkey hotel, close to many historical sites and beautiful waterfalls. The Best Western Plus Khan Hotel is located in the Antalya, Turkey city center, only a short distance from Antalya International Airport. A short walk from this completely renovated hotel, guests will find themselves in historic Old Antalya, surrounded by modern businesses and eclectic shopping opportunities. Come experience historical Antalya Castle and other ancient architecture that intermingle with Antalya's modern buildings. Nearby Konyaalti Beach offers guests resort-style attractions and breathtaking sunny shores. Outdoor activities nearby include white water rafting, winter sports, hiking stunning waterfalls, and exploring archeological ruins. Our Mediterranean Sea hotel offers guests the most comfortable of accommodations. Our cheerful, reliable staff will ensure the newly remodeled rooms and amenities please guests of all ages. Relax and unwind by our outdoor pool and sundeck, or spend time in our on-site game room. Our rooms offer all the comforts of home, including cable television and telephone. Come experience the beauty of Antalya, Turkey, and the Mediterranean region at the Best Western Plus Khan Hotel. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Rixos Beldibi
address: Göynük Mahallesi, Baskomutan Atatürk Caddesi No:67, Beldibi Mevkii, Kemer, Antalya, Göynük 07985
description: Rixos Beldibi has an enviable position nestled in spectacular greenery and offering stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea. The coastal town of Beldibi is smaller than many on the Turkish Riviera, reflected in the more intimate setting at Rixos Beldibi. Known as the Turquoise coast, the clear warm waters and rugged scenery create a splendid backdrop for the resort and all it has to offer.accorhotels.com

name: Nasa Flora Hotel
address: Sirin Yali Mah. Lara Cad No:245, Antalya 7100
description: This hotel, located a 2-minute walk from Antalya’s coast and the Mediterranean Sea, provides luxurious amenities including an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Guestrooms are air-conditioned and have a balcony, offering coastal or Antalya views. The minibar is stocked with snacks and refreshments while Nasa Flora Otel also offers room service. For information about city excursions, guests can ask at Nasa Flora Otel’s tour desk. A car rental service is offered for those who wish to travel further and the hotel provides free public parking on-site. A wide range of local and international dishes are served à la carte or in a buffet style at Otel Nasa Flora’s restaurant. After dinner, drinks and snacks served at the bar can be enjoyed on the terrace.

name: Crystal Centro Resort
address: Kundu Mevkii, Antalya 07230
description: Set in Antalya and presenting unique views of Lara Beach Park, Kervansaray Kundu Hotel provides 5-star accommodation, as well as a sauna, a private beach and an outdoor pool. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a Turkish steam bath and water slides. The resort has a gym with a swimming pool. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room designs and services for families of any size, plus a kids club and a kids pool. The elegant rooms at Kervansaray Kundu Hotel include wireless internet access and a mini bar. There are also several rooms geared towards families. Kervansaray Kundu Hotel houses a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind of an evening. Breakfast is available daily and can be savored in the comfort of the rooms. Antalya Airport is less than a 35-minute drive from Kervansaray Kundu Hotel. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Antalya.HotelsCombined

name: Ic Hotels Airport
address: Guzelyurt Mevkii / Havaalani Yolu, Antalya 07980
description: IC Hotels Airport is just 800 metres from Antalya Airport. Hotel is designed with every single detail for you to have a peaceful, comfortable stay in a warm environment. All the rooms are decorated with wooden furniture, carpeted floors. Air conditioned rooms also have a work desk, a minibar, satellite LED TV and a bathroom. Free WiFi is also available in all units of the hotel. Guests can enjoy local Turkish dishes as well as international cuisine at Bristol Restaurant. The Last Call Bar offers a variety of refreshing drinks and delicious snacks. IC Hotels Airport offers sports activities, skin and body care services, and massage under the supervision of our professional staff expert in their areas. And also offers a squash court, a fitness centre, a hammam, a sauna and a 681 m² outdoor pool and 252 m² heated indoor pool. Guests can held all kinds of meetings from small gatherings to international seminars, from business meetings to organizations in special meeting rooms. Antalya city centre is 11 km from IC Hotels Airport, and Lara Beach is only 12 km away. Free private parking is available on site. The Hotel also offers free shuttle service to Antalya Airport.

name: Champion Holiday Village
address: Göynük Mh. Başkomutan, Atatürk Cd. No:145-1/1, Göynük 07985
description: Located right on the shores of the Mediterrenean Sea, this resort has an outdoor pool, spa facilities and a private beach area. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV. All rooms at Champion Holiday Village come with a balcony. A private bathroom with hairdryer is standard. Some family rooms include interconnecting rooms. You can find bread and soup buffet, pita-pizza oven, hot meals as well as cold salad bar, fruit and dessert buffet at the main restaurant. The à la carte restaurants serve seafood and Turkish dishes. Spa facilities include a Turkish bath, sauna and fitness room; massage services can also be provided. You can play a game of tennis, table tennis and billiards on site. There is also a mini club for children at Holiday Village Champion. Only 30 km to the Antalya city centre, Champion Holiday Village is 15 km to Kemer town centre. Antalya Airport is 40 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Villa Citronella Boutique Hotel
address: Selcuk Mah, Mektep Sokak, Antalya 07100
description: Villa Citronella Boutique Hotel has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Antalya. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. The rooms come with air conditioning, and some units at the hotel have a terrace. At Villa Citronella Boutique Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Villa Citronella Boutique Hotel include Mermerli Beach, Old City Marina and Antalya Clock Tower. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Yelken Apart Hotel
address: Kuskavagi Mah. 543. Sk. No:3, Antalya 07070
