The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, sea views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and slippers. A fridge, a stovetop and minibar are also offered, as well as a kettle. YELKEN APART HOTEL offers a picnic area. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Guests can also relax in the garden, beside the outdoor swimming pool, on the sun terrace, or in the shared lounge area. Antalya Aquarium is 1.7 km from YELKEN APART HOTEL, while Antalya Aqualand is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya, 16 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hadrian Gate Hotel
address: Barbaros Mh Hesapçi Sokak No:8, Antalya 07030
description: Hadrian Gate Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Antalya. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Hadrian Gate Hotel. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, carpeting, children's high chair, cleaning products. Take a break from a long day and make use of dart board, outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden. For reliable service and professional staff, Hadrian Gate Hotel caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Elips Royal Hotel & Spa
address: Etiler Mah. 851 Sk. No: 2, Antalya 7000
description: Offering spa facilities, an indoor pool, Elips Royal Hotel & SPA is situated 2.4 km from the seaside. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a TV. Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Elips Royal Hotel & SPA features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Hadrian's Gate is 2.2 km from Elips Royal Hotel & SPA. Antalya Airport is 14 km from the property.

name: Concorde De Luxe Resort
address: Kemeragzi Site Mh. Tesisler Cad. 358/1, Antalya 07230
description: Situated on Lara Beach, this spa resort boasts an elegant landscaped pool area with palm trees and waterslides. It offers air-conditioned guestrooms with balconies and panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea. Rooms at the Concorde De Luxe Resort - Prive Ultra All Inclusive are spacious and have modern furnishings. They come equipped with satellite TV, free Wi-Fi, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The De Luxe Resort boasts 7 restaurants and bars. Da Vinci offers Italian dishes with an à la carte menu. The Concorde has a steakhouse, Havana Bar and a beach bar with sun loungers and sea views. Guests can relax on the private beach or play a game of tennis on the flood-lit court. The resort’s spa offers massages and body treatments. There is also an indoor pool and a games room with a bowling alley and billiards. The Concorde De Luxe Resort - Prive Ultra All Inclusive is located 10 km from Antalya Airport and offers 24-hour front desk service and free public parking is possible on site.

name: Afsin Hotel
address: Konyaalti Arapsuyu Mevkii 6 23, Antalya 07070
description: Afsin, situated less than a 10-minute walk from Konyaalti Beach, offers rooms with balconies and free Wi-Fi. It features a terrace with an outdoor swimming pool and sun loungers. Each of the air-conditioned rooms at Afsin Hotel has a TV. Hotel Afsin is a 15-minute walk from the Miniature Culture Park. The centre of Antalya is just over 5 km from the hotel. Antalya Airport is 35 minutes away by car. The hotel has free private on-site parking. It offers a car rental service and an airport shuttle is available upon request. The restaurant offers international cuisine and Turkish specialities both inside and on the terrace.

name: Frankfurt Hotel
address: Hidirlik Sokak 17, Antalya 07100
description: Centrally located in the old town of Kaleici, Hotel Frankfurt is only a short walk to Mermerli Beach. It offers an outdoor pool and a roof terrace with view of Taurus Mountains and Mediterranean Sea. The rooms at Frankfurt are equipped with wooden furniture, ceramic tiles, and include air conditioning, and bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Frankfurt Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and courtyard. Guests can relax in a tranquil roof terrace and enjoy views of the sea and the old town. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Atatürk Street (Palm Tree Street) where guests can visit Hadrian’s Gate, the ancient passage to Kaleici. Only 1 km away from Aypo Shopping Centre, Hotel Frankfurt is 12 km from Antalya Airport. Yacht Marina is only 300 metres away.

name: Wise Hotel & Spa - Adults Only
address: Sirinyali Mah.1512 Sok No 6, Antalya 07160
description: Set in Antalya in the Mediterranean Region Turkey Region, 5 km from Broken Minaret, Wise Hotel & Spa boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Wise Hotel & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Hadrian's Gate is 5 km from Wise Hotel & Spa, while Marina is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 15 km from Wise Hotel & Spa.

name: The Corner Park Hotel
address: Arapsuyu Mahallesi, Akdeniz Bulvarı, 603. Sokak, No:2 Konyaalti, Antalya 07070
description: Just 50 metres from Konyaalti Beach, this hotel offers spacious rooms with a balcony and a restaurant with views of the Mediterranean. The outdoor pool has an adjoining terrace. With free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom, The Corner Park Hotel features modern rooms with wooden parquet floors and a mix of beige and brown colours. All rooms have a satellite LCD TV and a minibar. Guests can enjoy their meals in the restaurant, or admire the water views from the large outdoor terrace. There is also a snack bar and pool bar for refreshing drinks and bites. The Corner Park is located 20 km away from Antalya Airport. With free parking, the Migros Shopping Mall is 1 km away.

name: Adonis Hotel
address: Eski Lara Yolu Uzeri, Lara, Antalya 07100
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool with waterslides and guest rooms with a private balcony, the Adonis Hotel is located on the Antalya seafront overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Fully renovated in 2019, all rooms at Antalya Adonis Hotel are decorated with framed artwork and wooden furniture. There is a TV and a tiled en suite bathroom in every room. WiFi is available for an additional fee. The Adonis Hotel’s restaurant serves Turkish and International cuisine, with indoor and outdoor dining options available. The bars and clubs of central Antalya are just 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel. A staircase in the cliffs provides access to the Adonis Hotel’s private swimming platform and sun terrace. There is also an indoor pool and a games room with darts and billiards. Antalya Adonis Hotel is 20 minutes’ drive from Antalya International Airport. Free on-site car parking is available.

name: Golden Orange Hotel
address: Gürsu Mahallesi 304 Sokak No. 52, Antalya 07070
description: Located in Antalya, 3 km from Antalya Aquarium, Golden Orange Hotel provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The property is situated 3.6 km from Antalya Aqualand. The property offers free private parking and free WiFi. Famous Blue Flag Konyaalti Beach is just 120 meters from the property. You can enjoy the on-site cafe & bistro at Golden Orange Hotel. At the hotel, rooms come with a wardrobe. The rooms include a private bathroom with a bath or shower, while some rooms here will provide you with sea views. At Golden Orange Hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning and a 32'' HD LCD TV. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. The reception can offer helpful tips for getting around the area. You can also find various cafés, restaurants and shops in the surrounding area. 5M Migros is 3.8 km from Golden Orange Hotel, while Antalya Museum is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 16 km from the property.

name: Golden World Suite Hotel
address: 257. Sk. 3, Antalya 07130
description: Located in Antalya, 2.7 km from Konyaalti Beach and 7.1 km from 5M Migros, Golden World Suite Hotel provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a bar. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and slippers. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a kettle. Golden World Suite Hotel offers a spa facilities. A car rental service is available at the accommodation, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Antalya Aquarium is 8.1 km from Golden World Suite Hotel, while Antalya Aqualand is 8.8 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 21 km from the aparthotel.

name: Hotel Su & Aqualand
address: Meltem Mah., Dumlupinar Bulvar No:205, Antalya 07050
description: Set in an immaculate white building on Konyaalti Beach, Hotel SU & Aqualand offers modern minimalist design and an extensive spa. It features an outdoor pool and 5 dining outlets. All rooms and suites at Hotel SU & Aqualand feature trendy interiors and mood lighting. Each has a private balcony with a sofa and central heating/cooling system. Special treats and complimentary toiletries are offered for each guest. Guests have access to the outdoor pool surrounded with ample sun beds and parasols. Sports-minded guests can make use of the well-appointed gym, or the tennis courts. The beach is a local beach and our guests can use the sunbeds, umbrellas and towels free of charge. For relaxation, there is a full spa with a Turkish bath, sauna and massage rooms. Hotel SU & Aqualand also features an on-site hairdresser and shopping arcade. Dining choices range from Mediterranean to Japanese and international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy snacks and drinks at the pool restaurant and the beach bar. SU Hotel is located 1.5 km from the city centre and a 20-minute drive from Antalya International Airport. Antalya Arena Stadium is 2.1 km from the property. From October 15, Aqualand is closed. 2024 Summer season opening date is subject to change depending on weather conditions.

name: Paloma Foresta
address: Ciftecesmeler Mah Ataturk Cad No 143, Göynük 07985
description: Nestled in quiet woodland along the Mediterranean, this 5-star resort boasts a private stretch of sandy beach in Beldibi. It features a luxurious spa offering paraffin treatments and therapy baths. There are also 3 outdoor pools, 1 indoor pool and an aqua park with 3 slides. Paloma Foresta offers richly decorated rooms with private balconies and satellite TV. Bedcovers with brocade patterns, thick curtains and marble bathrooms give an elegant touch to the rooms. With a choice of 7 restaurants, guests can enjoy organic wine, outdoor dining on the panoramic terrace, and a range of cuisines made from locally sourced ingredients. Paloma Foresta has a 24-hour bar, an Irish Pub, and a disco. The Harmonia Spa offers professional massages and beauty treatments. Guests can visit the gym or enjoy a game of tennis on the floodlit court. Beach volleyball, basketball, mini golf and many other games and sports are available. There is also a games room with billiards and darts. Antalya city centre is 30 km away while Antalya Airport is 42 km from the property.

name: Leaf Port Hotel
address: Liman Mahallesi Akdeniz Blv., No. 268, Antalya 07100
description: Located in Antalya, less than 1 km from Konyaalti Beach, Leaf Port Hotel provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Providing a bar, the property is located within 6 km of 5M Migros. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Leaf Port Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a seating area. All rooms include a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Antalya Aquarium is 6.9 km from the accommodation, while Antalya Aqualand is 7.6 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 19 km from Leaf Port Hotel.

name: Laren Sea Side Hotel Spa
address: Çaglayan Mahallesi 2069 Sokak, Antalya 07230
description: Set in Antalya, Laren Sea Side Hotel Spa features a shared lounge, terrace, bar, and free WiFi throughout the property. Conveniently located in the Eski Lara district, this hotel offers a private beach area, as well as a hammam. The property has a year-round outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All rooms have a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also offer a patio and others also have city views. At the hotel all rooms include bed linen and towels. Laren Sea Side Hotel Spa offers a continental or halal breakfast. You can play darts at the accommodation, and bike hire is available. Speaking English, Russian and Turkish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Hadrian's Gate is 10 km from Laren Sea Side Hotel Spa, while Antalya Clock Tower is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya, 4 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Bello Hotel Resort & Spa
address: Akdeniz Bulvari 1. Sk. Konyaalti, Antalya 07100
description: This luxurious 5-star resort is located on Konyaaltı Beach and near the bustling centre of Antalya. It has an outdoor swimming pool, tennis courts and a modern spa. The guest rooms at the Porto Bello Resort & Spa include a balcony, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a seating area. All rooms have a minibar. Guests of Porto Bello can enjoy a range of international cuisine at the hotel’s restaurants. Meals are served indoors or outdoors, and can be enjoyed with a glass of local wine. Relaxation options at the Porto Bello include a sauna, a hot tub and massage services. The outdoor swimming pool is surrounded by palm trees, and there is also a modern gym featuring state-of-the-art cardiovascular equipment. The Porto Spa is located at the foot of the Beydağları Mountains, 22 km from Antalya International Airport.

name: Onkel Resort Hotel
address: Goynuk Mah Baskomutan Ataturk Cad No 171 Beldibi, Kemer 07070
description: Visit Antalya, Turkey and the Turkish Riviera, and stay at the Ramada Resort Kemer. This idyllic setting across from the beach offers an excellent opportunity to refresh your spirit on-site, or throughout this tranquil resort destination. Enjoy the fitness center, outdoor pool and sundeck, restaurant providing 24-hour room service, and conference hall suitable for up to 120 people. Guest rooms are equipped with mini bar featuring soft drinks, water, mineral water and domestic beer. Additionally, this facility provides complimentary continental breakfast and complimentary wireless Internet access. Sorry, no pets and no smoking allowed.priceline.com

name: Sherwood Exclusive Lara
address: Kopak Cayı mevkii - Kundu, Büyükkumluca 07110
description: This luxurious resort is located on the seafront and it offers a private sandy beach with a dock. The property includes outdoor pools, water slides, sauna and a Turkish bath. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Sherwood Exclusive Lara has bright rooms with central air conditioning, a TV with satellite channels and a minibar. All rooms include a balcony. The hotel offers ultra all-inclusive service including meals at all its 5 restaurants and selected beverages. You can enjoy Turkish or Italian specialties in the à la carte restaurants as well as cookies at patisserie. The bars serve a variety of drinks during the day. There are 2 outdoor tennis courts, and a fitness centre with cardio equipment and free weights on site. A heated outdoor pool is available on site. Antalya city centre is 18 km from Sherwood. Antalya Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Zeynel Hotel
address: Arapsuyu Mah 610 Sok no 9, Antalya 07070
description: Zeynel Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Antalya. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features a sauna and room service. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a TV with satellite channels. The rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature city views. At Zeynel Hotel rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a halal breakfast. At Zeynel Hotel guests are welcome to take advantage of a Turkish bath. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English, Russian and Turkish. Popular points of interest near the hotel include 5M Migros, Antalya Aquarium and Antalya Aqualand. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 15 km from Zeynel Hotel.

name: Der Inn Hotel Lara
address: Sirinyali Mh. Ismet Gokcen Cd. Yamaklar Apt. No:47, 0, Antalya 07160
description: No description found

name: Latanya Palm & Spa Hotel Antalya
address: Meydan Kavagi Mah. Aspendos Blv. No 36, Antalya 07100
description: Offering an indoor and outdoor pool, Latanya Palm & SPA Hotel Antalya is located 19.4 km from Antalya Airport. Spa, wellness centre and hammam are available for the guests to enjoy. Property also offers on-site free parking. All rooms feature flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning. Minibar and safety box are also included in rooms. Bathrooms come with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Latanya Palm Hotel offers an on-site restaurant and bar. Snack bar is also available at the property. There are several restaurants within walking distance. Hotel also offers breakfast in room. Property offers a fitness centre. Guests can also get a massage in the spa centre. Car hire is also available at the property. Currency exchange, ticket and 24-hour front desk service are offered in Latanya Palm Hotel. Property is 4 km from old city (Kaleici), 4.3 km from MarkAntalya Shopping Centre. Hotel is also 10 km from ANFAS Expo. There is tram line directly to Antalya Airport.

name: Güden Pearl Apart Hotel
address: Gürsu Mah 329 Sok No 21 Konyaalti, Antalya
description: Boasting a swimming pool, a private beach area, a garden and views of the garden, Güden-Pearl is set in Antalya and offers accommodation with free WiFi. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental, American or halal breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The aparthotel offers a children's playground. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Güden-Pearl, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Konyaalti Beach is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while 5M Migros is 4.4 km from the property. name: The Marmara Antalya
address: Eski Lara Yolu No. 136 Sirinyali, Antalya 07100
description: Located on the famous Falez Hills with sweeping Mediterranean views, the Marmara Antalya offers a private beach on the Turquoise Coast. Apart from the main building, this hotel features a unique revolving annex that rotates 360 degrees throughout the day. Guests can enjoy the revolving building experience by waking up to views of the pool or the Mediterranean Sea each day. A signature fusion of Turkish and international cuisine can be enjoyed at the Marmara Antalya. Organic and locally sourced products are used to create low-calorie meals and tempting afternoon teas. Guests can enjoy a drink while admiring the view on the garden terrace of the bar. The Marmara Antalya’s rooms have a unique décor in pastel colours. They are spacious and bright, and feature extra-large windows overlooking the sea or the Taurus Mountains. Personal trainers organise your training schedule at Marmara Antalya’s fitness centre. A 5-minute drive from Antalya city centre, The Marmara Antalya is about 7 km from Antalya International Airport.

description: Specialised in both traditional and modern health, wellness and beauty therapies, Medworld Health & Wellness Center offers several life-improving programs. Medical consultancy, check-ups, healthy nutrition plans and natural therapies are among are services as well as dental treatments, dermatology aesthetics and hair transplantation. Unlimited access to sauna, steam bath, turkish bath, gym and pools is provided. Guests at the resort can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Tennis, table tennis, darts and cycling are some of the activities you can enjoy at Medworld Health & Rehabilitation Center Rixos Antalya. Tour desk and car rentals are available and the business centre has newspapers. The nearest beach is within 1km while Antalya Aqualand is 1.7km away. The nearest airport is Antalya International Airport, 16km from MEDWORLD Health & Rehabilitation Center Rixos Antalya.

For those who enjoy cycling, the hotel offers a bike rental service.HotelsCombined

A vegetarian, vegan or halal breakfast is available daily at the property. Movida Beach is 1.8 km from Qinn Hotel, while Hadrian's Gate is 6.5 km away. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Alp Pasa Hotel - Special Class
address: Barbaros Mah. Hesapçi Sk. No:30, Antalya 07100
description: Set in a historical Ottoman mansion dating back to the 18'th century, this modernly decorated property is encircled with lush gardens and early buildings. Alp Pasa Hotel - Special Class is centered in Kaleici, Antalya. Featuring a convenient location, property is 850 metres from Kaleici Marina and 400 metres from Mermerli Beach. Famous Hadrian's Gate is only a 3 minute walk away. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Featuring Mediterranean Sea view, each chic room at this property is decorated gracefully. Featuring air conditioning and LCD TV, private bathrooms come with a hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers. Guests will also find a safety box. Certain rooms offer balcony, terrace and an authentic fireplace. Alp Pasa Hotel - Special Class also offers family rooms. The two on-site à la carte restaurants of Alp Pasa Hotel - Special Class has won 2017 World Luxury Restaurant Awards including Regional and Continent Winner Awards. Decorated with the touches of French and Turkish tradition, Du Bastion Fine Dining Restaurant is set under a great stone arch and serves French and Mediterranean delicacies. You can enjoy the fine romantic atmosphere while savouring a wide range of dishes. For guests seeking a more authentic taste, Alp Paşa Restaurant serves Turkish and Ottoman cuisine by a cosy fireplace. In warm weather, you can enjoy your meals by the pool with sweet scents of jasmines. Gazetta Brasserie & Bar serves with its rich Italian menu. You can savour a wide variety of Italian delicacies and enjoy a sip of wine from the wine cellar. Alp Pasa Hotel - Special Class is less than 1 km from Antalya City Museum, and is a 5-minute walk from Mermerli Beach. Hadrian's Gate is 100 metres' walk.

address: Arapsuyu Mah. 636 Sok. No: 3 Konyaalti, Antalya 07100
description: Situated 300 metres from the beaches of the Mediterranean Sea, recently renovated Kafkas offers air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony.There is an outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant serving Turkish cuisine. With free WiFi access, all rooms at The Kafkas come with a TV, minibar and wooden floors. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and overlooks the garden, mountains or Antalya itself. A traditional breakfast with cheese and olives is served by the pool and is available daily in Kafkas’ breakfast lounge. Guests can choose to dine indoors, on the terrace or in their room with 24-hour room service. There are also 2 bars. Antalya Airport is 20 km away from this 24-hour accessible hotel. The hotel also offer free parking and is situated a 10-minute drive from Antalya’s historic quarter.

description: Situated in Antalya's Çağlayan neighbourhood and 13 km from the airport, Address Residence provides fully furnished apartments with free private parking and outdoor pool, close to the sea. Address Residence features modern 1 and 2-bedroom apartments with spacious living areas and fully equipped kitchens. Each apartment is fully air-conditioned and has satellite TV and laundry facilities. The well-presented apartments at Address Residence offer an ideal solution for travellers seeking the comfort and privacy of home along with quality hotel services. Guests can make use of a professional concierge service and an outdoor swimming pool. The world-famous Belek golf course is 40 km away. Car and bike rental is available at Address Residence, allowing guests to explore their unique surroundings. There are plenty of restaurants, shops and leisure activities nearby. Guests have a discount at the contracted Rayen Bistro café, which is 100 metres away.

description: At Maxx Royal Belek Golf Resort, we've created a space where modernity and beauty coexist in perfect harmony. Our design is inspired by the elemental forces of earth, fire, water, and air, seamlessly blending ancient and current influences to create a truly unique ambiance.For golfers, our resort is a paradise, with an exceptional 18-hole course designed by Colin Montgomerie, attracting the biggest names in the sport, such as Tiger Woods and Justin Rose. In addition, the golf club offers illuminated evening play, allowing golfers to enjoy the stunning course even after sunset."At Maxx Royal, we understand that true luxury is about more than just external beauty. That's why our deeply personalized service ensures that every guest receives an experience tailored to their specific needs and desires. We believe in creating extraordinary experiences that not only indulge your senses but also make a positive impact on the world we share.From impeccable service to stunning aesthetics, every cornerstone of our hospitality is infused with a human-centered commitment to excellence. We're proud to weave sustainable practices throughout our resort, ensuring that your stay with us is not only unforgettable but also mindful of the planet we call home.iHotelier/iStay

All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The rooms come with a safety deposit box, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the hotel the rooms include bed linen and towels. Children can join ecological activities such as tree planting and gardening. Along with a special kids restaurant and a playground, creativity activities are available such as origami, cooking classes, handcrafting workshops and puzzle games to keep your kids inspired during your stay at Akka Antedon Hotel - Premium Ultra All Inclusive. Babysitting service can be provided upon your request at a surcharge for your convenience. Baby cots, strollers, baby bathtub, baby monitoring radios and high feeding chairs are offered free of charge. Other baby facilities include bottle warmer and blenders to facilitate your meal preparations. With a seafront location a short drive south of Antalya, Akka Antedon Hotel - Premium Ultra All Inclusive is a luxury resort with a lagoon-style outdoor pool, a tennis court and a lavish spa and fitness centre.

The property has a private beach area only 600 metres away.

The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 60 km from Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum.

Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking resort features a sauna and nightclub. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hammam and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for windsurfing and canoeing. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English and Turkish. Bodrum Municipality Bus Station is 8.4 km from DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Isıl Club Resort, while Bodrum Bar Street is 8.8 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 33 km from the resort.

name: Mirada Exclusive Bodrum
address: Asarlik Mevkii Turkuaz Sk No 8-10 Bodrum, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in Bodrum City, 1.1 km from Bitez Beach, Mirada Exclusive Bodrum provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features an indoor pool, sauna, entertainment staff and a kids' club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mirada Exclusive Bodrum each room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Mirada Exclusive Bodrum offers a terrace. Gumbet Beach is 1.6 km from the hotel, while Mor Plaj is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 45 km from Mirada Exclusive Bodrum.

name: Rammos Hotel
address: Gazi Mustafa Kemal Bulvarı No: 327 B Turgutreis / Bodrum / Muğla, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 700 metres from Fener Beach, Rammos Hotel Bodrum - Special Class features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The hotel has a sauna and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Rammos Hotel Bodrum - Special Class rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, vegetarian or vegan options. The accommodation offers a spa centre. Soytas Beach is 2.5 km from Rammos Hotel Bodrum - Special Class, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 63 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Search Hotels Bodrum
address: Gundogan Mah. 506 SK. Apart Otsl NO:12-A, Bodrum 48440
description: Located in Bodrum City, within 1.3 km of Akkan Beach and 2.1 km of Bardakci Bay Beach, The Search Hotels Bodrum provides accommodation with a garden and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is close to French Tower, Mausoleum of Halikarnassus and Bodrum Bar Street. The property is 70 metres from the city centre and 2.6 km from Gumbet Beach. At the hotel, all rooms have a balcony. At The Search Hotels Bodrum, each room is fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near The Search Hotels Bodrum include Bodrum Castle, Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Caresse, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Bodrum
address: Adnan Menderes Caddesi No: 89, Bodrum 48400
description: Caresse, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa in Bodrum has 84 rooms, including 67 rooms, 9 suites, 6 One-Bedroom Residences, 1 Three-Bedroom Residence and a Caresse King Villa. All rooms offer excellent amenities, such as modern technology and Marriott's Signature Luxury Collection Beds. Every guest at the Caresse Luxury Collection Resort & Spa can experience the captivating view of the Aegean Sea, since each room has its own private terrace or balcony. Luxury extends to a stylish blend of chic furnishings and tasteful bathrooms, that stand as the epitome of lavish comfort. Relax, unwind and allow your senses to fully embrace the unique tranquility of Bodrum. In addition to this luxurious experience, our discreet and attentive guest assistant is always on hand to grant your every wish.Marriott

name: Aspat Butik Hotel - Beach Restaurant
address: Karaincir Caddesi 2/1, Bodrum 48960
description: No description found

name: Viras Hotel
address: Ortakent Yahsi Yali, No. 72, Ortakent Beach, Bodrum, Mugla, Bodrum 48400
description: Just a few steps from the Aegean Sea, Viras offers rooms with balconies directly on a private blue-flagged beach. The hotel features an outdoor pool, a traditional hammam and nearby golfing facilities. Opening out onto furnished balconies adorned with flowers and plants, rooms at Viras Hotel are all air conditioned. They are filled with sunshine and equipped with a mosquito net. Free Wi-Fi, TV and en suite bathrooms are standard. Guests can enjoy traditional specialities from the Mugla Province at the restaurant, characterized by a relaxed atmosphere. Soft drinks and Turkish spirits are served at the beach-front bar. Hotel Viras also includes a children playground, sun loungers with cushions and umbrellas at Ortakent Beach. Central Bodrum is a 20-minute drive away and free parking is available on site.

name: Liman Hotel Gumusluk- Adult Only
description: Situated in Bodrum City, Liman Hotel Gümüslük - Adult Only has a terrace, restaurant, bar, and free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The accommodation features room service, an ATM and luggage storage for guests. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, some rooms at the hotel also boast a sea view. At Liman Hotel Gümüslük - Adult Only rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or halal breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The area is popular for hiking and fishing, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Gumusluk Beach is 100 metres from Liman Hotel Gümüslük - Adult Only, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 61 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Su Hotel
address: Turgutreis Cad. 1201, Bodrum 48400
description: Located near Bodrum's marina, Su Hotel offers modern rooms along with a large Mediterranean garden and an outdoor swimming pool. The nearest bus stop is a 5-minute walk away. All rooms at Su Hotel - Bodrum have a brightly coloured décor with traditional decorations. Most rooms have balconies with views of the courtyard, which has fig trees, orange trees and pomegranates. Su Hotel's 24-hour reception can help arrange trips to Bodrum's main attractions. The hotel also offers bicycle and car rental. Free WiFi is available in its public areas. Airport transfer service is also available at an extra charge. Su Hotel Restaurant serves light snacks and Aegean dishes, including a variety of fresh seafood.The bar offers a variety of refreshing drinks and cocktails. Su Hotel is 200 metres away from the centre of Bodrum, and a 30-minute drive from Camel Beach. Private parking is possible at a location nearby.

name: Bodrum Park Resort
address: Yaliciflik Mevkii 20km Dist From Bodrum, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated directly on a private beach surrounded by palm trees, this attractive holiday village overlooks a lovely cove. The village of Yaliciftlik is 5 km away, the resort of Bodrum 16 km. The airport Bodrum-Milas is about 45 km away. The hotel features 24-hour reception, express check-in and check-out, currency exchange, WIFI available in public areas, restaurants, bar, fitness centre, spa and wellness, indoor and outdoor pool, sports facilities, playground, medical service, bicycle rental and car hire.FarePortal

name: Costa Maya Hotel
address: Gerence Sokak No: 33, Bodrum 48400
description: Featuring an outdoor pool with a sundeck, this Bodrum hotel offers spacious rooms with a private balcony. The hotel is located a 5 minute walk from Bodrum’s marina. With free Wi-Fi and a modern décor, all air-conditioned rooms at Bodrum Maya Hotel include a minibar. The rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. A Turkish breakfast buffet is served in Maya’s restaurant, which has an adjoining summer terrace. Guests can enjoy drinks on the partly covered pool terrace. The 24-hour reception can arrange car rentals and shuttle services to Milas Bodrum Aiport, 35 km away. The nearest bus stop to Bodrum’s city centre is just 50 metres away.

name: The Marmara Bodrum - Adult Only
address: Yokusbasi Mah. Suluhasan Cad. No:18, Bodrum 48400
description: Set on a hilltop, this design hotel offers a free-form outdoor pool with 180° views of Bodrum Bay and Kos Island. It has a spa and a fitness centre, and rooms with free Wi-Fi. The Marmara Bodrum features a collection of statues created by painter and sculptor Mevlut Akyildiz. The hotel's transparent toilet doors are designed by French architect Christian Allart. All rooms at Marmara Bodrum have luxury bedding and are fitted with ornate wooden furniture. Each one has air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a private balcony or terrace, some of which overlook the sea. The Marmara Bodrum welcomes its guests on the private beach all summer long. Free beach shuttle service is available on the dates when the beach is open. A mix of international and Turkish items including fresh bread and local cheese are served for the buffet breakfast. Lunch and dinner are served a-la-carte style. Guests can also relax with a glass of wine and enjoy sunset views from the pool’s deck chairs. The aduly only Marmara Bodrum is 15 minutes’ drive from Bodrum Milas Airport. Bodrum Marina is a 2-minute drive away, and Bodrum Castle is 1 km from the hotel. Free parking is available on site. The Marmara Beach invites their guests from 25 May till 15 September. Free shuttle service to the beach is available during the day.

name: Kaya Palazzo Resort & Residences Le Chic Bodrum
address: Yakamoz Sk., Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 1.1 km from Gumbet Beach, Kaya Palazzo Resort & Residences Le Chic Bodrum features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has a sauna and room service. The hotel offers some rooms with sea views, and rooms have a balcony. The rooms in Kaya Palazzo Resort & Residences Le Chic Bodrum are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A vegetarian, halal or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. With staff speaking German, English, Russian and Turkish, advice is available at the reception. Bitez Beach is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Bardakci Bay Beach is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 45 km from Kaya Palazzo Resort & Residences Le Chic Bodrum.

name: Azka Hotel
address: Bardakci Koyu, 26, Bodrum
description: Azka Hotel offers a privileged location on a private sandy beach with sun loungers and parasols in beautiful Bardakçı Bay. Each room has a private balcony with views of the sea, or the hotel’s gardens. Free WiFi and private parking are available on site. The hotel’s rooms are all air-conditioned and include satellite TV. Azka Hotel provides a range of activities for guests to enjoy – the hotel has an outdoor pool and an indoor pool. There are also squash facilities and tennis on site. A range of local and international cuisine is served in the hotel’s restaurants which have outdoor seating for al fresco dining. Drinks are available from the poolside bar, beach bar or lobby bar. There is also 24-hour room service available. Bodrum centre is just 1.5 km away from Azka Hotel and can be easily reached via the regular water taxis from the nearby jetty.

name: The Aegean Gate Hotel
address: Güvercin Sk. 2, Bodrum 48400
description: The Aegean Gate Hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and bar in Bodrum City. The property is around 600 metres from Akkan Beach, 2.4 km from Bodrum Castle and 3.8 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with pool view. Every room is fitted with a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a city view. All units at The Aegean Gate Hotel are equipped with a seating area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Bodrum Bar Street is 1.2 km from The Aegean Gate Hotel, while Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 39 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Baia Bodrum
address: Kizilburun Mevkii, Gundogan Beldesi, 48400, Turkey, Gundogan, Bodrum 0
description: Surrounded by craggy hillsides, tangerine groves and pine woods in tranquil Gundogan, a small town just outside of Bodrum, this hotel provides crowd-free peace and quiet with all the comfort and convenience of a resort town. Here, guests can relax in the hotel's private beach area just 30 metres from the hotel main building, lounge in the sun by the outdoor pool, or indulge in beauty treatments at the spa and fitness centre complete with sauna and Turkish baths. Families will enjoy the children's pool with two water slides, the adventure playground, and the mini-disco as well as the opportunity to participate in a wide variety of sports including basketball, tennis, banana boat rides and canoeing. The hotel's fully-equipped, air-conditioned rooms are spacious and modern, and the hotel's bars and restaurant can find a match for any craving with full buffet meals and even midnight soup and sandwiches. This hotel is ideal for families or couples seeking fun and relaxation in the Mediterranean sun.FarePortal

name: Senses Hotel - Adults Only
address: Kumbahce Mahallesi, Ataturk Caddesi no. 179, Bodrum 48400
description: Senses Hotel Bodrum is a concept boutique hotel that underwent complete renovation in 2015. The hotel spreads across 7.245 m of land and is within close proximity to the beach. It offers a variety of delicious food establishments with a magnificent view of Bodrum Castle. Senses Hotel Bodrum offers stylish interiors and elegantly furnished rooms that are distributed over several buildings. Memorable days in this charming getaway await you. If you are looking for a more cultural holiday, Senses Hotel Bodrum is also the ideal place to stay in Bodrum, a charming and lively city on the Turkish Aegean coast. The city was built where the ancient city of Halicarnassus of Caria once stood. The ancient town was also home of the Mausoleum of Halicarnassus, on e of seven ancient wonders of the world. From this impressive structure the term mausoleum derived from, which is now commonly used to refer to any grand tomb. Halicarnassus was also a city which Alexander the Great laid siege to in 334 BC and where in the 1400s the Knights Hospitaliers built Bodrum Castle with rocks from the Mausoleum of Halicarnassus. Bodrum is thus a fascinating city for any admirer of ancient history and for travellers who enjoy excursions amongst ancient ruins.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Karia Princess
address: Eskiçesme Mahallesi, Myndos Caddesi No:8, Bodrum 48400
description: Less than 2 km to the Bodrum Castle and 650 metres to Bodrum Marina, this hotel is set in lush gardens. Located very close to Bodrum Marina and nearby night clubs, it offers an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and has air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV. Each room at Hotel Karia Princess comes with a private balcony and a minibar. A private bathroom with amenities and hairdryer is also standard. Some suites feature a seating area with a sofa bed. You can enjoy your daily breakfast by the pool along the garden. It includes tastes such as traditional pastries and jams. The hotel’s buffet restaurant offers Turkish and Aegean cuisine. There is a spa centre at Karia Princess Hotel, which includes a fitness room, sauna and Turkish bath. Massage services can also be provided. You can also play a game of tennis and billiards. Only 2 km to Bodrum Bus Terminal, Hotel Karia Princess is located 1 km to Mausoleum of Halicarnassus. Bodrum Milas Airport is 35 km away.

name: Bodrum Marma Otel
address: Tuerkkuyusu Mah. Tekel Sk. No:38, Bodrum 48400
description: Bodrum Marma Otel features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Bodrum City. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.3 km from Bodrum Bar Street, 1.6 km from French Tower and 1.3 km from Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, luggage storage space and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a patio with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The units feature a wardrobe. A halal breakfast is available every morning at Bodrum Marma Otel. You can play billiards at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Bodrum Marma Otel include Akkan Beach, Bodrum Castle and Bodrum Marina Yacht Club. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 40 km from the hotel.

name: Seckin Konaklar
address: Neyzen Tevfik Cad. No:186, Bodrum 48400
description: This family-owned hotel is ideally located right across Bodrum Marina, within walking distance from many restaurants, shops and historic sites of Bodrum. It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms. All rooms of Seckin Konaklar have satellite TV and a minibar. They also include a private bathroom with a toilet, shower and a hairdryer. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at the hotel. There are also numerous restaurants nearby. Marina Yacht Club is a few steps from the property while Bodrum Castle is 1.3 km from Seckin Konaklar. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 38 km away.

name: Ena Boutique Hotel
address: Omurca Mahallesi, Doktor Mumtaz Ataman Caddesi No 2, Bodrum 48400
description: Located at the heart of Bodrum, Ena Boutique Hotel is 150 metres from the seafront. This modern hotel offers an outdoor pool with a sun deck and a spacious terrace overlooking Bodrum Castle and the sea. Free shuttle services to the beach are provided and free WiFi is available. With a classic modern décor, each air-conditioned unit at Boutique Hotel Ena has a balcony with city and sea views. They feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and extra-large beds. A minibar and a safety deposit box are standard in every guestroom. Daily breakfast is served buffet style on the terrace and you can have your breakfast served to your room. Light snacks and refreshing beverages are offered by the poolside snack bar throughout the day. For lunch and dinner, the terrace restaurant has an a-lac-arte menu. Barbecue facilities are also available. Guests can benefit from concierge services. The staff, available 24 hours a day, assists with car and bike rentals and provides information about local attractions. Laundry and dry cleaning services are offered. Milas Bodrum Airport is within 35 km and airport shuttle services are arranged at an additional fee.

name: Costa Bitezhan Hotel
address: Sah Caddesi No: 4, Bodrum
description: Located at the seafront of Bitez, Costa Bitezhan Hotel offers a private beach area with free sun loungers and parasols. The hotel has an outdoor pool, sauna and a hammam. The rooms of Costa Bitezhan Hotel include a flat-screen TV, mini refrigerator and a balcony. All rooms have sea, pool and garden views. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served in open buffet style. Tea and coffee service with cookies is offered in the afternoon. You can also enjoy drinks from the pool and lobby bar. Bodrum city centre is 6 km from the hotel. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 42 km away.

name: Casa De Nova Hotel
address: Bitez mah 1524 sk No 13 Bodrum, Bodrum 48470
description: Casa De Nova Hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Gümbet. The property is around 800 metres from Gumbet Beach, 2.3 km from Bitez Beach and 2.6 km from Bardakci Bay Beach. The hotel also offers free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. At the hotel, each room comes with a balcony with pool view. Every room includes air conditioning, and certain units at Casa De Nova Hotel have a terrace. A halal breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 3.5 km from Casa De Nova Hotel, while Myndus Gate is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 44 km from the hotel.

name: Flora Hotel Bodrum
address: Dayilar Sokak Degirmenler Alti, Bodrum 48400
description: Flora Hotel is a beachfront complex surrounded by lush gardens, 100 metres from the centre of Gumbet and 2 km from Bodrum city centre. The complex is spread around the large pool area where you can relax with a drink from the bar and soak up the sun. Flora Hotel also has à la carte restaurants. Children will appreciate the hotel's games room, playground and table tennis facilities. All the rooms of Flora Hotel have garden or pool view and come with air conditioning, balcony and satellite TV. Services such as child minding, car rental and tour desk are designed to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Free private parking and free Wi-Fi are also available to all guests.

name: Royal Palm Residence
address: Osman Nuri Bilgin Cad. No.60, Bodrum 48400
description: Conveniently located in Bodrum, Royal Palm Residence is just a 5-minute walk from Bardakci and Gumbet beaches. It offers an outdoor pool, and luxurious apartments with a fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning and sea views. The spacious apartments of Royal Palm Residence are bright and tastefully decorated with modern furniture. They all have a living room with a comfortable seating area and an LCD TV with satellite channels. The living rooms are covered with marble floors and bedrooms are with hardwood floors. The apartments are equipped with a washing machine and dishwasher. They also have a private balcony overlooking the beautiful blue waters of the Aegean Sea. The pool area is furnished with sun loungers. You can also enjoy refreshing drinks from the snack bar at the poolside. The city centre of Bodrum is only a 5-minute drive from Royal Palm Residence with many restaurants, bars, clubs and shops. Bodrum Marina is 1.5 km away. Bodrum Milas Airport is within 40 km.

name: The Bodrum EDITION
address: Dirmil Mahallesi, Balyek Cd. No 5a, Bodrum 48990
description: Enjoy luxury living at The Bodrum EDITION. Set on the Turkish Riviera, our boutique hotel offers an inspiring location to explore Turkey. This beachfront hotel in Bodrum offers easy access to numerous watersports, places to explore such as Yalikavak Marina, Yalikavak Market and Bodrum Amphitheatre, as well as enticing shops and restaurants. The hotel has 108 guest rooms, lofts, suites and villas with custom furnishings, indulgent bedding and signature linens, ergonomic workstations, free Wi-Fi. Spacious bathrooms include oversized tubs, decadent monsoon rain showerheads and Le Labo bath products. Some accommodations boast gardens, terraces and private pools. Indulge in our creative restaurants, including BRAVA by Diego Munoz, and socialize at Discetto. Take a dip into our infinity pool, work out in the modern gym or rejuvenate at our replenishing hotel spa. For your wedding in Bodrum, meetings or social celebrations, choose from our 12 light-filled venues, with splendid views of the Aegean Sea.Marriott

name: Gun-Ay Hotel
address: Adnan Menderes Cad Kasif Ertekin Sok 5, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in Gumbet area, Gun-Ay Hotel offers a private area at Gumbet Beach only 70 metres away. The hotel has an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with sea or pool views. The bright rooms of Gun-Ay include a TV with satellite channels, minibar and a safe box. The bathrooms come with a toilet, shower and a hairdryer. Some rooms also offer a balcony overlooking the sea and the pool. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at the hotel. There is also a bar at the poolside, offering alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks, and tea or coffee throughout the day. The lively bar street of Gumbet is just a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Bodrum city centre is a 10-minute drive away. Milas-Bodrum Airport is within 40 km.

name: Artunc Hotel Bodrum
address: Fabrika Street No: 32, Bodrum 48400
description: Built abiding by Bodrum's traditional architecture, Artunc Hotel is situated in Bodrum’s city centre. Property offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Facilities include an outdoor pool. Bar Street, with its many bars and nightclub, is just a 3-minute walk away. The rooms of Artunc Hotel are decorated with hardwood floors and modern furniture. All rooms have free Wi-Fi, a minibar, and an en suite bathroom. Guests can relax in Artunc’s extensive and tropical garden, which features lemon, mandarin, banana and palm trees. The hotel also offers a 24-hour reception, scooter and car rental, and a tour desk. Hotel Artunc’s café serves local Turkish dishes as well as international cuisine. The bar offers a variety of refreshing drinks. The local bazaar, Bodrum Castle, the marina, and the local blue-flagged beach are all within a 4-minute walk from Artunc Hotel. Free private parking is available on site. A shuttle service to Milas-Bodrum International Airport can be arranged directly by the hotel.

name: Costa Sariyaz Hotel
address: Dr. Mümtaz Ataman Caddesi No:47, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in Omurca, Costa Sariyaz Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Bodrum. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the property's facilities and services. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, bar, 24-hour check-in are readily available for you to enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as flat screen television, bathroom phone, clothes rack, in-room tablet, linens. Access to the property's outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden will further enhance your already satisfying stay. Costa Sariyaz Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Bodrum unforgettable.Agoda

name: Duja Bodrum
address: Zeytinli Kahve Mevkii, Bodrum 48400
description: The magnificent Duja Bodrum is located in Zeytinlikahve Torba, just near the sea. It is only 11 km from Bodrum. Benefit from the numerous activities and indoor and outdoor pools. The hotel presents comfortable and unique architecture with carefully chosen colour and design. The hotel rooms, bungalows and annex rooms provide guests with standard comfort for a pleasant stay. Enjoy your own balcony and the bath in each bathroom. A variety of in- and outdoor main restaurants is available. Enjoy a snack or lunch by the pool before getting a tan. The à la carte Sultan Restaurant is a good choice at night for a tasty evening dinner. The hotels Mini Club Team offers unforgettable memories for children visitors. The experienced animators will come up with fun activities that will amuse the little ones from morning until bed time. If you want to get active, profit from the numerous activities which are on offer. Play tennis, basketball or billiards. Water sports are also available, as well as various animation activities. During the day, you can watch amusing contests, colourful shows and amazing performances. For total relaxation, purify your soul with the wonderful treatments and wellness programs Duja Bodrum has on offer. Enjoy a Turkish steam bath or the hammam facilities. The hotel offers private parking. The airport is 21 km away.

name: Inone Mucho Selection Hotel
address: Gümbet Mah. Kaşif Ertekin Sok. No.12/7, Bodrum 48400
description: Set in Çırkan, 600 metres from Gumbet Beach, INONE MUCHO SELECTION HOTEL offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. 2.2 km from Bitez Beach and 2.4 km from Bardakci Bay Beach, the property features a range of water sports facilities and a private beach area. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel all rooms include air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a sea view. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 3.4 km from INONE MUCHO SELECTION HOTEL, while Myndus Gate is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 44 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Magna Manastir Hotel
address: Kumbahce Mah Mustafa Kemal Cad No 37, Bodrum 48400
description: Built on the site of an 18th-century monastery, this stylish hotel boasts a striking hilltop location overlooking Bodrum Bay. The original stone gate dominates the tree-framed outdoor pool area. Manastir Hotel’s à la carte restaurant has a glass-walled dining room, where guests can enjoy Turkish delicacies along with international cuisine. The on-site bar with poolside tables and a room service provide drinks and snacks throughout the day. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms of the Manastir Hotel have charming wooden balconies surrounded by bougainvilleas, a seating area and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Some include an exclusive hydro-massage bath looking over the Aegean Sea. Younger guests can play in the children’s pool or in the games room. Close to all the main city sights, including Bodrum Castle, Manastir Hotel is 20 minutes from Milas-Bodrum International Airport and provides a convenient shuttle service.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Bodrum Marina Vista
address: Neyzen Tevfik Cad No 168, Bodrum 48400
description: Nestled in the heart of the city, our quaint oasis overlooks Bodrum Marina, less than a mile from Bodrum Castle. We’re just 26 miles from Milas Bodrum Airport and within walking distance of restaurants and shops. Lounge by our outdoor pool, relax in the sauna or indulge in a spa treatment. Enjoy onsite dining and room service.Hilton

name: Palm Hills Bodrum Hotel
address: Gündoğan Mah NO:56 Kızılburun Caddesi, Bodrum 48400
description: Set in Bodrum City, 1.5 km from Gundogan Beach, Palm Hills Butik Otel offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. 21 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and 19 km from Pedasa Antique City, the property features a bar and a private beach area. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Palm Hills Butik Otel every room has bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or halal breakfast. Myndus Gate is 20 km from Palm Hills Butik Otel, while Mausoleum of Halikarnassus is 21 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 54 km from the hotel.

name: Costa Bodrum City
address: Kumbahçe Mah. 2432 Sok. No: 26, Bodrum 48400
description: This hotel is surrounded by lush gardens and situated in a traditional white-washed building in Bodrum. It has an outdoor pool with sun-lounger terrace and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Rooms at the Costa Bodrum City equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. Each room offers mosquito net. The hotel serves open-buffet or continental breakfast and has a poolside bar with billiards that offers snacks. A special menu allows you to sample different tastes for lunch and dinner at a surcharge. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service and on-site private parking is available at a surcharge. Vibrant bars street and bus terminal are reachable within a leisurely 10-minute walk. Bodrum Castle and the Museum of Underwater Archeology are 1 km from the Costa Bodrum City.

name: Degirmenburnu Residence
address: Osman Nuri Bilgin Caddesi No:48, Bodrum 48400
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea, Degirmenburnu Residence is located in Bodrum City. Bodrum Castle is 1.4 km from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All units are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units include a seating area and/or balcony. Some units also have a kitchenette, fitted with a dishwasher and oven. Every unit is fitted with a private bathroom with a hair dryer. The apartment offers free private parking on site Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 900 metres from Degirmenburnu Residence Bodrum. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 45 km from Degirmenburnu Residence.

name: Diamond of Bodrum
address: Kumbahce Mh. Ataturk Cd No 136, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in Bodrum City, a few steps from Akkan Beach, DIAMOND OF BODRUM provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a sauna, evening entertainment and family rooms. All units at the hotel are equipped with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. DIAMOND OF BODRUM offers certain units with sea views, and the rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at DIAMOND OF BODRUM can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play billiards and darts at the hotel, and car hire is available. Speaking Arabic, German, English and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near DIAMOND OF BODRUM include Bodrum Castle, Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology and Bodrum Bar Street. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 39 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Gumusluk
address: Yali Mevkii No 28, Gumüslük, Bodrum 48960
description: Located only 100 metres from the coast in Myndos (Gumusluk), a small fishing village on Turkey's Bodrum Peninsula, this boutique hotel features an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Set in a lush garden, Hotel Gumusluk also has a children’s pool. You can have a refreshing drink at the outdoor bar or simply soak up the sun on one of the loungers or cushions in the garden. All the rooms at Gumusluk include air conditioning and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Alternatively, you can read a newspaper on your very own balcony or patio. Rooms also have a minibar and a sofa. Make the most of the hotel's outdoor areas by dining al fresco. Next to barbecue facilities, you can pay a visit to the restaurant, which includes a romantic dining area in part of the garden. With the reception open all day, you can also dine in the village and return to Gumusluk when you wish. The property also provides yoga and meditation classes at a surcharge. *Rooms renovated 2023*

name: Blue Bay Beach Otel
address: Çökertme Cd. 76, Bodrum 48470
description: When you stay at Blue Bay Beach Otel in Bodrum, you'll be on the beach, within a 10-minute drive of Camel Beach and Bodrum Castle. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Divan Bodrum - Special Class
address: Kelesharim Cad No. 22, Bodrum 48483
description: Situated in Golturkbuku, Divan Bodrum offers elegant 5-star accommodation, as well as a private beach and a swimming pool. It also provides complimentary wireless internet. The hotel has 60 rooms and has been recently refurbished. It provides meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception, as well as a basketball court. The rooms are air conditioned and include a pillow menu, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. There are also a number of rooms designed for families. Those staying at Divan Bodrum can enjoy a beverage at Sahil Bar, before enjoying a meal at Taşev. Divan Bodrum offers private parking on site for those travelling with a car. Bodrum and Yalikavak are also just a short car ride from the property.Revato

name: TUI MAGIC LIFE Bodrum - Adults Only
address: Pk 3357, Bodrum 48400
description: This all inclusive 5-star TUI MAGIC LIFE Bodrum - All Inclusive - Adults Only is set on a 70.000 m² beachfront area and offers indoor and outdoor pools and an aqua park. Guests can enjoy spa with fitness centre, sauna, hammam, steam room and a hot tub. Free WiFi is provided throughout and private parking is available. At TUI MAGIC LIFE Bodrum - All Inclusive - Adults Only's some rooms with views of the Aegean Sea, botanical gardens or pool. All rooms are air-conditioned and decorated. Tiled floor is provided along with a private bathroom fitted with shower and toiletries. Kids club with many activities is available for younger guests. Leisure options also include a cinema and tennis courts. Guests can schedule a traditional Thai massage or skin care treatment at TUI MAGIC LIFE Bodrum - All Inclusive - Adults Only's Spa & Wellness Centre. Bodrum’s centre is 7.8 km away. Milas-Bodrum Airport is located a 42-minute drive away.

name: Samara Hotel Bodrum
address: Kaynar Mevkii Torba, Bodrum
description: Located in Torba district of Bodrum, Samara has indoor/outdoor pools, kids' pool, spa facilities and a private beach area with sun loungers and umbrellas. It has air-conditioned accommodation with a satellite TV and balcony. The rooms and bungalows at Samara Hotel Bodrum come with modern furnishings. They all feature a private bathroom with amenities and hairdryer. A minibar is standard. Daily breakfast, lunch and dinner is served in buffet style. There are also à la carte restaurants that serve seafood and Turkish cuisine. Snacks and refreshing drinks and cocktails are served at the pool, beach and lobby bar. Spa facilities include a sauna, Turkish bath and fitness room; massage services can also be provided. You can play a game of tennis, billiards and table tennis at Bodrum Samara Hotel. There is also a children’s playground. Bodrum city centre is just a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Free private parking is available on site. Bodrum Milas Airport is a 24-minute drive from Samara Hotel Bodrum.

name: Sah Hotel
address: Bitez Mh Sah Caddesi No19, Bodrum 48400
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 12 guestrooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Property Location Located in Bodrum, Sah Hotel is a 1-minute drive from Bitez Beach and 13 minutes from Bodrum Marina. This beach hotel is 4.4 mi (7.1 km) from Bodrum Ancient Theater and 4.9 mi (7.9 km) from Bodrum Castle. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel's restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:30 AM to 10:30 AM. Renovations The property is closed between October 17 and April 1. This property will be closed from October 17 2021 to April 1 2022 for renovations and will resume operation once the renovation is complete (completion date subject to change). name: Xanadu Island
address: Akyar Burnu Mevkii 91, Bodrum 48980
description: Facing the beachfront, Xanadu Island offers 5-star accommodation in Akyarlar and features a garden, shared lounge and terrace. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, karaoke and a kids' club. At the hotel rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a sea view. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while certain rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a stovetop. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At Xanadu Island you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Turkish and international cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. The accommodation offers a hot tub. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at Xanadu Island, and the area is popular for snorkelling. The hotel provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Akyarlar Beach is a few steps from Xanadu Island, while Meteor Beach is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 66 km from the accommodation.

name: Birdcage 33 Hotel - Adult Only
address: Omer Efendi Caddesi 33, Bodrum 48990
description: With a stay at Birdcage 33 Boutique Hotel & Restaurant in Bodrum, you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Yalikavak Marina and Yalikavak Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Free valet parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Comca Manzara Hotel
address: Omurca Mh. Fevzi Çakmak Sk. No 1, Bodrum
description: Situated 200 metres from the Aegean Sea coast, this hotel features 2 outdoor pools with sea views. A sun terrace with free parasols and sun loungers is available. There is free Wi-Fi at the hotel. All rooms at Manzara Hotel - Adults Only include air conditioning, a TV with satellite channels and a minibar. There is a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s restaurant has both indoor and outdoor seating area, and serves breakfast, lunch and dinner Dante Italian Restaurant and Case Del Sol Bar are ideal for refreshing drinks and snacks. Centrally located in Bodrum town centre, Manzara Hotel - Adults Only is about a 12-minute walk from the Bodrum Castle. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 40 km from Manzara Hotel - Adults Only. Currency exchange, laundry and car rental are possible on site.

name: Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum
address: Meselik Mah. Comca Mevkii Sok. No. 8, Bodrum 48200
description: Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum is located in Gvercinlik, Pina Peninsula which is one of the most beautiful bays of Bodrum. The 5 star hotel is touched by the architectural features of two sides of Aegean; Bodrum and Mikanos presenting a concept design for ultimate comfort. With Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum, your heart will remain in Aegean.Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum covers 80 thousand square meter of an exquisite landscape on Gvercinlik Bay, is on the seafront with a 350 meter long beach.Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum creates personalized approaches for the comfort and pleasure for its guests and provides a real sense of serenity by offering luxury and elegance simultaneously. Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum steps forward with its restaurants led by well-versed Culinarians and its pleasing flavours which appeals to every palate.Titanic Luxury Collection Bodrum offers comfort and savor in conjunction with joy to its guests. It is the perfect choice for who would like to have a vacation along with every color of the nature.iHotelier/iStay

name: Swissôtel Resort Bodrum Beach
address: Turgutreis Mah, Gazi Mustafa Kemal 2, Bodrum 3669
description: Swissotel Resort, Bodrum Beach lies directly on the waterfront in Turgutreis, approximately 20 km from the centre of Bodrum, a very popular destination offers ideal conditions for water sports, culture and Aegean relaxation. The main two-story hotel of Swissotel Resort, Bodrum Beach comprises 66 rooms and suites, with minimum 40 sqm per room. The restaurants and bars are places of entertainment, where the ambience runs from formal to casual and dishes are prepared with the best local products. With indoor and outdoor pools and Purovel Spa and Sport facilities, the resort provides you with a wide variety of sport and leisure opportunities.Fairmont

name: Med-Inn Boutique Hotel
address: Bodrum - Siralik Mevkii No:6 Güllük, Bodrum 48670
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 24 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Head down to the water and enjoy a day at the private beach, or take advantage of other recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Property Location Located in Milas, Med-Inn Boutique Hotel - Boutique Class is by the sea, within a 10-minute drive of Gulluk Harbour and Gulluk Lighthouse. This 4-star hotel is 27.5 mi (44.3 km) from Bodrum Bar Street and 27.6 mi (44.4 km) from Bodrum Beach. Dining Grab a bite at Garden Terrace Restaurant, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge, the beach bar, or the poolside bar. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Renovations The property is closed during December, November, January, February, March, and April.
