name: El Vino Hotel & Suites
address: Omurca Mah.Pamili Sok.No 14, Bodrum 48400
description: Overlooking the Bodrum Castle, the peaceful El Vino Hotel offers comfortable rooms with balconies. It has an outdoor pool surrounded by parasols and gazebos. Fresh seafood and healthy Mediterranean cuisine can be enjoyed at the rooftop restaurant with excellent city and sea views. Guests can taste homemade H & G Organic Wines at the panoramic Wine Bar. There is also complimentary freshly baked pastries with tea/coffee every afternoon from 17:00 until 18:00. All air-conditioned rooms come with satellite TV and minibars. Each El Vino room provides plenty of natural light, also offering free Wi-Fi. El Vino Hotel & Suites has an open-air hot tub and can arrange yacht tours. The Mausoleum of Halikarnassus and Myndus Gate are just 10 minutes’ walk away. The hotel is 30 minutes’ drive from Milas Aiport.

name: 7 Art Feslegen Hotel By Egeos
address: Kumbahce Mah. Papatya Sk. No. 26, Bodrum 48000
description: Only 1 km to the Bodrum Castle, this hotel is less than 100 metres to the seafront. It offers an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a separate seating area and satellite TV. The rooms at 7 Art Feslegen Hotel By Egeos offer a kitchenette with an electric kettle. They all feature a private bathroom with amenities and hairdryer. A safe is also provided in each. Daily breakfast is available at Hotel 7. Art Feslegen. You can enjoy alcoholic drinks and beverages at the terrace bar accompanied by sea views. There are also numerous restaurants, bars and nightclubs within walking distance. The pool area is ideal for sunbathing and relaxation. The front desk is available 24/7. Room service can also be provided. Just a 10-minute drive to the ruins of the ancient Greek city Halicarnassus, 7 Art Feslegen Hotel By Egeos is less than 2 km to Bodrum Bus Terminal. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 35 km away.

name: Istankoy Hotel
address: Atatürk Cad. No:73, Bodrum 48400
description: Experience the bustling centre of Bodrum from this comfortable hotel, where you can have a fun break with your whole family. For a truly pleasant and carefree holiday, the Istankoy Hotel offers the right setting and facilities. You can reach the beach in only a few steps and enjoy the fabulous Turkish sun, while relaxing on the sand or swimming in the sea. Alternatively, you can simply stay at the hotel and unwind at the pool with a refreshing beverage from the bar. You can stroll around the centre of Bodrum and browse through the shops or walk along the beautiful marina. The famous and popular Bar Street is only a stone’s throw away and offers a great, colourful place to just walk around and watch all the activity. In the evenings, you can sample a wide range of both local, traditional Turkish food and European dishes.

name: Bodrum Beach Resort
address: Gumbet Mah. Osman Nuri Bilgin Cad., No:37 - 1, Bodrum 48400
description: This resort is located on the famous Gumbet district of Bodrum, only 100 metres away from the sandy beach. The property includes an outdoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. The stylish rooms of Bodrum Beach Resort are tastefully decorated with modern furniture. They all have LCD TV with satellite channels and a minibar as well as a safe and free WiFi. Delightful breakfast options include refined flavors and tastes. Gumbet town centre is only 750 metres away with lively bars and nightclubs. Bodrum Milas Airport is 35 km from Bodrum Beach Resort.

name: Rixos Premium Bodrum
address: Torba Mah. Zeytinli Kahve Mevkii, P.K. 244, Bodrum
description: Rixos Premium Bodrum offers activities galore, making it the perfect destination for revitalising mind, body and soul. Nestled between the sparkling turquoise waters of the Aegean sea and the stunning national parks of the Bodrum Peninsula, the hotel is a haven for sunseekers and watersport enthusiasts. Bodrum is a glamorous destination with magnificent beaches and lively nightlife.accorhotels.com

name: Bircan Hotel
address: Cafer Pasa Cad No:8, Bodrum 48400
description: This charming, family-run hotel is only a 5-minute walk from Bodrum Marina, a 10-minute walk from Bardakci Bay and 2 km from Gumbet Beach. Its secluded garden features a pool with night lighting and a bar with beanbags. All rooms at the Bircan Hotel are air conditioned and offer free Wi-Fi. They all feature wall-mounted cable televisions and private bathrooms with shower and toilet. A generous Turkish breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room or out on the garden terrace. Guests can enjoy various snacks and refreshing beverages from two different bars. Hotel Bircan offers a 24-hour front desk and free on-site parking. Its staff can also arrange rental cars and free pickup service from the hotel to Bardakci Bay.

name: Serhan Hotel
address: Plaj Sokak No. 22, Gumbet, Bodrum 48400
description: Providing the chance for a sunny break on the Aegean Sea, Serhan revolves around an outdoor pool among fragrant gardens. It is located in a small village on the Bodrum Peninsula. Opening out onto private balconies, air-conditioned rooms at Serhan Hotel are modern and functional. They all feature satellite TV channels and include en-suite bathrooms with hairdryer. Guests can enjoy Turkish, English and Dutch dishes for breakfast and dinner, served at the restaurant of the hotel. The on-site bar offers drinks and local spirits, as well as pool tables and billiards. Gümbet Beach is 200 meters away and Central Bodrum is 3 km from the hotel Serhan. The property is entirely non-smoking, complimentary parking is available and public transport is found within 70 meters.

name: Azure By Yelken Hotel
address: Kadikalesi Mevkii Peksimet Koyu, Bodrum 48960
description: The hotel has a privileged location on the seafront, a 300-meter private beach at the western end of the Bodrum peninsula and a private jetty in the crystal waters of the Aegean Sea. Access to the center of Turgutreis, where there are various shops, restaurants, bars and cafes is easy. Rooms at this family-friendly hotel feature modern and stylish décor. Some rooms have a balcony and sea views. The hotel has many swimming pools, including a children's pool, a pool with slides and an indoor pool. Especially in the hotel where the water sports are intense, guests will enjoy the sports activities. Small guests will not get enough of the mini club. The hotel has a main restaurant serving buffet and two a la carte restaurants serving Mediterranean and Mediterranean cuisine. For relaxation, the hotel's spectacular spa center can be preferred. Perfect choice for couples and families with children.FarePortal

name: Maxx Royal Bodrum
address: Gölköy Mah 312 Sk No 3 Bodrum /Mugla No 3, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 1.3 km from Akkan Beach, Maxx Royal Bodrum features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a hammam. The accommodation offers a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Maxx Royal Bodrum provides some rooms with sea views, and every room comes with a patio. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Maxx Royal Bodrum can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The hotel offers a children's playground. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. The property has an in-house hot spring bath, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking German, English, Russian and Turkish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Maxx Royal Bodrum include Bodrum Castle, Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

name: Petunya Beach Resort
address: Yahsi Yalisi, Bodrum 48400
description: Only a few steps from the seafront, Petunya has an outdoor pool, its own beach area and spa facilities. It offers air-conditioned rooms with LCD TV and a balcony. All rooms at Petunya Beach Resort come with modern furnishings with pastel colours. They all feature a minibar. A private bathroom with free amenities and hairdryer is standard. Daily breakfast, lunch and dinner is served in buffet style. You can also enjoy snacks and drinks by the swimming pool during the day. The à la carte restaurant serves local and international dishes. Spa facilities include a Turkish bath, sauna and massage services; a fitness room is also available. You can play a game of tennis, darts and table tennis at Beach Resort Petunya. There is also a children’s playground. Just 11 km to Bodrum city centre, Petunya Beach Resort is 45 km to the Milas-Bodrum Airport.

name: Panorama Hotel Bodrum
address: Menemene Mah. Camtepe Cad. 190., Bodrum 48400
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 13 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars (stocked with some free items). Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This Beaux Arts hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area. Property Location When you stay at Panorama Otel in Bodrum, you'll be near the beach, within a 5-minute drive of Turkbuku Beach and Golkoy Beach. This hotel is 12.3 mi (19.9 km) from Bodrum Beach and 12.5 mi (20.1 km) from Bodrum Castle. Dining Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's poolside restaurant, where you can take in the garden view and dine alfresco. You can also stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary full breakfast is included. name: Kempinski Hotel Barbaros Bay
address: Kizilagac Koyu Gerenkuyu Mevkii Yaliciftlik, Bodrum 48400
description: Kempinski Hotel Barbaros Bay Bodrum enjoys a quiet location, overlooking Gokova Bay. It provides luxury rooms with private balconies, 2 swimming pools, restaurants with sea views and free Wi-Fi. The hotel also has a blue-flagged private sandy beach. The hotel offers special services for guests travelling with their children. Specifically-designed "Kids Inclusive" services include fun and educational activities for younger guests. You can start the day with daily buffet breakfast at Olive Restaurant with soft drinks. The non-smoking rooms at the Kempinski Hotel feature stylish furnishings and modern décor. Each room has its own seating area, satellite TV and a spacious bathroom. Some rooms enjoy panoramic views over the Aegean Sea. The exclusive spa offers East Asian treatments and massages. The Hotel Kempinski Bodrum also provides a sauna, fitness centre and Turkish bath. Guests can take diving courses or enjoy fishing tours and parasailing. Other water sport activities include wake board and water ski, windsurfing and water buggy. All activities incur a surcharge. Kempinski Hotel Barbaros Bay Bodrum is conveniently located a 20-minute drive from The Mausoleum of Halikarnassus, Greek Amphitheater and Bodrum Castle. Bodrum Airport is 35 km away. Free valet parking and a ticket service are available.

name: Aparthotel Siesta Beach Bodrum
address: Degirmenalti, Bodrum 48400
description: Overlooking Gumbet Bay, Siesta Beach is 1 km from Myndus Gate. It features self-catering accommodation with balconies, in a peaceful location. Massage treatments, a Turkish bath and a sauna are offered. Set in a picturesque garden, on a hillside in Gumbet, the guest units have a kitchenette and a seating area. Each is air conditioned and has a minibar. Siesta Beach Apartment has a seasonal, outdoor pool lined with sun loungers. Guests can enjoy a game of darts or a night of karaoke. There is also a 24-hour front desk on site. The hotel offers 2 restaurants and 2 bars. Guests can enjoy a selection of local and international foods, as well as theme nights. Free private parking is available at the Siesta Beach Apartment. The Bodrum Windmills are just 500 metres away.

name: Sundance Suites Hotel
address: Bahcelievler Mah.Zeyyat Mandalinci Cad., 167, Bodrum 48960
description: Situated by the Aegean waters with a private beach area and a 100-meter long wooden dock, this hotel features an outdoor pool and an indoor pool. There is a Turkish bath, sauna and a fitness centre on site. Air-conditioned apartments and suites at Sundance Suites Hotel include a flat-screen TV, balcony and a seating area. A mini refrigerator, stove and an electric kettle are provided in the kitchen or kitchenette. Private bathroom has a hairdryer and a bath or shower. The hotel’s à la carte restaurant serves lunch and dinner. Breakfast is offered in a fixed menu style. Located on the dock and by the pool, the 2 bars on site are ideal for refreshing drinks. Guests can play a game of tennis and relax in the massage rooms. Water sports facilities and a children’s playground are available. Free Wi-Fi is accessible in public areas. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 58 km from Sundance Suites Hotel and a shuttle service can be arranged at an additional fee.

name: Toloman Hotel & Apartments
address: Cokertme Caddesi No. 42, Bitez, Bodrum 48400
description: Located on the Aegean shores, this family-run hotel features an outdoor pool with sun loungers and a designated area on the beach. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Air-conditioned rooms at Toloman Hotel include a balcony and a mini refrigerator. Private bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer. The hotel’s à la carte restaurant serves tasty dishes from Turkish and international cuisine. There is a rustic style bar on site offering alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. Situated in Bitez village with tangerine orchards and olive trees, Toloman Hotel is also a 10-minute drive from Bodrum centre with its bustling bars, cafes and restaurants. Car rental, currency exchange and tour desk services are offered on site. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 42 km from Hotel Toloman. Free public parking is possible on site.

name: Sianji Well-Being Resort
address: Kadikale Mevkii 25864, Bodrum 48960
description: Hanging gardens and 7 swimming pools await guests at this luxurious hotel in Bodrum. Mediterranean cuisine is served at the hotel’s Elani Beach, featuring a private marina. Inspired by one of the Wonders of the Ancient World, Sianji Well-Being Resort’s spa features massage and therapy rooms, a Finnish bath, a Roman bath and a sauna. There is even a cinema and a shopping arcade. The carefully decorated villas and suites at the Sianji Well-Being Resort offer plenty of space. Each is fitted with a seating area and satellite TV. Minibars and work desks are standard in all units. Another distinguished spot where the guests of Sianji Well-Being Resort treat themselves is Muu Spa, which offers a set of different alternatives such as Asian massages, traditional Turkish bath, Turkish body scrubbing, foam massage, VIP bath and family bath. Guests can use VIP bath if they wish and have a chocolate, champagne bath in a hot tub in VIP massage rooms after the massage. You can benefit from Muu Spa's exclusive services upon request at a surcharge. Sianji Well-Being Resort presents a variety of different tastes. A new gourmet experience can be lived at Elani Beach Restaurant as a la carte service, On the other hand healthy food specialties and trendy raw food cuisine a la carte menu is presented at Wellness Restaurant. Nunu Restaurant is the open buffet restaurant where wide variety of both healthy and fusion dishes from all over the world chosen during summer. The resort is situated 3 km from Turgutreis town, surrounded by islands of Kos and Kalimnos. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 55 km from Sianji Well-Being Resort.

name: Maison 48 Apart Hotel
address: Adnan Menderes Caddesi No: 18, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in the heart of Gümbet, Maison 48 Apart Hotel offers rooms with a kitchenette and a balcony, just 300 metres from Gümbet Beach. Facilities include an outdoor pool. The rooms of Maison 48 Apart Hotel feature a simple, yet modern interior. All rooms are equipped with an air-conditioning, telephone, kitchenette with a mini fridge, and a private bathroom. Maison 48 Apart Hotel also offers a pool table, a supermarket, and a 24-hour reception. Free WiFi is available in the public areas. The pool bar serves a wide variety of local drinks and meals. On some days, guests can enjoy Turkish nights at the bar, featuring belly dancers. Gümbet’s shops, restaurants, and bars are just 200 metres away. The Greek Amphitheatre is 1.9 km from Maison 48 Apart Hotel, and Bodrum Castle is 2.6 km away.

name: Asteria Bodrum Resort
address: Asarlik Mevkii Guembet, Bodrum 48400
description: Selectum Colours Bodrum features a free-form pool with a hot tub, a traditional Hammam and wellness centre offering alternative health and beauty treatments. It is 5 minutes’ walk away from Gumbet beachfront. Each room is air-conditioned and feature a TV with multilingual channels and a comfortable armchair in the seating area. Each one has a private balcony, some with panoramic sea views. At Selectum Colours Bodrum, guests can take part in diving, windsurfing and canoeing or enjoy a refreshing work-out in the fitness centre. In the evening, the hotel’s entertainment staff organises cabaret, disco evenings or live music shows. Selectum Colours Bodrum is 3.5 km away from Bodrum Amphitheatre. Attractions located in central Bodrum, such Bodrum Castle, is 5 km away.

name: Ailla Yalikavak
address: Ömer Efendi Caddesi No 48, Bodrum 48990
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 2.1 km from Yalikavak Public Beach, Ailla Yalıkavak features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ailla Yalıkavak rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 19 km from Ailla Yalıkavak, while Pedasa Antique City is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 59 km from the hotel.

name: Laden Hotel Bodrum
address: Eski Türk Sk. No 2, Bodrum 48400
description: Located in Bodrum City, 1.6 km from Akkan Beach, laden hotel bodrum provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the hotel, the rooms have a wardrobe. Each room includes a desk and a TV, and certain rooms at laden hotel bodrum have a balcony. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. The daily breakfast offers vegan, halal or gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bodrum Castle, Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and Bodrum Municipality Bus Station. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 40 km from laden hotel bodrum, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: MGallery The Bodrum Hotel Yalikavak
address: Yalikavak Mahallesi 91 Sokak No 6, Bodrum 48990
description: Nestled in the charming town of Yalikavak, MGallery The Bodrum Hotel is your closest destination, to the famous Marina. The hotel offers a range of designed rooms from cozy Junior Suites to luxurious Executive Suites, and spacious Two-Bedroom Family Suites, each room combines comfort and style for a delightful stay. Enjoy the hotel's amenities, including an infinity pool, a beachfront restaurant and bar, a poolside bar, and the main restaurant Bohemy. The spa features an indoor pool, hammam, gym, treatmenaccorhotels.com

name: Very Chic Hotel - Adult Only
address: Zengin Huseyin Sok no 15 Gümbet Sahili, Bodrum 48400
description: Set 250 metres from the seafront in Gumbet’s city centre, The Otium Senses Very Chic Bodrum Adult Only offers rooms with a balcony. It features a private beach and an outdoor pool surrounded by tropical gardens. Free WiFi is available in shared areas. The air-conditioned rooms are decorated with tiled floors, wooden furniture, and floor-to-ceiling windows. All rooms have satellite TV, a minibar, and an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have views of the palm gardens. Guests can get a relaxing massage at the spa, which also includes a sauna, a fitness centre, and a Turkish bath with aromatherapy. Very Chic Hotel serves à la carte meals, while the Pool Bar offers refreshing drinks. The Millionaires Beach Club hosts happy hour and has sun bathing areas. Bodrum’s city centre is a 10-minute drive from The Otium Senses Very Chic Bodrum Adult Only. The Bodrum-Milas Airport is 50 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Canna Garden Hotel - Adult Only
address: Eski Cesme Mah 1511 Sok No: 6, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in a traditional white-washed building in Gumbet, this hotel is only 500 metres from the Aegean Coast. It has an outdoor pool with sun lounger terrace and offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Palm Hotel are air conditioned and have simple furnishings. They come equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A wake up service is available. The hotel has a bar and a restaurant with an outdoor seating area that serves international cuisine and regional Turkish dishes. Taverns offering fresh seafood are located less than 1 km away. The Palm Hotel is only 2 km from Bodrum Castle and is 500 metres from the ruins of Myndos Gate. It offers 24-hour front desk service and has a tour desk that can assist with car rental.

name: Olira Boutique Hotel&spa
address: Yali Mevkii, Gundogan Plaji No: 66, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in the seafront of the picturesque Gundogan Bay, Olira Boutique Hotel&SPA has stylish accommodation with a private balcony. The hotel offers a private beach with a sun terrace, an outdoor pool and spa facilities. Each of the contemporary rooms is equipped with plenty of modern amenities, including an LCD TV, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. They all offer sea or pool views. There is also a hot tub in some rooms. The restaurant of Olira offers selected dishes of Turkish and international cuisine accompanied with sea views. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at the hotel. You can also enjoy refreshing drinks and delicious cocktails from the bar. The spa and wellness centre of the hotel includes a sauna, steam bath and massage room. There is also a well-equipped fitness centre on site. Bodrum city centre is 20 km from the hotel. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 50 km away.

name: Gumbet Anil Beach
address: Yarbay Sabri Erguden cad.No:3 Gumbet, Bodrum 48400
description: With a stay at Gumbet Anil Beach in Bodrum (Bodrum City Center), you'll be within a 15-minute walk of WOW Beach and Oasis Mall. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Sunpoint Hotel Bodrum
address: Adnan Menderes Caddesi No 60 Gumbet, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, 600 metres from Gumbet Beach, Sunpoint Hotel Bodrum features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 1.7 km of Bitez Beach. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel the rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a TV, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box. Guests at Sunpoint Hotel Bodrum can enjoy a continental or a halal breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play darts at Sunpoint Hotel Bodrum, and car hire is available. Bardakci Bay Beach is 2.5 km from the hotel, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 44 km from Sunpoint Hotel Bodrum.

name: Villa Oliva Butik Hotel
address: Farilya Mah. Atatürk Caddesi no:97/A, Bodrum 48400
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, garden and views of city, Villa Oliva Butik Hotel is situated in Bodrum City, 800 metres from Gundogan Beach. Located around 2.5 km from Kucukbuk Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also 23 km away from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Villa Oliva Butik Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also boast a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Pedasa Antique City is 19 km from Villa Oliva Butik Hotel, while Myndus Gate is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 53 km from the hotel.

name: Mett Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum
address: Eskicesme Mah Haremtan Sok, Bodrum 48400
description: Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a year-round outdoor pool and an indoor pool, METT Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum offers a spa centre, sauna, hammam and a private beach area. Free private parking is available on site. Each room has a flat-screen TV. Certain units feature a seating area where you can relax and a terrace or a balcony. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a bidet. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. WiFi is provided in all rooms. You can start the day with A La Carte breakfast. The on-site 4 à la carte restaurants offer a variety of delicacies for the guests to enjoy. Guests can also enjoy refreshments from two bars. You will find a 24-hour front desk. The resort also offers car hire. Bodrum Castle is 3 km from METT Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Milas- Bodrum Airport, 39 km from METT Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Bodrum
address: Cennet Koyu Comca Mevkii, 314., Bodrum 48400
description: Offering an a private beach area, outdoor and indoor pools, Mandarin Oriental, Bodrum is located in Golturkbuku. WiFi access is available in this resort at surcharge. The accommodation provides air conditioning, seating area and a balcony. Complete with an electric kettle, the dining area also has a coffee machine. Private bathroom is equipped with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The breakfast is served every morning at the property. A variety of dishes are available at the restaurant. The property has a spa&wellness centre where the guests can relax and replenish. There is also kids club. Evening entertainment organised by a professional staff. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 45.7 km away from the property.

name: Ipek Garden Palace Residence
address: Yal Çiftlik Mah. No:3 Yal Beldesi, Bodrum 48400
description: With a stay at Ipek Garden Palace Residence - Boutique Class in Bodrum, you'll be on the beach, and 9.7 mi (15.6 km) from Bodrum Marina and 9.8 mi (15.8 km) from Bodrum Castle. Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Dorman Suites Hotel
address: Bitez Mah. Halilim Cd. No 6, Bodrum 48470
description: Dorman Suites Hotel, which aims to make your experience unforgettable by bringing a different perspective to traditional holiday understanding,consist of 42 suites and grand suites. Our suites are available in categories with Aegean sea, nature and pool view.Dorman Suites Hotel is designed with the Inspiration of Aegean architecture, decorated with fruit trees, olive trees, bougainvilleas and several other flowers, located in only 200 meters from Bitez and Bitez Beach and 5 km from Bodrum, the favorite holiday and entertainment destination of the Aegean.You can have a massage in the greenery of our hotel, enjoy the sunset with a drink by the pool, do yoga on the lawn, ride a bicycle with our free bikes and discover the beauty of Bitez.In our quality restaurant which presents the distinguished tastes of the Aegean and Mediterranean Cuisine, we hope that you will enjoy our special menus and delicious cocktails and drinks, in a decent atmosphere away from noise and crowds. We will be honored to welcome you in both summer and winter months with our friendly staff who have adopted the principle of quality service and the satisfaction of our guests.You may even walk to the famous Aquarium Bay of Bodrum with its turquoise-colored clear water and sea life. Additionaly you may also visit famous historical and cultural places like Bodrum Castle, Myndos Gate, Halicarnassus Mausoleum, Museum of Underwater Archeology, Pedasa Antique City and the ancient theater of Bodrum.VRBO

name: Root Redrock Yalikavak
address: Yalikavak Mahallesi 94.Sokak Bodrum, Bodrum 48990
description: Set in Bodrum City, Root Redrock Yalıkavak offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a private beach area and pool with a view. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with bathrobes, slippers and a hair dryer. The wellness area at the villa is comprised of a hammam, a spa facilities and a fitness room. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Root Redrock Yalıkavak. Yalikavak Public Beach is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 58 km from Root Redrock Yalıkavak, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Doria Hotel Bodrum
address: 1410 Sokak Gündönümü Mevkii, Bodrum 48400
description: Doria Hotel Bodrum, situated in a dramatic hilltop location inBitez, is the hippest boutique hotel in this historiconce-upon-a-time fishing village that has evolved into a jetsetheaven. The open and airy hotel features an extensivecollection of contemporary art as well as innovative cuisineand spectacular views of the Aegean, all just 10 minutes drivefrom vibrant Bodrum and an easy half-hour trip from theMilas-Bodrum International Airport. While you are soakingup the stunning views and being caressed by the Bodrum sun,you will also want to set out on an exploration of thePeninsulas historic and natural treasures, including theMausoleum, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World,and the Crusader Castle of Saint Peter, now home to theMuseum of Underwater Archaeology.Dining and Entertainment at BluCombining the regions exceptional freshproduce with its equally superior olive oil,adding the catch of the day from Gumbet Bayand Bodrum, Blu by Doria Hotel Bodrumoffers contemporary Mediterranean cuisine.The Club House serves a combination ofsnacks and refreshments and the poolsidebar is the perfect place to wind down with atempting cocktail as the sun sets overGumbet Bay.iHotelier/iStay

name: Eden Hotel
address: Umurca Mahalesi Dr Mumtaz Ataman Cad 30, Bodrum -
description: Only 500 metres to the public beach and street of bars, Eden Hotel is a 15-minute walk to the Bodrum Castle. It offers an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV. All rooms at Hotel Eden come with simple furnishings. They all feature a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. A safe is standard. The hotel’s à la carte restaurant serves Mediterranean and Aegean dishes. You can taste refreshing drinks and snacks at the bar or by the pool. The pool area is ideal for sunbathing and relaxation. The front desk is available 24/7 at Eden Hotel. You can benefit from airport shuttle service offered at a surcharge. Bodrum Bus Terminal is 1 km, Ferry Port is 1.5 km to the hotel. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 35 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Phoenix Sun Hotel
address: Oramiral Kemal Kayacan Cd. No:2, Bodrum 48400
description: A stay at Phoenix Sun Hotel places you in the heart of Bodrum, within a 5-minute drive of WOW Beach and Bitez Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Bodrium Hotel & Spa
address: Buyuk Iskender Caddesi No: 13, Bodrum 48400
description: This stylish hotel is built around a notable outdoor pool with a state-of-the-art spa. It features a fitness centre, traditional Turkish hammam, steam room and sauna. Parking and Wi-Fi are free. The elegant and modern rooms of Bodrium Otel & Spa are fitted with hi-tech ‘Tempur’ beds. They are all air-conditioned and include flat-screen satellite TVs and a balcony. Guests can enjoy a varied breakfast buffet every day. Traditional and international cuisine is available at the Elysion restaurant. Located close to the Myndos Gate, Bodrium Otel & Spa is within a 20-minute walk from the beaches and Bodrum Marina. Bodrum-Milas International airport is less than 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Catamaran Hotel
address: Yalı Mevkii, Şehit Uğur Öztop Cad. No:6, Bodrum 48400
description: No description found

name: Roas Hotel
address: Halilim Caddesi No:5 Bitez Mah. Bodrum, Bodrum 48470
description: Roas Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Bitez. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 600 metres from Bitez Beach and around 1.7 km from Gumbet Beach. The accommodation offers room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel all rooms have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Roas Hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or halal breakfast is available every morning at the property. Mor Plaj is 2.2 km from the accommodation, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 45 km from Roas Hotel.

name: Cactus Charme Hotel
address: Merkez Mah.Tilkicik Cad. No:50 Yalikavak, Bodrum 48990
description: A few steps from the seafront, Elementa Boutique Hotel - Adults Only has an outdoor pool. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV, minibar and balcony. All rooms at Elementa Boutique Hotel - Adults Only come with cosy decoration. Some rooms offer sea views. A private bathroom with hairdryer is standard. Lunch and dinner is served in À la carte style. There are also late breakfast, snack service and a coffee break during the day. The bars serve refreshing drinks. The front desk is available 24/7. The pool area is ideal for relaxation. Only 20 km to the Bodrum city centre, Elementa Boutique Hotel - Adults Only is 50 km to Milas-Bodrum Airport. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hillstone Bodrum Hotel & Spa
address: Yokusbasi Mah., 1836 Sokak No:8, Bodrum 48000
description: Grand Yazici Boutique Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Bodrum. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. To be found at the hotel are 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, separate living room, private pool, whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort makes Grand Yazici Boutique Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Bodrum.Agoda

name: Paloma Family Club
address: Bitez Mah. 1312 Sok No:3 Bitez, Bodrum
description: Enjoy the comfortable, all-inclusive accommodation and absorb the wonderful ambience of this resort. Discover the rich natural surroundings of charming Bitez, near Bodrum city centre, and stay in one of the lovely apartments of this peaceful complex. The apartments are surrounded by a lush tangerine grove and are only 5 minutes away from Bitez Bay, which is known as a windsurfer’s paradise. Lounge at the poolside with your favourite drink from the bar, while the children play in the water. You can try a game of pool or walk down to the beach and admire the Turquoise Coast. Venture out to explore the rest of the peninsula or visit the bustling centre of Bodrum. Savour the peace and quiet of this environment, while still being conveniently close to the entertainment venues and shops in the town centre.

name: Gözegir Hotel
address: Cumhuriyet Caddesi, Bodrum 48400
description: Gözegir Hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Bodrum City. The property is located 1.1 km from Bodrum Museum of Underwater Archeology, 1 km from Bodrum Municipality Bus Station and 1.4 km from French Tower. The property is 300 metres from Akkan Beach, and within less than 1 km of the city centre. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms come with a balcony. A continental breakfast is available daily at the hotel. Staff speak German, English and Turkish at the reception. Popular points of interest near Gözegir Hotel include Bodrum Castle, Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and Bodrum Bar Street. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 40 km from the accommodation.

name: Salmakis Resort & Spa
address: Bardakci Koyu, Bodrum 0
description: Situated right next to the beach, this Mediterranean-style resort offers a large pool complex with panoramic views over Bodrum Bay. Salmakis features an extensive spa with hot tub, hammam and massage facilities. Free WiFi and satellite TV are available in the spacious, air-conditioned guestrooms of Salmakis Resort & Spa. They also include a bathroom with a bathtub, a balcony and a seating area. Salmakis Resort’s Ottoman restaurant serves appetizers and traditional kebabs. The Mediterranean restaurant specialises in sea food. Guests can enjoy a drink at one of 5 bars, which include a beach bar and a vitamin bar. The Salmakis Resort & Spa also offers a high-tech gym with cardio-fitness activities, diving facilities and tennis courts. Bodrum city centre with its marina and castle is 15 minutes away on foot from the resort. Milas-Bodrum International Airport is less than 30 minutes by car. Private parking is available for free.WebBeds

name: Isis Charm Beach Hotel
address: Kemer Mevkii Akyarlar Turgutreis, Bodrum
description: Situated in Akyarlar, 700 metres from Karaincir Beach, CHARM BEACH HOTEL features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation provides a sauna, evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel, all rooms include a balcony with a garden view. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, some rooms at CHARM BEACH HOTEL also boast a sea view. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet, Full English/Irish or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At CHARM BEACH HOTEL guests are welcome to take advantage of a Turkish bath. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel. Staff speak English and Turkish at the 24-hour front desk. Akyarlar Beach is 700 metres from the hotel, while Aspat Beach is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 62 km from CHARM BEACH HOTEL.

name: Smart Stay Beach
address: Gümbet Mahallesi 1510 Sokak No 8, Bodrum 48400
description: With a stay at Smart Stay Beach Bodrum in Bodrum (Bodrum City Center), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Bodrum Beach and Oasis Mall. Featured amenities include express check-out, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bodrum? This property has facilities measuring 1076 square feet (100 square meters), including conference space. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: La Quinta by Wyndham Bodrum
address: Bardakçi Bay, No:29, Bodrum 48400
description: Wake up on the bright side with our La Quinta by Wyndham Bodrum hotel. Whether you are in town for work or play, we are here to help you relax with comfortable accommodations and modern amenities. While you are here, connect to free WiFi, and recharge in one of our spacious guest rooms. Our friendly staff also provides great service so you can make the most of your stay.Wyndham

name: Mandarin Resort & Spa
address: Umurca Mah., Dr. Mumtaz Ataman Cad. 27, Bodrum 48400
description: Mandarin is a white-washed resort in central Bodrum, 280 metres or a 2-minute walk from the beach on the Aegean Sea. It features two large outdoor pools and a spa offering a hammam, sauna and massage treatments. Heated pool is also available. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Bright and airy rooms at Mandarin Resort Hotel all open out to a private balcony. They are fitted with modern furnishings and equipped with a satellite TV. Private bathrooms include a bathtub or a shower and a hairdryer. An open-buffet breakfast is served every morning. Private parking is complimentary. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 35 km away.

name: Khai Hotel Bodrum
address: Yahsi Mahallesi, Yali Caddesi No:26, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in Bodrum City, a few steps from Yahsi Beach, KHAI HOTEL BODRUM features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is located 600 metres from Ortakent Plaj, 9.3 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club and 8.5 km from Myndus Gate. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms will provide guests with a minibar. Pedasa Antique City is 8.6 km from KHAI HOTEL BODRUM, while Bodrum Windmills is 8.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 50 km from the accommodation.

name: No 81 Hotel
address: Kelesharimi Mevkii. Mimoza Sk. No:10, Bodrum
description: Overlooking the marina and Aegean Sea, this hotel is located in Bodrum Golturkbuku. It boasts a spacious seaside sun deck and has and a terrace with sun loungers. Rooms at the No81 Hotel have stylish modern furnishings and balconies with panoramic views. They come equipped satellite TV and a minibar. Some rooms have hardwood floors and a large work desk. Daze Restaurant serves traditional breakfast with coffee, omelette and it also offers dinner. You can sample cocktails and lighter fare from the beach bar. Daze turns into a night club in the evening, which serves special cocktails. No 81 guests can visit the fitness centre. There hotel’s tour desk assists with car hire and provides information on local attractions. No81 Hotel is located 29 km from Milas Airport. It offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site private parking along with valet service.

name: Susona Bodrum, LXR Hotels & Resorts
address: Torba district Kaynar street No15, Bodrum 48420
description: Susona Bodrum lies in the heart of Torba District, Turkiye overlooking the Aegean Sea. The hotel offers on-site dining, meeting space, and a full-service spa. The refined resort also features a tennis court, two pools, and four restaurants and bars. Guests can enjoy a spacious green landscape, coastal views, and a private beach with a sun deck. Find the ultimate relaxation in one of the poolside and beachside cabanas. All rooms are air-conditioned and include free WiFi, a mini-bar, and tea and coffee making facilities. Upgrade to a suite for more space to work and relax. Nearby attractions include wine tasting and vineyard visits, Etrim Carpet Village, the ancient city of Bodrum, and the Mausoleum of Halicarnassus.Hilton

name: Family Life Bodrum Imperial Hotel
address: Bankev Cad. No:39, Bodrum
description: Set in Akyarlar, 17 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, Kairaba Bodrum Imperial offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel provides certain units with sea views, and the rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Kairaba Bodrum Imperial every room includes bed linen and towels. There is also a snack bar serving a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks throughout the day. The centre of Gumbet district is just a 5-minute walk from this pet friendly hotel. Royal Asarlik Hotel is an excellent place to loosen up with its combination of good location and entertainment. The hotel has its own entertainment team that organizes day time activities and theme nights 7 days a week. During summer, the Royal Asarlik Hotel has a main terrace restaurant, a la carte restaurant, pool bar, terrace bar and lobby bar open for guests. A children's playground is offered as well. Royal Asarlik Hotel is great for a beach holiday and you can experience a number of water sports and outdoor activities on the coast. The night life in Bodrum is also very vibrant, with the closest bars and clubs a walk away. Free WiFi is accessible in the lobby area. There is also a computer room with an additional charge. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 39 km from the property.

description: Situated in the heart of Gumbet, with a private beach and water park, Parkim Ayaz Hotel offers free private parking, a host of leisure facilities and a great pool scene. Parkim Ayaz Hotel's comfortable guest rooms are well-presented and have air conditioning and a private balcony. The resort offers plenty of children's facilities, with a pool slide, kids club and playground. Guests can also make free use of the games room, with pool tables and tennis tables. For full relaxation, there is a fully equipped gym and a Turkish bath for the adults. Parkim Ayaz provides a relaxing beachfront base, within walking distance to Bodrum. The resort is also well-connected by regular bus services. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 38 km away.

It is 7 km from Bodrum city. A Turkish bath, sauna and hot tub are provided for relaxation, while a full menu of treatments includes aromatherapy, medical massage and shiatsu. For those who would like to stay fit, there is a modern gym. Rooms at the Ambrosia are air conditioned and offer private balconies. Free WiFi is available in the hotel’s public areas. The Ambrosia Hotel offers a seaside restaurant, where guests can experience romantic sunsets over the Bitez Bay. In addition to Turkish cuisine, guests can choose from a rich snack menu, have drinks at the beach bar or pool bar. It is located 40 km from Bodrum International Airport offering an airport shuttle service and private transfers to Bodrum. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Hotel Centro Bodrum

The spa centre includes a sauna, Turkish bath and massage facilities. Bodrum city centre and Bodrum Castle are within 5 km from Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 40 km from the Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only.

name: Zeytinada Hotel
address: Torba Mevkii, Bodrum
description: Location This hotel is conveniently located in the beautiful Torba region, just 5 minutes' drive from the centre of Bodrum, where guests will find a range of shops, bars and restaurants. The beach is just 300 m away, and Milas-Bodrum Airport lies some 30 km from the accommodation. Facilities The hotel features 38 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Amenities include a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access and wireless internet access (no extra charge) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a bar and a pub. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. Additional features of the hotel include a TV room and a playroom. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Among the additional services available are a babysitting service, medical assistance, room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. A shuttle service is offered. Rooms Special family rooms are available for families with children. All rooms feature air conditioning, a living room and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. The accommodation units each feature a sofa-bed. Among the amenities are a safe and a minibar. Internet access, a telephone, a TV and a radio are provided as standard. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. A terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. The hot tub offers revitalisation. There is also a poolside snack bar. Those wishing to enjoy sports whilst on holiday can have fun on-site with tennis. In addition, golf is offered for a fee. Guests of the hotel can choose from a wide range of indoor sporting options, with a gym, table tennis, pool/billiards and gymnastics, or for a fee, bowling. The hotel offers a range of wellness options, including a sauna, a steam bath, a hammam and massage treatments, or for an additional fee, a spa. Further available options include a kids' club. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, dinner and half board. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Ozukara 1 Apart

All units come with flat-screen satellite TV. All units at Ozukara Apart 1 feature air conditioning. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have a sea view or balcony. The property provides 24-hour reception providing concierge services. Other facilities like a tour desk and luggage storage are also offered. Free public parking is possible at a location nearby. Daily breakfast is served in breakfast plate. Lunch and dinner can be served with a la carte service. You can also buy food and drinks from the on-site supermarket. Milas-Bodrum Airport is located 38 km away.

name: Amfora Hotel
address: Yahsi Yalisi, Ortakent, Bodrum 48400

Bathroom comes with a shower and a hairdryer. The hotel’s restaurant, with both indoor and outdoor seating areas, serves lunch and dinner in buffet and à la carte style. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning. Refreshing drinks can be ordered from the bar. Guests can relax on the sun loungers on the beach or play a game of table tennis. Room service, laundry and currency exchange, as well as car rental and dry cleaning are available. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 47 km from Amfora Hotel. A shuttle service can be arranged on request at an additional fee.

Daily breakfast and dinner is served in buffet style. You can also taste local and international dishes at the à la carte restaurant. The bar serves refreshing cocktails and drinks. The pool and beach area is ideal for sunbathing and relaxation. Airport shuttle service can be provided at a surcharge. Water sports facilities are available on the beach. Only 6 km to Bodrum Marina, Okaliptus Hotel is less than 8 km to the Bodrum Castle. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 42 km away.WebBeds

The elegant rooms of Club Shark Hotel are decorated with modern furniture in light colours. They all include air conditioning, LCD TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi is also provided in the rooms. The restaurant serves a variety of delicious dishes in open buffet style. Guests can choose to have their meals indoors or outdoors. The hotel’s bar offers refreshing drinks at the pool side. You can also enjoy refreshing drinks, snacks and meals at the beach area at a surcharge. The spa centre includes a sauna and a Turkish bath. There is also a well-equipped fitness centre. Guests can relax with massages after a workout. Bodrum city centre is 2 km from Hotel Club Shark with numerous shops, bars and popular nightclubs. Bodrum Milas Airport is 42 km away.

The hotel also has a Turkish bath and a spacious outdoor pool. The resort is located 55 km from the Milas-Bodrum Airport and a 25-minute drive from the centre of Bodrum.

description: This hotel is located in the west of the beautiful peninsula of Bodrum. The hotel lies just a short distance away from a 200-metre long bay, which is lines with a sprawling beach. The hotel is located just 25 km away from the centre of Bodrum. This luxurious hotel tempts guests with the promise of a truly unforgettable experience. The guest rooms are lavishly appointed, beautifully showcasing the splendour of Turkish style. The hotel features a seemingly boundless array of exemplary facilities, meeting the needs of every type of traveller to a high level of excellence.FarePortal

There are many shops, restaurants and entertainment venues within 500 metres. Milas Airport is 35 km away.

Marine Shopping Centre and the popular bars of Bodrum are just a few steps away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Tropicana Beach Hotel
