Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Bronze Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Bronze Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Bodrum unforgettable.Agoda

name: Smart Holiday Bodrum
address: Gumbet Mh, Adnan Menderes Cd. No:62 Mugla, Bitez 48400
description: Just 120 metres from Gumbet Beach, Costa Akkan Suites All Inclusive features an outdoor pool with sun loungers and parasols as well as free Wi-Fi in public areas. Spa facilities include Turkish bath, sauna and massage. The air-conditioned accommodation at Costa Akkan Suites comes with a satellite TV and a minibar. The units feature a balcony or terrace offering sea, pool, garden or city views. Guests can sample a range of Turkish and international cuisine dishes at the all-inclusive hotel’s many dining options including the buffet restaurant, the a-la-carte restaurant, pool bar, and the snack bar. Only 500 metres from the centre of Gumbet, other dining options are also available in the vicinity. Various sports activities and shows, including traditional Turkish night show are organised by hotel’s entertainment staff. Table tennis, darts, backgammon and chess are also available. The 24-hour front desk arranges daily boat tours. The lively nightlife street is 500 metres from the property. The town centre of Bodrum with its Museum of Underwater Archeology and castle is 4 km away. Bodrum Milas Airport is 38 km away.

name: Seckin Best Hotel
address: Doktor Mümtaz Ataman Caddesi, No 36 Bodrum, Bodrum -
description: Only a 10-minute walk from the beach, Seckin Best Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, and an outdoor pool surrounded by sun loungers and parasols. The lively bar street of Bodrum is just 500 metres away. All rooms include a satellite TV, minibar and a private bathroom. There is a balcony in some rooms. Some rooms also offer pool and mountain views. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at Hotel Seckin Best. The restaurant also offers dishes from Turkish cuisine with an à la carte menu. You can enjoy refreshing drinks from the pool bar throughout the day. Bodrum Castle is 1.5 km from the hotel. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 35 km away.

name: Breeze Beach Hotel
address: Kasif Ertekin Sk. No:12, Bodrum 48400
description: A stay at Breeze Beach Hotel places you in the heart of Bodrum, within a 5-minute drive of WOW Beach and Bitez Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: west coast boutique hotel
address: Turgut Özal Caddesi turgutreis mah no 409, Bodrum 48400
description: West coast boutique hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Bodrum City. Among the various facilities are a bar, water sports facilities, as well as a private beach area. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen, room service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Each room includes a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a patio and others also provide guests with city views. At west coast boutique hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. West coast boutique hotel offers a hot tub. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Farsi at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Soytas Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Fener Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 61 km from west coast boutique hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lusso Glamping Bodrum
address: Gölköy Mah. Atatürk(gölköy) Cad. No: 1 İç Kapi No: 2, Bodrum 48960
description: No description found

name: Dorman Suite Double.
address: Halilim Caddesi6, Bodrum 48470
description: Dorman Suites Hotel, which aims to make your experience unforgettable by bringing a different perspective to traditional holiday understanding,consist of 42 suites and grand suites. Our suites are available in categories with Aegean sea, nature and pool view. Dorman Suites Hotel is designed with the Inspiration of Aegean architecture, decorated with fruit trees, olive trees, bougainvilleas and several other flowers, located in only 200 meters from Bitez and Bitez Beach and 5 km from Bodrum, the favorite holiday and entertainment destination of the Aegean. You can have a massage in the greenery of our hotel, enjoy the sunset with a drink by the pool, do yoga on the lawn, ride a bicycle with our free bikes and discover the beauty of Bitez. In our quality restaurant which presents the distinguished tastes of the Aegean and Mediterranean Cuisine, we hope that you will enjoy our special menus and delicious cocktails and drinks, in a decent atmosphere away from noise and crowds. We will be honored to welcome you in both summer and winter months with our friendly staff who have adopted the principle of quality service and the satisfaction of our guests. You may even walk to the famous Aquarium Bay of Bodrum with its turquoise-colored clear water and sea life. Additionaly you may also visit famous historical and cultural places like Bodrum Castle, Myndos Gate, Halicarnassus Mausoleum, Museum of Underwater Archeology, Pedasa Antique City and the ancient theater of Bodrum.You can review the main features of our facility which has been designed up to the finest details for you to have in order to be able to travel with the memories of holiday, peace and happiness.VRBO

name: The Mara Suite
address: Dirikan Sok. No 8, Bodrum 48400
description: Set in Bodrum City, 1.7 km from Yalikavak Public Beach, The Mara Suite offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a restaurant. Featuring a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. At The Mara Suite each room is equipped with a seating area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 18 km from The Mara Suite, while Pedasa Antique City is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 58 km from the hotel.

name: Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center
address: Silahsor Cad. No: 42 Bomonti Sisli, Istanbul 34381
description: Enjoy contemporary luxury at Hilton Istanbul Bomonti Hotel & Conference Center, the largest of its kind in the city. Located in the central area of Sisli, adjacent to the former Bomonti Beer Factory, which is today’s new entertainment hub, this impressive, 34-story hotel offers easy access to many Istanbul attractions, historical buildings, shopping malls and neighboring business districts. Unwind in an elegant, air-conditioned guest room at this Istanbul hotel with a range of amenities, including ergonomic work areas, WiFi (fee applies) and floor-to-ceiling windows. Upgrade to an executive room or suite for exclusive Executive Lounge access. Gaze upon the Marmara sea from an executive sea view room. With a wealth of flexible meeting spaces, including a grand ballroom with a capacity of 3000, this stunning hotel is perfect for business meetings and glamorous celebrations in Istanbul. A business center offering a range of services and amenities and a professional team of staff are available, to help ensure a truly unforgettable event. Enjoy breathtaking Bosphorus and city views from the rooftop bar Cloud 34, located on the 34th story and dine in style in our all-day dining restaurant, The Globe. Maintain your fitness regime with the very latest exercise equipment in the modern, 24-hour fitness center, soothe tired muscles in the Turkish bath or treat yourself to a luxurious massage in the expansive eforea Spa. Cool down in the indoor or outdoor swimming pools or unwind with a drink at the pool bar as you soak up the Turkish sunshine.Hilton

name: Fairmont Quasar Istanbul
address: Buyukdere Caddesi, 76, Istanbul 34393
description: A city with a rich history and colorful culture, Istanbul has always been a favorite destination for travelers from around the world. If you are planning to visit this wonderful city soon, you can make your stay worthwhile by choosing Fairmont Quasar Istanbul, where luxury heritage meets eclectic energy. Located in the city center, Fairmont Quasar Istanbul is a five-star luxury hotel that provides a unique experience to its guests that come to stay, celebrate, or do business.accorhotels.com

name: Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus
address: Cumhuriyet Cad. No:50, Harbiye, Istanbul 34367
description: Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus, with its beautifully landscaped gardens and stunning Bosphorus views, is an oasis of serenity amid the bustle of one of the world's most vibrant cities. As the longest operating Hilton Hotel internationally, we have offered traditional Turkish hospitality, first-class comfort, and timeless elegance since 1955. The hotel's location in Istanbul's city center ensures that is just a short walking distance to Taksim Square, the upmarket district of Nisantasi, and the Istanbul Congress Center. It is just 45 km from Sabiha Gokcen International Airport, and 45 km from the New Istanbul Airport. All rooms offer private balconies which combine to create a resort-style atmosphere. Hilton Istanbul Bosphorus offers cuisine alternatives including famous Turkish cuisine, Cantonese, and Mediterranean delights from awarded Hilton chefs. The hotel has hosted numerous global and local conferences and meetings since 1955 with its extensive indoor and outdoor event spaces- 27 meeting rooms including Hilton Ballroom and Conference Center, and boardrooms that accommodate 10 to 3,000 guests.Hilton

name: Novotel Istanbul Karakoy
address: Kemankes Caddesi No: 57-59, Istanbul 34425
description: Hotel that makes every moment matter. Istanbul offers a wide variety of choices to visitors with its historical background, modern architecture and business opportunities. Novotel Istanbul Bosphorus Hotel has a splendid situation among the most preferred hotels on the European side. Its perfect location in Karaköy, comfortable and stylish rooms, flavors from ethnic to international dishes and modern facilities make our Hotel a highly preferable five-star accommodation venue in Istanbul.accorhotels.com

name: Grand Hyatt Istanbul
address: Harbiye Mah. Taskisla Caddesi No.1, Istanbul 34367
description: Located in the heart of the city, this luxurious Istanbul hotel is within walking distance from Taksim Square, and main convention and exhibition centres. It offers an outdoor pool, a spa and fitness centre, and modern meeting rooms. Grand Hyatt Istanbul has luxury rooms decorated in light colours. All rooms include a seating area, LCD TV and a work area. The marble bathrooms come with a bath tub and a glass-enclosed rain shower. Free wiFi is available in the rooms. ‘34’ offers wide culinary variation and features both regional Turkish and Mediterranean cuisine. Mezzanine Lounge & Bar is the perfect place to relax in the cozy and live atmosphere. The Library Bar offers a relaxing atmosphere reflecting the style of English Gentlemen’s Clubs. On sunny days, there is nothing more refreshing than a barbecue and cocktails by the pool at the Gazebo. Gaia Spa&Fitness Centre offers modern spa treatments and authentic hammam rituals. There is also a floodlit tennis court on site. Taksim Metro Station is only 400 metres from Grand Hyatt. The historical Sultanahmet area is 5 km away including Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia and Blue Mosque. Ataturk Airport is within 20 km. Private parking is available on site for an additional fee. Istanbul Airport is 50 km from Grand Hyatt Istanbul.

name: Pera Palace Hotel
address: Mesrutiyet Cad. No. 52, Istanbul 34430
description: LUXURY ACCOMMODATION IN ISTANBULBecome a witness of the past with a stay in our rooms previously graced by Agatha Christie and Ernest HemingwayA preserved neo-classical icon dating back to the 19th century, the Pera Palace Hotel is a uniquely atmospheric context of the remarkable history, comfort following the conditions of the modern world and serene overlooks. Blend of neo-classical, art nouveau and oriental style; the building sketched with 115 rooms including 16 suites. Each one distinctively shaped to display unique details and to combine with the more than a hundred years of history that provide the hotel its incomparable grace.Pera Palace Hotel is offering a unique ambiance of modern elegance that recognizes the landmarks 19th century fashion. The rooms and suites are gracefully furnished with a mix of tailor-made furnishings, fine antiques and delicately fancied art objects that underline outstanding care to detail.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Sapphire
address: Ibnikemal Caddesi No:14 Sirkeci, Istanbul
description: Sapphire is a classic Ottoman-style hotel located 500 meters from the Topkapi Palace in Istanbul’s Sultanahmet. It features free WiFi access. Sultanahmet, which houses many historic landmarks, is within a walking distance. Rooms at Hotel Sapphire combine wooden furnishings and damask fabrics with modern satellite TV channels and air conditioning. Each room includes en suite bathrooms with bathtub and hairdryer. Each morning, a rich breakfast buffet is offered with a wide selection of ingredients. Traditional Turkish cuisine is served at the restaurant of the hotel and room service is also available. The street hotel is located on a street closed to traffic and you can sit outside and relax with a cold drink. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services can be offered upon request at an extra fee. Currency exchange is also provided. The 24-hour staff at the Sapphire hotel can help plan visits and excursions to nearby Blue Mosque and renowned Grand Bazaar. They can also arrange an airport shuttle service upon request. Istanbul Airport is 52 km away.

name: Intercontinental Istanbul, An IHG Hotel
address: Asker Ocagi Cad No: 1 Taksim, Istanbul 34435
description: Located in the modern Taksim district, the high-rise InterContinental Istanbul hotel has superior rooms and suites with breathtaking views over the Bosphorus and the historic city skyline. Our state-of-the-art meeting facilities include three ballrooms and can accommodate up to 900 people. Exceptional on-site dining offers everything from gourmet buffet breakfasts to traditional Turkish cuisine. Guests can unwind with a soothing massage or gentle swim in our acclaimed SPA InterContinental.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Marmara Taksim
address: Taksim Square, Istanbul 80090
description: The Marmara Taksim is an unforgettable Istanbul luxury hotel located in a landmark building in the heart of the city's Taksim Square. The hotel is located conveniently close to Ataturk Airport, and has a metro station across the street. There is a range of international dining options available at the Marmara Taksim hotel, offering everything from a buffet lunch to authentic Turkish dinner. The hotel features vast meeting and function spaces with 12 meeting and breakout rooms. Rest and relaxation facilities include a spa, massage rooms, solarium, Turkish bath, and sauna. Part of the WorldHotels Elite collection. The hotel features 388 deluxe rooms, along with 61 Marmara Club rooms offering an exclusive hotel experience. Club rooms offer panoramic views of the Bosphorus, Golden Horn and Istanbul city. All rooms feature stylish design and cutting edge amenities. To stay in a top Istanbul luxury hotel, please see our rates and availability for the Marmara Taksim.bestwestern.com

name: Sheraton Istanbul City Center
address: Haci Ahmet Mah, Kurtulus Deresi Cad. No:23 Beyoglu, Istanbul 34440
description: Sheraton Istanbul City Center, a LEED Gold certified hotel located in the bustling Beyoglu district, is the ultimate place to catch up with friends, organize business meetings, host unforgettable events and experience Istanbul to the fullest. With 254 spacious and stylish guest rooms welcoming both leisure and business travelers, the hotel offers comfort and convenience while respecting the environment. Inspiring food and beverage concepts aim to deliver a memorable journey from traditional Turkish cuisine at The Souq İstanbul, exquisite breakfast at Nev-i Lokma, casual, young, and energetic ambiance with crafted food and drinks at Graffitication Bar, well-deserved cups of coffee at Istanbul Baking Company to charming cocktails at The Legends Bar and privacy at Sheraton Club Lounge. Sheraton Istanbul City Center also invites you to experience an immersive culinary journey with Le Petit Chef, the world's smallest chef.Marriott

name: Divan Istanbul
address: Asker Ocagi Cd. No:1, Taksim, Sisli, Istanbul 34367
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Istanbul. It also offers free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. This modern hotel provides an on-site fitness centre, a 24-hour reception and a concierge. Airport transfers, a laundry service and a dry cleaning service are available upon request. It also has its very own wellness centre, Divan Istanbul Spa. Rooms are air-conditioned and have top-of-the-range amenities such as a mini bar, a pillow menu and a flat-screen TV. They feature tea and coffee making facilities, a laptop safe and a telephone. Divan Istanbul features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day with dinner and a drink. Eateries at the hotel include Divan Patisserie and Divan Lokanta. A variety of dining options are also found in the area. Istanbul's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Divan Istanbul, with BJK Inonu Stadium, Taksim Square and the Monument of the Republic only 10 minutes away. The hotel also offers parking for those travelling by car.Revato

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul - Moda
address: Caferaga Mh Albay F Sozdener Cd 31, Istanbul 34710
description: Welcome to the first Hilton Worldwide hotel on the Asian side of Istanbul. The DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul-Moda hotel offers upscale accommodations and the most convenient of locations on the Asian side of Istanbul. Located in the heart of the bustling commercial center of Kadikoy and the historic residential district-Moda, the hotel enjoys a prime coastal position within a 5 minute walk of the Kadikoy Ferry Docks. This luxury Istanbul hotel is less than 30 minutes from either Istanbul International Airport (IST) or Sabiha Gökcen International Airport (SAW) (by car or shuttle). Situated within walking distance of the Kadiköy Bus Station, and soon the new underground station, the Hilton Istanbul-Moda hotel is the perfect choice when staying in the lively and cosmopolitan district of Moda-Kadiköy on the Anatolian side of the Bosphorus. Modern hotel conveniences, Istanbul magic Vibrant and contemporary with eclectic cultural touches, our new Istanbul hotel offers a variety of guest rooms and suites with a long list of pampering guest amenities and the majority offer spectacular views of the Old Town Peninsula in Istanbul from the Marmara Sea Banks. Enjoy generous work surfaces, flat panel TVs, our luxurious Sweet Dreams bedding and wireless internet access at the DoubleTree by Hilton. Our guests also enjoy full use of convenient hotel amenities like: - Fitness Centre with weight, cardio and exercise rooms - Spa with massage rooms and sauna, steam room and hammam - Complimentary internet access in all guestrooms and public spaces - Sparkling indoor pool - Roof-top infinity pool with panoramic views - 24-hour in-room dining Taste the world at our luxury Istanbul hotel Enjoy a variety of exciting cuisines at one of our inviting hotel restaurants, including a selection of local and international dishes served buffet or a la carte style for breakfast, lunch and dinner daily at The Doubles Restaurant. Join colleagues for our DoubleTree Signature cocktails and snacks in the La Gazetta Cafe and Bar or meet friends or someone special for cocktails at the Rooftop Bar overlooking Istanbul city lights. Other choices include an a la carte dinner at HOO Restaurant, Bar Patisserie for a variety of cakes, tarts, pies and chocolates. And do not forget to start the day right with our extensive DoubleTree Breakfast Buffet. Do business in Istanbul at the DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul-Moda hotel We offer 12 flexible meeting rooms, most with natural daylight and sea views, to serve your corporate or business travel needs. A well-equipped 24-hr Business Centre and wireless HSIA will keep you connected and productive while away from the office. And the ambiance couldn't be finer. Just let us know how we can make your next Istanbul meeting, seminar, conference or social event a memorable success. Stay in the middle of it all Our hotel is near everything, so there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tennis courts and jogging trails are within walking distance. The Moda peninsula and KadikÃy, known as an entertainment district, has miles of colorful narrow streets lined with cafes, shops, bars and eateries. Visit historic Istanbul churches, monuments and parks, Bagdat Street and Kalamis Yacht Marina. Marvel at the architecture, the minarets and the lovely fountains. Let our concierge help you find the perfect Istanbul restaurant, whatever your budget and taste. Whether you come to Istanbul on business or pleasure, our caring staff looks forward to welcoming you the DoubleTree by Hilton on the Asian side with our signature, warm chocolate chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Conrad Istanbul Bosphorus
address: Cihannuma Mh., Saray Cad. No 5, Besiktas, Istanbul 34353
description: Centrally located in the lively Besiktas area, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Bosphorus. Ortakoy, Dolmabahce Palace and Vodafone Stadium are nearby while Zorlu, Kanyon, Metrocity and Ozdilek shopping malls and the Nisantasi district are a short drive away. Conrad Istanbul Bosphorus has everything travelers need including complimentary WiFi, a 24-hour health club with Turkish hammam, two swimming pools, a separate children's pool as well as covered and open clay tennis courts. Conrad Bosphorus Suite Services* feature in-room check-in, a special VIP set up and fresh flowers in the suite. Luxurious bathroom amenities are personalized, and we offer a complimentary ironing service for 3 pieces of clothing. In addition, the services include Executive Lounge access and two hours of complimentary meeting room time for five people, subject to availability. Summit Bar serves fabulous cocktails and offers a 270-degree city view from the terrace. Guests can also enjoy delicious Mediterranean cuisine at Manzara. The hotel has been recognized by World Travel Awards such as 'Türkiye's Leading Business Hotel', 'Türkiye's Leading Conference Hotel', 'Europe's Leading Conference Hotel', and 'World's Leading City Hotel' in 2021. This Conrad hotel features 3,000 sq. m. of function space, a 15th floor Bosphorus Lounge and terraces with a panoramic view. *Service does not apply to Family Suites and Day use suites.Hilton

name: Istanbul Marriott Hotel Sisli
address: Abide-i Hurriyet Street, Sisli, Istanbul 34381
description: Explore the many wonders of this historic city once the seat of the Ottoman Empire when you stay at Istanbul Marriott Hotel Sisli. Boasting a prime location in the city center our 5-star hotel places you within easy reach of world renowned sites including the Grand Bazaar, Taksim Square and Topkapi Palace. Shop the new, more Western influenced Cevahir Mall for all the latest styles from Europe and Asia. Take in breathtaking views of the Bosphorus or the city from floor to ceiling windows in our modern rooms, book a soothing service from our onsite spa, swim in our indoor pool or remain fit at our 24 hour gym. Our hotel also offers a variety of onsite dining options including an all day restaurant, a bar, a Starbucks coffee shop and an Executive Lounge. If a business meeting or social gathering brings you to Istanbul, you will find our extensive venues, exemplary services and custom catering provide the backdrop to ensure success. We look forward to helping you create lasting memories.Marriott

name: Sofitel Istanbul Taksim
address: Gumussuyu Mah Siraselviler Cad No 13 Taksim, Istanbul 34437
description: Founded in the location of a historical theatre and music hall from the 70s, Sofitel Istanbul Taksim sits in the heart of the city, with unique views of Taksim Square and the mesmerizing Bosphorus. As past and present converge in unique settings, we welcome you to discover Turkey from the comfort of a 5-star hotel with sea view rooms and suites, an authentic spa, impeccable dining options including a rooftop bar, and a business-ready Club Millesime. Stay in central Istanbul and dare to explore.accorhotels.com

name: Sheraton Bursa Hotel
address: Odunluk Mah.Akpinar Cad.no:4, Bursa 16110
description: The Sheraton Bursa Hotel welcomes you to stay in comfort and style in this historic yet modern city. Located around upscale residences, close to recreation and nature parks, shopping malls, and developing business offices the hotel is near Bursa's city center, renowned thermal baths, and popular skiing areas. Our 171 guest rooms feature such modern amenities as High-Speed Internet Access, as well as familiar Sheraton touches, including the plush Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience. Gather together over Turkish and International cuisines at Tiene Vida Restaurant, lobby bar, Club Lounge, and Prusa Terrace. In our lobby, feel free to surf the web on our computer workstations or bring your laptop for complimentary wireless High-Speed Internet Access. The business center can also help you stay in touch with the office and provide support services.Marriott

name: Lugal, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Ankara
address: Noktali Sokak No. 1, Kavaklidere, Ankara 06700
description: Explore Lugal, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Ankara situated right in the heart of the city. Our picture-perfect location is in Kavaklidere where you are only steps away from exclusive shopping choices, business and social life of the city. Lugal, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Ankara has 90 rooms which most of them are 60sqm with grand windows washed with sunlight and a great city view. Ankara’s most experienced Concierge and personalized Butler service team have one mission in common; to provide an unforgettable stay for every guest. We offer an exquisite on-site restaurant; Aruni. The elegant venue is a proud corner of the Lugal, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Ankara with an indigenous menu. Visit Lugal, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Ankara and allow us to showcase our renowned authentic hospitality.As a Green Key certified hotel, we aim to prevent climate change and contribute sustainable tourism by water&energy saving and environmental management.Marriott

name: Sheraton Ankara Hotel & Convention Center
address: Noktali Sokak Kavaklidere, Ankara 06700
description: Sheraton Ankara Hotel & Convention Center is an architectural marvel located at the city center. Rising above the city with the stunning view. Besides an on-site workstation, 24-hour room service and Health Club with 24-hour accessible fitness area, our premium 5-star hotel offers an indoor pool, massage services, golf simulation, squash and tennis courts, along with one of the city’s most distinguished restaurant and a spectacular jazz bar. Our 306 rooms create contemporary feel through warm and inviting colors. Host your next meeting or event at our conference hotel. We offer plenty of on-site parking, hi-tech meeting spaces and superb catering, let our team help you plan your successful event. As a Green Key certified hotel, we aim to prevent climate change and contribute sustainable tourism by water & energy saving and environmental management.Marriott

name: Sheraton Grand Samsun Hotel
address: Liman Mahallesi Ataturk Bulvari No:55, Samsun 55100
description: With its unique location, the Sheraton Grand Samsun Hotel enjoys magnificent views of the black sea. The hotel is within walking distance of the city’s business, shopping and entertainment districts and the transportation network. It is an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers alike who value the hotel’s personalized service. Our 1,750 square meter spa and fitness facilities offer you a sauna and steam room, yoga and Pilates room, relaxation parlor, 7 treatment rooms, indoor pool, fitness center and a spa terrace. At our on-site Feast Restaurant, enjoy local and intercontinental flavors with a magnificent sea view located on the lobby floor. The restaurant, Ristorante Fora, overlooks the Black Sea and the ancient light house and will offer you delicious flavors.Marriott

name: Movenpick Living Istanbul
address: 15 Temmuz Mah Gulbahar Cad, Büyükçekmece 34212
description: Our commitment is providing a superior choice of hospitality experience where guests are valued as family members where in a unique Guest experience is fashioned as warm caring, personalized engaging, informal friendly. For our guest this means unparallel ed hospitality experience. For investors and property developers, it translates to maximum business yield and value. This service philosophy has given us excellent Guest Review scores on many public rating platforms like Trip Advisor, accorhotels.com

name: The Conforium Hotel Van
address: Hafiziye Mah., Sihke Cd. No:217/1, Van 65100
description: Situated in Van, 2 km from Van Museum, The Conforium Hotel Van features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At The Conforium Hotel Van the rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegan or halal options. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre. The property has an in-house hammam, hairdresser's and business centre. Ataturk City Stadium is less than 1 km from The Conforium Hotel Van, while Van Bus Station is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Van Ferit Melen Airport, 5 km from the hotel.

name: Wyndham Ankara
address: 4 Cad 4 Sogutozu, Ankara 06530
description: Located in Söğütözü, Wyndham Ankara is situated at the heart of Ankara’s business and shopping district. It features an indoor pool and a spa with Turkish bath and massage facilities. Equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, the bright rooms at Wyndham Ankara also have large floor-to-ceiling windows. Each includes a work desk and private bathrooms with toiletries and courtesy slippers. Guests can enjoy a fusion of local specialities and international classics at the restaurant of the hotel. Refreshments and typical spirits are served at the lobby bar until late in the evenings. Popular nearby attractions include Ankara Citadel and Kocatepe Mosque, both within a 10 minute drive from the Wyndham Ankara hotel. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Grand Alacati Boutique Hotel
address: Alacati Mah. 11078 Sok. No 65, Alacati 35930
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 18 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Property Location With a stay at Grand Alacati Boutique Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Cesme, within a 10-minute drive of Ilica Beach and Oasis Aquapark. This hotel is 1.1 mi (1.7 km) from Alaçatı Çarşı and 3.7 mi (6 km) from Boyalık Beach. Dining A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 9 AM to 11 AM. name: Radisson Blu Hotel Trabzon
address: Boztepe Mh. Numan Gül Cd. Çamlık Sokak No: 2, Ortahisar, Trabzon 61030
description: Set in Trabzon, Radisson Blu Hotel Trabzon is 2.9 km from Hagia Sophia Museum and offers various facilities, such as a bar. The hotel is also 4 km away from Forum Trabzon Shopping Centre. There is an on-site restaurant and an indoor swimming pool. Featuring a private bathroom, some units at the hotel also boast a balcony and sea view. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception. The Museum of Trabzon is 900 metres from Radisson Blu Hotel Trabzon. The nearest airport is Trabzon Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Ordu
address: Nizamettin Mahallesi Boztepe Küme Evler No: 54 / 1, Ordu 52000
description: Featuring an indoor pool, Radisson Blu Hotel, Ordu is 4.2 km from Pasaoglu Konagi Museum. Guests can relax at the hotel's garden and terrace. Concierge service is offered for your convenience. A children's playground is also available. Boasting a modern décor, each room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, electric kettle and views of the city and the Black Sea. You will find a sofa in the room. You can sip your drink at the hotel's bar and enjoy your meals at the à la restaurant. Guests can also benefit from room service at their own room's comfort. Relax at Radisson Blu Hotel, Ordu's spa centre, hammam and sauna or indulge yourself with a massage. An equipped fitness centre is also featured. The nearest airport is Ordu Giresun Airport, 21 km away. Airport shuttle can be provided upon request at a surcharge.WebBeds

name: Shimall Hotel
address: Mücahitler Mahallesi Mahmut Ersoy Caddesi No:6, Gaziantep 27090
description: Set in Gaziantep, 3.3 km from Gaziantep Chamber Of Commerce, Shimall Hotel offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the sauna and the hammam, or enjoy city views. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. All rooms feature a safety deposit box. The hotel features amenities such as an on-site business centre and spa centre. Gaziantep Archeology Museum is 3.4 km from Shimall Hotel, while Kamil Ocak Stadium is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gaziantep Oğuzeli International Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Divan Gaziantep
address: Mucahitler Mah. Sani Konukoglu Bulv. NO:92/A Sehitkamil, Gaziantep 27090
description: Strategically located in the heart of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Gaziantep. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a sauna and an indoor pool. This luxury hotel provides a kids pool, massage services and a 24-hour reception. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a mini bar, tea and coffee making facilities and an in-room safe. They all offer a telephone and a desk. Guests of Divan Gaziantep can unwind at the on-site bar, ideally located for a drink. Divan Gaziantep is close to the area's tourist attractions, including the Gaziantep Zeugma Mosaic Museum, which is within walking distance. The Sirvani Mosque, the Gaziantep Museum of Archaeology and Gaziantep Kamil Ocak Stadium are easily accessible by car.Revato

name: Cook's Club Adakoy, Marmaris - Adults Only 'Plus 16'
address: Adakoy Mah. Kizilkum Mevkii No 110, Marmaris 48700
description: When you stay at Cook’s Club Adakoy, Marmaris – Adults Only in Marmaris, you'll be in a national park and 10 minutes by car from Marmaris Yacht Marina. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Ramada Plaza by Wyndham Rize
address: Engindere Mahallesi Sevgi Caddesi No 18, Rize 05300
description: Located in the heart of Rizes city center near beautiful beaches, our Ramada Plaza Rize hotel offers easy transportation options and stunning Black Sea views. We are well-situated close to landmark sites including the Rize Castle and Ziraat Botanic Tea Garden. If you are hosting a meeting or celebration, take advantage of our spacious conference rooms and event space.Wyndham

name: Sunprime C-Lounge Hotel - Adults Only
address: Ahmet Tokus Cad. No:7, Sok. No:1, Alanya 07400
description: Featuring free WiFi, a spa centre, indoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool, Sunprime C-Lounge - Adult Only offers accommodation in Alanya. The hotel has a sauna and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk, concierge service and hairdresser's at the property. This hotel has a private beach area and bike hire is available. Car hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Alanya Ataturk Square is 4.1 km from Sunprime C-Lounge - Adult Only, while Alanya Red Tower is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gazipasa Airport, 34 km from Sunprime C-Lounge - Adult Only.

name: Ozenturku Hotel
address: Pamukkale Mah. Şirin Sok. No:7 Pamukkale, Pamukkale 20280
description: Located only a 2-minute walk from Pamukkale travertines, Ozen Turku Hotel offers 24-hour front desk service. The hotel has a terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The rooms of Ozen Turku Hotel feature carpeted floors. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and a toilet. The hotel offers breakfast service each morning. For lunch and dinner, the restaurant serves an à la carte menu. Denizli city centre is 13 km from the hotel. Denizli Cardak Airport is 68 km away.

name: Shimall Deluxe
address: Mücahitler Mah. Mahmut Ersoy Cad. No:6/2, Gaziantep 27090
description: Located in Gaziantep, 3.4 km from Gaziantep Chamber Of Commerce, Shimall Deluxe provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, sauna, and hot tub, as well as a restaurant. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. All rooms include a safety deposit box. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a halal breakfast. Gaziantep Archeology Museum is 3.5 km from Shimall Deluxe, while Kamil Ocak Stadium is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Gaziantep Oğuzeli International Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Ng Enjoy
address: Sht. Cevdet Koç Cd. 69, Sapanca 54600
description: Located in Sapanca, 7.5 km from Masukiye Sifali Suyu, NG Enjoy provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, indoor pool and sauna, as well as a hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At NG Enjoy every room has bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a children's playground. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. SF Abasiyanik Park is 23 km from NG Enjoy, while Ataturk Stadium is 26 km away. The nearest airport is Cengiz Topel Naval Air Station Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Pamukkale
address: Pamuk Mah.Oguzkaan Cad.No:5, Pamukkale 20280
description: Hotel Pamukkale’s air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and are decorated in bright colours. They have a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Free parking is available and 24-hour front desk service is provided. Hotel Pamukkale is situated a 4-minute walk from the natural limestone hot springs pools. The ancient city of Hierapolis is an 8-minute drive away. Denizli bus terminal is 17 km from the property. Denizli - Cardak Airport is 69 km away. Property offers airport shuttle at an extra fee.

name: Peninsula Gardens Hotel
address: Andifli Sokak, Kaş
description: Situated in Kas, 5.2 km from Lycian Rock Cemetery, Peninsula Gardens Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as an indoor pool. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Peninsula Gardens Hotel the rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or halal options. Kekova Sunken City is 37 km from the accommodation, while Myra Rock Tombs is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Kastellorizo Airport, 15 km from Peninsula Gardens Hotel.

name: Akol Hotel
address: Kayserili Ahmetpasa Street, Kordonboyu,32, Çanakkale
description: Overlooking the Dardanelles Strait, The Akol is located in the heart of Canakkale, only a few steps from the seaside. The hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and views of the water. There is a rooftop bar, a panoramic restaurant and an outdoor pool. Akol Hotel’s rooms are comfortably furnished with a satellite TV, minibar, and a private bathroom with a bathtub, shower and hairdryer. There is 24-hour room service. Guests can listen to regular live music performances at the rooftop bar or taste Turkish cuisine in the spacious Akol Restaurant. The Radika Fish Restaurant boasts panoramic views of the Dardanelles Strait. After a dive in the pool, guests can relax on the poolside terrace or play a game of billiards. It is also possible to enjoy a cup of fresh tea in the lobby bar. The Akol offers free parking and a 24-hour reception. Çanakkale Airport is 2 km from the hotel. The ancient city of Troy is a 3-minute drive away.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Ankara
address: Bestepeler Mah. Yasam Cad. No:1, Ankara
description: Mövenpick Hotel Ankara provides five star, modern designed and technology integrated rooms during your stay in Ankara. Business trips and various organizations at the hotel will result in easy access to all over the city. It is close to the government buildings, ministries and many corporate headquarters. There are many restaurants with international cuisine, malls and recreation centers nearby. Accor provide you with the best accommodation services to ensure an entertaining stay in Ankara.accorhotels.com

name: Zorlu Grand Hotel Trabzon
address: Maras Caddesi 9, Trabzon 00000
description: Located in the centre of Trabzon, this 5-star hotel mixes traditional architecture with modern influences. Its rooms offer free high-speed WiFi and satellite TV. Facilities include a health club with an indoor pool. The property has also been certified by the Ministry of Culture and Tourism for being environmentally friendly. The rooms at Zorlu Grand Hotel are decorated with warm colours and wooden furniture. All rooms have a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities, and an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a separate seating area. Including sport channels, all rooms come with TiviBu, Dsmart and BeinSports channels. The Façuna Fish Restaurant serves fresh local and international seafood dishes. Guests can savour homemade cakes, cookies, and ice-creams at Zorlu Grand Cafe'Z. La Couronne D’or Restaurant offers gourmet dining in an elegant setting. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage at Zorlu Grand’s health club, which also features a fitness room, a sauna, and a traditional hammam. The tour desk on-site offers a variety of sightseeing tours around Trabzon. Sumele Monastery is 49 km while Uzungöl Lake is 95 km away. Hagia Sophia Museum is 3.5 km, Girls' Monastery and Boztepe are 1.5 km from Zorlu Grand. Ataturk's Pavillon is 5.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Trabzon Airport, 6 km away.

name: Çelik Palace Hotel Convention Center & Thermal Spa
address: Cekirge Cad No 79, Bursa 16070
description: Located just 200 metres from Ataturk Museum, this 5-star luxury hotel offers panoramic views of Bursa with a backdrop of the famous Uludag Mountain. Facilities include an outdoor pool and a spa centre offering many treatments and therapies. The stylish rooms of Hotel Çelik Palas Convention Center & Thermal SPA are decorated with elegant dark wooden furniture and carpeted floors. All rooms have free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Room service is available 24/7. The Çelik Café serves international cuisine with a terrace overlooking the city. The Celik Café offers light bites, and hot and cold beverages in a cosy ambience. Guests can get a variety of health and beauty treatments at the spa, which also features a sauna, Turkish bath and a fitness centre. A large pool is filled with natural thermal spring water. Himalayan miracle salt room provides treatments for upper and lower respiratory conditions, ear infection and skin conditions. Bursa Ataturk Stadium is 1.3 km from Hotel Çelik Palas Convention Center & Thermal SPA, and the Bursa Grand Mosque is 2.5 km away. Kultur Park is right opposite the hotel, the famous historical village of Cumalikizik is just a 20-minute drive away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Swissotel Buyuk Efes Izmir
address: Gaziosmanpasa Bulvari No 1, Izmir 35210
description: Izmir is known as the pearl of the west coastline of Turkey. It is a very popular destination for tourists visiting the Aegean beaches in summer and a commercial and cultural contact zone in autumn, winter, and spring. To cover the accommodation needs of these visitors, Swissotel Büyük Efes Izmir provides all the comfort and luxury expectations. Swissotel Büyük Efes Izmir is a popular venue for small and large-scale events such as meetings, conferences as well as wedding and reception organizations.accorhotels.com

name: Mövenpick Hotel Izmir
address: Cumhuriyet Blv 138, Izmir 35210
description: Located in the heart of the city and within walking distance to the business and shopping districts as well as the trade-fair grounds. It's the ideal starting point for visits to local attractions such as the world-famous ancient cities like Ephesus, Per gamon, Sardis, and Klazomenai and popular destinations such as Kusadasi, Cesme, Foca, and Bodrum. The 185 modern hotel rooms, including 36 Executive rooms and 17 Suites, extend the highest levels of comfort for business travelers.accorhotels.com

name: Ladonia Adakule
address: 9400 Bayraklidede Mevkii Kusadasi, Kusadasi 09400
description: Situated in a private cove, flanked by rocky shores, the elegant hotel Adakule sits on 52,000 m2 of land close to the popular holiday resort of Kuşadası, overlooking the shimmering waters of the Aegean Sea. The antique city of Ephesos is only 15 km away, while the Adnan Menderes Airport and the city of Izmir are at a distance of 75 km and 90 km, respectively. The hotel with its distinctive architecture offers a wide variety of services and amenities, such as an Aquapark with water slides and various outdoor pools. Sports facilities include a football pitch, tennis and basketball as well as a gym and several water sports facilities including a diving school. The restaurants offer a range of dishes from Aegean and Turkish food over Italian food to international cuisine. Some of the restaurants and bars have fantastic views, so that guests can enjoy the beautiful sunsets. An ideal place for couples and families with children.FarePortal

name: Lavin Otel
address: Gökpinar Mah. Atatürk Bulvari No:33, Denizli 20210
description: Located a 10-minute drive from Denizli city centre, Lavin Hotel & Spa offers an indoor pool and a gym. Guests can also benefit from the spa facilities, which include Turkish bath, sauna, steam room and massage treatments, at a surcharge. Modernly decorated, each room here will provide you with flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. You can enjoy lake view and mountain view from the room. The 24-hour front desk provides room service. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services can be offered at an extra fee. Free on-site parking is also available. You can start the day with a rich breakfast. You can also enjoy lunch and dinner at the on-site à la carte restaurant. The snack bar is ideal for a quick bite. Denizli Bus Terminal is within a 15-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Hal - Tur
address: Mehmet Akif Ersoy Bulvarı no:71, Pamukkale 20280
description: This family-run hotel offers contemporary accommodation and sauna along with free Wi-Fi. It is located opposite popular terraces of Pamukkale. Hotel Hal-Tur has sound proofed rooms of varying sizes, each equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, and a mini bar. Relaxation facilities at Hotel HAL-TUR include a hot tub, a large courtyard with swimming pool, children pool, an indoor pool and sauna. Hal-Tur is a short drive away from the Pamukkale, noted ancient spa, the nearby Laodikya, Ephesus, Kaklık caves, Buldan and Denizli. The hotel is less than a 10-minute walk away from Hierapolis.

name: Grand Amisos Hotel
address: Guzelyali Mah., 3006 Sok. No. 20/24, Samsun 55270
description: Jısut a few steps from the seafront, Grand Amisos Hotel is located in Atakum District of Samsum. Guests can benefit from the indoor pool, Turkish bath, sauna and gym free of charge. Salt room facilities are also provided at a surcharge. Free WiFi is accessible throughout the premises. The air-conditioned units at Hotel Grand Amisos feature a minibar, satellite TV and a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. Daily breakfast is served buffet style. For other meals, the a-la-carte restaurant offers various dishes from local and international cuisines. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Grand Amisos Hotel has a Blue Star Certificate for hygienic foods. Around-the-clock front desk service and free on-site parking is provided. There are numerous restaurants and supermarkets 150 metres from the property. Samsun city centre is 12 km away. Samsum Airport is within 30 km and airport shuttle services are arranged at a surcharge.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul Topkapi
address: Orta Mahalle, Anit Sokak: No: 1, Istanbul 34040
description: Situated on the European side of Istanbul, DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul Topkapi boasts a superb E100 location in Topkapi near Old Town and historic attractions. The hotel is just a few kilometers away from textile, machinery and printing producer sites. Public transport is easily accessible and Istanbul Atatürk Airport is just 11km away. Spanning 18 floors, this modern hotel offers elegant rooms and suites, many with panoramic bird’s eye views of the city, the Marmara Sea and the Princess Islands. Make use of complimentary WiFi or watch the 42-inch TV. A relaxing easy chair and tea/coffee facilities will help you feel at home. For extra space, select a suite with a separate living and dining area, two TVs and two bathrooms. Some suites feature a kitchenette. Turquaz Restaurant offers a vast breakfast buffet and is also available for group luncheons and dinners. Savor a delicious afternoon tea or unwind with drinks and small bites at the Lounge Café Bar with outdoor seating. Work out in the fully equipped fitness center, plunge into the indoor pool, luxuriate in the spa with a range of treatments or in the Turkish Hammam and steam rooms for men and women. This Istanbul hotel features 2,500 sq. m. of meeting space including a pillarless ballroom with a modern foyer, exclusive entrance and two open air terraces, excellent for weddings. Our dedicated meeting floor with flexible options and the adjacent foyer is ideal for medium-sized meetings, and our Vip Lounge is perfect for boardroom meeting.Hilton

name: Kitapevi Hotel
address: Kavakli Mah Burcustu Sok No: 21, Bursa 16040
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Bursa City Center, Kitapevi Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Bursa has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Kitapevi Hotel.priceline.com

name: Ozkaymak Konya Hotel
address: Ahmet Hilmi Nalcaci Cd No 92, Konya
description: This elegant 4-star hotel has an indoor swimming pool, Turkish bath and a sauna. Mevlana Rumi Museum is less than a 10-minute drive away, and free Wi-Fi is accessible in all areas. Ozkaymak Konya Hotel boasts picturesque city views from its Teras Bar & Restaurant where guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in à la carte style. The Lobby Bar serves drinks and refreshments in a relaxing atmosphere. Breakfast is offered in buffet style. The bright, airy guestrooms include air conditioning, a TV and a minibar. Bathroom comes with complimentary toiletries, a hairdryer and a shower or bath. Guests can work out in the fitness centre and relax with a soothing massage afterwards. Room service, tour desk and laundry, as well as ironing, currency exchange and car rental are available on site. Konya Airport is 10 km from Ozkyamak Konya Hotel. A shuttle service can be arranged on request with no additional cost between morning and evening hours.Free private parking is possible.

name: Oludeniz Turquoise Hotel
address: Carsi Cad. no:18, Fethiye 48340
description: Located only 600 metres from Oludeniz Beach, Oludeniz Turquoise Hotel offers an outdoor pool, sauna, hammam and a fitness centre. The hotel has a private beach area. The rooms of Oludeniz Turquoise Hotel include a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and a minibar. All rooms have a balcony. The restaurant serves dishes from Turkish and international cuisine. Breakfast and dinner are served in open buffet style. Terrace Restaurant also offers an à la carte menu. Fethiye city centre is 15 km from the hotel. Dalaman Airport is 65 km away.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Adana
address: Mithat Saraoglu Cdkurtulus Mh, Adana 01130
description: Experience the charm, warmth and friendly service of the DoubleTree by Hilton Adana. Located in the heart of the city, our hotel is within easy reach of local businesses and government offices. You’ll find great shopping, restaurants and area attractions including Tas Köprü (Stone Bridge), Büyük ve Küçük Saat (Big & Little Clock), and Historical Adana Train Station within walking distance. We are just minutes from local transport and only ten minutes from Adana International Airport. We’ll greet you at check-in with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie. Feel at home in a guest room with complimentary WiFi, satellite TV, a mini-fridge, ergonomic workspace, and plenty of outlets to charge your devices. Our suites offer a separate living area, larger bathroom with a whirlpool and cozy extras like bathrobes and slippers. Big Chefs offers all day dining featuring buffet breakfast and traditional roasts. Experience fusion bites and Turkish tastes in The Lounge Bar, relax in the Jazz bar offering creative cocktails and local and international spirits. Relax in your room and enjoy a tasty morsel to eat from our room service menu, available 24 hours. Get energized in our fitness room or chill out in the Spa. Take in 360 degree city views from the pool on the 8th floor. Host a meeting or event in one of our meeting rooms and ballroom ideal for conferences, banquets, meetings and weddings. We offer free WiFi internet access throughout the hotel, so you can keep working even when you're on the street.Hilton

name: Soothe Hotel
address: Akdeniz Cad. Meneke Sk. No: 2, Kaş
description: Soothe Hotel is favourably located on a headland on an inlet of the Mediterranean, known as Kalamar Bay, just around the corner from Kalkan's main marina. The Soothe Hotel features attractive traditional architecture, just 70 metres from the sea, with views overlooking the picturesque Bay of Kalamar. The elegant rooms are set in 6 separate blocks. Most rooms have a panoramic sea view. There is a large seawater swimming pool with Jacuzzi pool and children's pool. Take a refreshing dip and a bite to eat at the snack bar, or the terrace restaurant. Soothe Hotel has all the facilities for a relaxing holiday including a fitness centre and, at a small additional cost, Turkish Bath, sauna and massage. Take a trip to the centre of Kalamar bay, 1.5 km away. For longer excursions, rent a car. Alternatively, enjoy the water sports at the beach. Write home about it all using the free WiFi internet access. With a good appetite after a great day, have a tasty meal at either the indoor or outdoor restaurant. Dalaman Airport is 128 km from Soothe Hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Istanbul Sisli
address: 19 Mayis Cad. No 2 Sisli, Istanbul 34360
description: Located in Sisli, one of Istanbul's commercial centres, just 250 metres from Cevahir Shopping Mall, Radisson Blu Hotel, Istanbul Sisli offers an indoor pool, an outdoor pool, a fitness centre a sauna and a Turkish Bath for your relaxation. 24-hour front desk and free WiFi are also accessible. Rooms here provide a flat-screen satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, air conditioning and an electric kettle. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and a bathrobe. A seating area, desk and ironing facilities are also found in rooms. Some rooms have access to Business Lounge which offers tea time, wine, beer and soft drinks. Day starts with an open buffet breakfast Radisson Blu Hotel, Istanbul Sisli. Lunch and dinner are served in à la carte style in the authentic Turkish style restaurant. Dining options include the traditional Turkish restaurant Hamdi and Steak n more Istan'bull Restaurant Guests can have a beverage or refreshment in hotel's café and bar. The pool bar is also open in summer season. Guests can also relax in the exquisite business lounge. Florence Nightingale Hospital is 2.2 km and Kolan International Hospital is 1.3 km from the property. Acibadem Fulya Hospital is 1.2 km away and Memorial sisli Hospital is 5 km from the property. Radisson Blu Hotel Istanbul Sisli within a short walk from metrobus station and Sisli metro station, which provides easy access to the other parts of the city as well as rail transit network. Taksim, Nisantasi and Osmanbey districts are all within walking distance. Istanbul Airport is 40 km away.

name: Akgun Istanbul Hotel
address: Adnan Menderes Bulv., Istanbul 34270
description: Situated in Istanbul, this hotel is located near the old city, where guests can easily visit Hagia Sophia Museum, Blue Mosque and Topkapi Palace. It has an outdoor pool with sun-lounger terrace, fitness centre, spa& wellness centre and Turkish bath. 24/7 room service is provided. Rooms at the Akgün Istanbul Hotel come equipped with air conditioning, electric kettle, LCD TV, sofa bed and a minibar. Private bathrooms come with free toiletries, bathrobe, hairdryer and slippers. All rooms have a seating area. Guests can enjoy massage, sauna and steam bath in the spa and wellness centre. Laundry services, hairdressers and a drugstore are available on-site. The hotel has a gift shop and a tour desk that assists with car hire and provides information on local attractions. There is an à la carte restaurant with a sun terrace that serves international cuisine and regional Turkish dishes. There is also a pool bar that offers refreshing beverages. Guests can also enjoy a variety of snacks and drinks as well as Starbucks in the lobby bar. Akgün Istanbul Hotel is located near the metro and bus stations where guests can reach everywhere including Taksim Square, Zorlu Shopping Centre, Istinye Park Shopping Centre and Tuyap Fair Convention and Congress Centre. It offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site private parking with valet service. Istanbul Airport is 51 km from the property. Airport shuttle is available at an additional charge.

name: Side Star Resort
address: Sancak Mh. Feslegenli Sk.,11/A, Side
description: This renovated beachfront hotel in Side offers 2 pools, a disco and various spa facilities. The rooms are elegantly decorated and have garden or sea views from their private balcony. With free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV, all of the elegantly decorated rooms offer lots of daylight and a small seating area. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. After a dip in the indoor or outdoor pool, guests can relax in the hammam or play tennis. Using the hotel’s watersport facilities, guests can go windsurfing or canoeing from the private beach. The property also offers an aqua park and a mini club. The main restaurant serves international dishes from morning till late evening. In addition, there are 3 bars and a pool bar serving afternoon cakes. The lounge with its dome-shaped ceiling offers a luxurious setting for a mint tea. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange car rentals and shuttle services to Antalya International Airport, 64 km away. Antalya’s lively city centre is a 1.5-hour drive from the hotel.

name: Duja Didim
address: Altinkum Mah. 240 Sokak, No 13/2, Didim 09270
description: Offerring a private beach area, fitness centre and an outdoor pool, Duja Didim Resort is located in Didim. Free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk are available. Each room features air conditioning, a balcony, seating area and a minibar. Equipped with a shower, private bathroom includes a hairdryer. Views of the garden and the sea are also available. The hotel offers all-inclusive service including open buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner at on-site restaurant. Local and imported drinks are included. Guests can relax at the sauna or hammam. Bicycle and car renting services are available on site. Kid's can play safely in the childrens' playground or enjoy their time in the kids' club. Babysitting services are also offered. The property is 6.1 km from Didim town centre and 6 km from Didim Bus Terminal. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 92.9 km away.

name: Grand Ankara Hotel Convention Center
address: Ataturk Bulvari No:183, Kavaklidere Mh., Ankara 06680
description: This hotel offers stylish rooms near the Parliament House. It has an indoor pool (swiming cap should for pool) a terrace and spa. Kizilay Metro Station is 900 metres away.Free WiFi throughout the property and private parking on site are available. Grand Ankara Hotel Convention Center has rooms with luxury furniture and bedding. Room amenities include an interactive flat-screen TV and a bathroom with deep soaking bath. Some have an in-room spa bath that overlook Ankara. Grand Ankara Hotel Convention Center features a state-of-the-art gym. Its wellness centre offers a variety of massages and dry and wet saunas. The Brasserie Restaurant’s buffet menu serves international cuisine throughout the day. Guests can enjoy tapas and other light dishes in the lobby bar. Grand Ankara Hotel Convention Center is a 10-minute drive from the shopping venues of Tunali Hilmi Caddesi. Kugulu Park is just 1.3 km away. Esenboga Airport is 30 km away.

name: Novia Lucida Beach Hotel
address: Aga Ceylan Caddesi No:8, Kemer 07990
description: Providing an indoor pool and a private beach, Lucida Beach is a deluxe place to stay in Kemer. It also offers a Turkish steam bath and a sauna. There are a range of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, such as a kids club, a beauty centre and a kids pool. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a playground and babysitting/child services. Rooms at Lucida Beach offer a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Antalya Airport is a 75-minute drive from Lucida Beach. The hotel's multilingual staff are available to ensure that every traveler has a comfortable stay.HotelsCombined

name: Buyuk Velic Hotel
address: Turkmenler Cad. 33, Gaziantep 27300
description: Hotel Büyük Velic offers free Wi-Fi and a variety of facilities in Gaziantep city. It is not far from Gaziantep Castle and the Silver Bazaar. There are comfortably furnished rooms and suites. Breakfast buffet is served daily at the restaurant. There is an indoor swimming pool as well as Turkish bath, sauna, and a gym. For entertainment, guests can pass long evenings at the hotel’s night club and disco bar. Büyük Velic has been offering hospitality since 1970. The experienced staff creates an inviting atmosphere for guests and can offer tips on what to do and see nearby.

name: Svalinn Hotel
address: Akcay Caddesi No:172 Gaziemir, Izmir 35410
description: Offering a terrace and spa centre, Svalinn Hotel is conveniently set in Gaziemir. An array of facilities, such as sauna and gym are provided. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Featuring an elegant décor, the rooms include a flat-screen TV and electric kettle. Some rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. The rooms come with a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. Superior rooms feature a spa bath or a hot tub as well. There is a 24-hour front desk, providing room service and concierge service at the property. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing services are also offered on request at an additional charge. You can enjoy daily breakfast served as an open buffet at the on-site restaurant. You can play billiards and darts at the hotel. Izmir Clock Tower is 10 km from Svalinn Hotel, while Kadifekale is 9 km from the property. Esbas Metro Station is 700 metres from Svalinn Hotel which offers easy access to city centre and other parts of the city. The nearest airport is Adnan Menderes Airport, 5-minute drive from the property. Gaziemir New Exhibition Centre is 5-minute while Izmir Fair Centre is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Divan Mersin
address: Akkent Mh Gazi Mustafa Kemal Bulv, Mersin (Icel)
description: Divan Mersin provides luxury 5-star accommodation in Mersin. It has a spa and wellness centre, as well as free Wi-Fi, an indoor pool and a sauna. There are a variety of facilities available to those staying at the hotel, including facial treatments, body treatments and car hire. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Divan Mersin provides 170 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Hot drinks can be made with the provided tea and coffee supplies. Divan Mersin features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of an evening with dinner and a drink.Revato

name: Ricosta Hotel
address: Alipasa Mahallesi Sahil Caddesi #1, Rize 53870
description: Located in Rize, 8.3 km from Rize Museum, Ricosta Hotel provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 5-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, indoor pool and sauna, as well as a hot tub. At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a sea view. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At Ricosta Hotel you will find a restaurant serving French, Mediterranean and Turkish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Activities such as hiking, fishing, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. The property has an on-site hammam, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Turkish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Rize University is 8.7 km from Ricosta Hotel, while Atatürk House Museum is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Trabzon, 64 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Oludeniz Blu Luxury Unique Hotel - Adults Only
address: Ölüdeniz Mahallesi, 242 Sokak, No: 3, Fethiye 48340
description: Ölüdeniz Blu Luxury Unique Hotel - Adults-Only has free bikes, seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and garden in Oludeniz. 1.1 km from Oludeniz Beach and 1.8 km from Oludeniz Tabiat Parki Beach, the property provides a terrace and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel the rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian options. At Ölüdeniz Blu Luxury Unique Hotel - Adults-Only you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Pizza cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. Kumburnu Beach is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Butterfly Valley is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dalaman Airport, 66 km from Ölüdeniz Blu Luxury Unique Hotel - Adults-Only.

name: Tripolis Hotel
address: Kale Mh Adnan Kahveci Bul No96 Pamukkale, Pamukkale
description: Located among terraces of carbonate minerals in Pamukkale, Tripolis Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony. It features an outdoor thermal pool, indoor pool, and a traditional hammam. The rooms at Tripolis feature a modern interior. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a seating area, and an electric kettle. Certain rooms feature pool and travertine view. The hotel's seasonal restaurant also has travertine view and serves traditional specialties from the Denizli region as well as international cuisine. Meals are served in buffet style. The bar offers a variety of soft drinks and local spirits. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage at the wellness centre, which also offers a sauna, steam room and a hot tub. You can benefit from traditional Turkish massage service in hammam and salt therapy room at an additional fee. Pamukkale’s celebrated hot springs are just a 10-minute walk from Tripolis Hotel, and the city centre is a 5-minute drive away. Denizli city centre is 15 km from the property, while Karahayit thermal area is 7 km away. Hierapolis Ancient City is located within 6 km of Tripolis Hotel. The nearest airport is Denizli Cardak Airport, 70 km from the hotel. Free parking is available on site and a shuttle service can be arranged upon request.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Afyonkarahisar
address: Selcuklu Mahallesi, Ali Cetinkaya, Afyon
description: Enjoy a welcoming stay at our new DoubleTree by Hilton Afyonkarahisar hotel, conveniently located next to the Akarcay River in the city center. Our modern hotel puts you close to local businesses, shops and attractions. Stroll along the river and enjoy scenic parks and historic sites just steps from our hotel. We will greet you at check-in with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie. Relax in a spacious guest room or suite with the latest technology, complimentary WiFi and large HDTV. Upgrade to a larger room or suite with additional space, a sofa bed and separate living room. Dine on-site for breakfast, lunch and dinner at our casual Larissa Restaurant, serving international and Turkish favorites. Take in the stunning view of Afyonkarahisar and the Akarcay River from our Sky 12 Bar, or enjoy light bites and signature cocktails at our lobby lounge. Daily room service lets you enjoy a relaxed meal in the comfort of your room. Keep up your fitness routine in our complimentary fitness center and get work done from our connectivity zone. Host your next conference or wedding at our Afyonkarahisar hotel, featuring 520 sq. m. of flexible meeting and event space for up to 400 guests.Hilton

name: mucize termal spa
address: Karahayit, Pamukkale 20190
description: Set in Pamukkale, 7.3 km from Pamukkale Travertines, Mucize Termal Spa offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The hotel has a sauna and room service. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a mountain view. Certain rooms also offer a kitchen with a stovetop. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Hierapolis, Pamukkale, Turkey is 8.3 km from Mucize Termal Spa, while Denizli Chamber Of Commerce is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Denizli Çardak Airport, 81 km from the accommodation.

name: Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent
address: Esentepe Mahallesi Buyukdere Caddesi No 177-183 Sisli, Istanbul 34394
description: Featuring luxurious interiors, Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent is located on Buyukdere Road. The hotel offers direct access to Levent Metro Station and numerous shopping malls including Ozdilek Park through underground connection. Guests can get a variety of health and beauty treatments at the 7900 m² extensive spa, including an indoor and outdoor pool, gym, sauna, and a Turkish bath. Tastefully decorated with fine furnishings, guest room management system, each air-conditioned room offers 47” flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Free WiFi and wired internet, a minibar, safe box and a work desk are also provided. There is an electric kettle with tea and coffee setup in each room. Iron and ironing board are available in all rooms. Most rooms also offer city views. All exclusive and suite rooms boast turndown service. The Hotel has connecting rooms in Deluxe city view and Deluxe Partial Sea view room categories. Connecting rooms can be arranged subject to availability and connecting room rate difference will be applied as EURO 82.50 (including taxes) per room per night. 7 dining outlets including buffet and à la carte restaurant and a lounge are available. You can start the day with a rich breakfast buffet boasting a wide range of products. The Plaza 177 Restaurant and Caréme Restaurant serve international cuisine and Turkish dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at Vertice Cafe & Brasserie or at the breezy terrace of Carême Restaurant. Taksim Square is just 4 stops away from Levent Metro Station. Metrocity and Kanyon shopping malls are within walking distance from Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent and Istinye Park is within 5 km. Istanbul Airport is 45.6 km from Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent.

name: Alesta Yacht Hotel
address: Yacht Harbour no:17, Fethiye 48300
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a private beach, this design hotel is located just opposite the Fethiye Yacht Marina. Property offers a spa and wellness centre, sauna and a hammam. Modernly designed, the rooms of Alesta have wooden floor and are decorated in soft colours. The rooms include a satellite TV, air conditioning, seating area and a desk. Some rooms also have a private spa bath and a balcony with sea views. Guests can savour various dishes from open-buffet style restaurant. The à la carte restaurant serves different specialties from the Mediterranean cuisine. Delicious cocktails can be enjoyed from the hotel's bar. Alesta offers a spa centre with a Turkish bath and a sauna. Guests can also get massages or relax in the spa bath. Alesta Yacht is only a 5-minute walk from the city centre and just 100 metres from the amphitheatre. The hotel is less than 15 km from the famous Blue Lagoon Beach. Paragliding is very popular in this area. Babadag where you can do paragliding is only 50-minute drive from Alesta Yacht Hotel. Famous Lycian Trail Way is 17 km away

name: Sundia Exclusive by Liberty Fethiye
address: Çalis Beach, Foca Mah.1085. Sok., Fethiye 48300
description: Sundia Fethiye by Liberty; our 5-star luxury facility offers for you a unique view in the Çalış Region, the attraction point of the city, the pedestrian path between the resort and the beach, guest rooms each with sea view, comfortable, spacious and suites where you feel the comfort of your home, outdoor swimming pool, concept restaurant and bars, fully equipped Spa and fitness center, conference and meeting halls equipped with the latest technology, the sea breeze that never stops even in the hottest summer days, an incredible sunset that you can encounter in very few parts of the world with its light show as it turns from orange to red, and most importantly, it offers unforgettable moments and memories. We invite you to Fethiye by LibertyViajes Exito Hotels

name: Blueberry Boutique Hotel
address: Foça Mah.Selim Günday Cad. No:93, Fethiye 48700
description: Situated in Fethiye, Blueberry Boutique Hotel is within walking distance from Calis Beach and entertainment venues. It offers an outdoor pool, indoor pool with heating, a Turkish bath, a sauna, and stylish rooms equipped with air conditioning and free WiFi. The soundproofed rooms of Blueberry Boutique Hotel are furnished in contemporary design. They all include a minibar and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Tea and coffee making facilities are available in the rooms. Some rooms also offer a private spa bath. You can have a nice dinner at the restaurant. Massage services can be provided. The Oludeniz Beach (Blue Lagoon) is 15 km, Dalaman Airport is 50 km away.

name: Armas Gul Beach
address: Yeni Mah, Ataturk Blv No. 81, Kemer 07980
description: Just a few steps from the seafront, the all-inclusive Armas Gul Beach Resort has an outdoor pool, a small water park and a terrace overlooking the Mediterranean Sea.
