It provides a direct access to the private beach area. Free on-site parking are possible. All units of the Armas Gul Beach Resort offer air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a shower, a bath, a hairdryer. Some balconies come with land views, whereas some have sea views. The resort includes a fitness centre, sauna and a Turkish bath. You can relax with the massage services and beauty treatments, or have fun with leisure facilities like darts and table tennis. The little ones can enjoy the children’s playground. The all-inclusive services include buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. You can also taste various dishes at the à la carte restaurant or sample various beverages at the bar. Antalya’s city centre is 40 km from the property, and Antalya Airport is 50 km away.

name: Shangri-La Bosphorus, Istanbul
address: Sinan Pasa Mah. Hayrettin Iskelesi Sok. No:1 Besiktas, Istanbul 34353
description: Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul is an elegant base when visiting Istanbul and is close to everything the area has to offer. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel features comfortable 5-star rooms and a lounge bar. Guests of Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul can start their day at CHI, The Spa, or use the many leisure amenities, such as an indoor pool. Facilities include free Wi-Fi, a sauna and an express check-in and check-out feature. The comfortable rooms at Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul include a mini bar, a marble bathroom and movies-on-demand. All provide tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul boasts convenient dining options, such as Mediterranean and Asian cuisines at IST TOO and Chinese meals at Shang Palace. In the evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. Shangri-La Bosphorus Istanbul is within a short walk of Dolmabahce Palace. The hotel's multilingual staff will make sure that every guest has an enjoyable stay.Revato

name: Lavista Boutique Hotel & Spa
address: Yilanci Burnu Mevkii No: 41, Kusadasi
description: LaVista has an outdoor pool overlooking the Aegean Sea. It features luxurious rooms with private balconies that offer panoramic views of the Seferihisar Bay. Set in a landscaped garden in Kuşadası, LaVista Boutique Hotel & SPA offers spacious rooms decorated with French Provence touches. They have free Wi-Fi access, a flat-screen TV and an espresso machine. Each comes with a private bathroom with amenities. Guests at LaVista Boutique Hotel & SPA can enjoy a sunset at the large poolside sundeck. Staff at reception is available 24 hours a day. Balıkcı A’La Carte restaurant serves a wide variety of seafood. The bar creates a relaxing atmosphere with drinks and music. On-site parking is offered free of charge.

name: Dosso Dossi Hotels & Spa Downtown
address: Vatan Caddesi No:46-48 Fatih, Istanbul 34080
description: Offering an indoor pool, a restaurant and bar and a spa and wellness centre in a stylish modern decor, Dosso Dossi Hotels Downtown is located on Vatan Avenue in Fatih. The historic Sultanahmet area is within 3 km. Each soundproofed room includes air conditioning, a minibar. Some rooms have a dining table,seating area and all have an electric kettle. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Dosso Dossi Hotels Downtown you will find a fitness centre, and a hammam and massage services are available. Other facilities offered at the property include a concierge desk and a guest relations desk. The hotel is 2 km from Suleymaniye Mosque, 2.4 km from the Grand Bazaar and 3.3 km from the Blue Mosque. Istanbul Ataturk Airport is 15 km away and can be reached by subway via nearby Emniyet-Fatih station, a 5-minute walk away. Istanbul Airport is 53 km away. When booking more than 7 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Kusadasi
address: Yat Limani Mevkii,122, Kusadasi 09400
description: DoubleTree by Hilton Kusadasi, a premier hotel located next to the marina and offering luxurious accommodations and exceptional service on Turkey's stunning Aegean coast. With sweeping views of the sea and a range of modern amenities, our hotel provides a comfortable and elegant retreat for both business and leisure travelers. Our spacious rooms, suites and stone houses are tastefully appointed with contemporary decor and high-end amenities, ensuring a comfortable and relaxing stay. Indulge in delicious cuisine at our on-site restaurants, where our skilled chefs prepare delectable dishes using only the freshest ingredients. Our outdoor pool and fitness center provide the perfect venues to relax and rejuvenate, while our state-of-the-art meeting facilities offer ample space for successful business and social events. Located in the heart of Kusadasi, DoubleTree by Hilton is just a short walk from the marina and nearby attractions, making it the ideal choice for discerning travelers seeking a sophisticated and comfortable experience. We look forward to welcoming you with our signature DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie and providing you with impeccable service throughout your stay.Hilton

name: Mozaik Hotel
address: 238 Sokak No. 1, Fethiye 48300
description: Located in a peaceful area between the mountains, Mozaik Hotel is just 600 metres from the beautiful Oludeniz Beach. It offers a large lagoon-style outdoor pool, fitness centre, and spacious rooms with private terraces and free Wi-Fi. Mozaik features bright rooms in whitewashed buildings set around the pool. They all include a private kitchen and a separate living room equipped with a seating area and an LCD TV. Some rooms offer direct access to the pool from their terraces. The à la carte restaurant serves unique tastes of Mediterranean cuisine. You can enjoy your meals on the terrace next to the pool. The pool bar offers refreshing drinks throughout the day. The hotel is within walking distance from the restaurants, bars and shops of Oludeniz. Dalaman Airport is 60 km away.

name: Xperia Saray Beach Hotel
address: Saray Mah. Ataturk Caddesi No: 151, Alanya 07400
description: Enjoying a private stretch of the Cleopatra Beach, this hotel features a seasonal outdoor pool. Relaxation facilities at Xperia include a Turkish bath, hot tub and massage rooms. Private balconies are featured in all air-conditioned rooms. Each comes with satellite TV, free WiFi and a minibar with free soft drinks. Individual bathrooms include hairdryers and toiletries. Xperia Saray Beach Hotel has 2 a la carte restaurants with indoor and outdoor areas. There is also a patisserie, 4 bars and free snack service at the beach. Guests can enjoy live Turkish music and beach parties at Xperia Saray. The hotel is located in Alanya, 40 km from Gazipasa Airport and 120 km from Antalya Airport.

name: Kervansaray Hotel & Pension
address: Pamukkale Kasabasi Pamuk Mahallesi Oguzkagan, Caddesi no1, Pamukkale 20280
description: With 25 years of experience, Kervansaray Hotel provides great-value accommodation and panoramic views of Pamukkale centre from the roof-top restaurant. Rooms are simply furnished, brightly decorated and some include private balconies. Some rooms also offer view of the famous travertine. Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool that is filled with thermal water, rich in calcium. Rich, home-made, Turkish cuisine is served for breakfast lunch, dinner in the hotel’s open-air roof top restaurant. Kervansaray Hotel is 5 minutes walking distance to museums, ancient ruins, and Pamukkale, which is famous for its hot springs.

name: Jiva Beach Resort
address: Calis Plaji 1104 Sokak No: 14, Fethiye
description: This attractively designed hotel lies within metres of Calis Beach and is surrounded by a natural lagoon, enjoying cooling sea breezes and superb sunsets. The centre of Calis is just less than 2 km away, while the market town of Fethiye just is 5 km and both can be easily reached by means of public transport. Cafe bars and restaurants can be reached by taking a pleasant 10 -15 minute walk along the beach and promenade. The resort is sure to impress visitors with spacious surroundings, beautiful décor and excellent services. The modern and beautifully designed rooms, some of which have direct access to the sparkling outside pool, guests can benefit from a good range of facilities and entertainment amenities in spacious surroundings. Patrons may enjoy delicious dishes at the hotel restaurant, which might be followed by a drink from the bar. Those who seek relaxation may balance body and soul at the on-site spa.FarePortal

name: Cevahir Hotel Istanbul Asia
address: Yali Mahallesi, Ziya Gökalp Caddesi, No. 21, Istanbul 34840
description: Located in the coast of Dragos district, Cevahir Hotel Istanbul Asia offers modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. The hotel has an outdoor pool, indoor pool, a Turkish bath and a fitness centre. Featuring a contemporary décor, all rooms include a flat-screen TV, safe box and an electric kettle with complimentary tea and coffee. The modern bathrooms come with a shower or a bath tub. Some rooms also offer views of Marmara Sea and Princes' Islands. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at Cevahir Hotel. The restaurants including Antigoni Rotisserie, Pita Brasserie and Winter Garden serve selected dishes from Turkish and international cuisines. Every Friday, live music will take place at the on-site restaurant Pita Brasserie. The 24-hour reception provides room service and concierge services. Laundry and dry cleaning can be offered upon request at an additional charge. Bostanci Ferry Port is 5 km from the hotel, offering easy access to the European side of the city. Sabiha Gokcen Airport is 20 km away. Istanbul Airport is 74 km away. Free private parking is also available on site.

name: Sura Hagia Sophia Hotel
address: Divanyolu Cd. Alemdar Mh. Ticarethane Sk. No:10 Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34122
description: Centrally located in Sultanahmet, Sura Hagia Sophia Hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Sultanahmet Tram Stop. Boasting traditional Ottoman-style architecture, the hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and a peaceful botanic garden offering various flower species. Complimentary 5 o'clock tea is offered daily. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Featuring soundproofing for a calm and quiet atmosphere, all rooms of Sura Hagia Sophia Hotel have air conditioning, an LCD TV with satellite channels, a minibar fully stocked with soft drinks, an espresso machine, and an electric kettle. Each has a private bathroom including a hairdryer, free toiletries, and slippers. Some rooms offer city views whereas others overlook Hagia Sophia. Daily rich buffet breakfast is served with a wide range of local specialties. You can enjoy the variety of selective dishes of Ottoman cuisine at elegantly decorated Deraliye Restaurant. Traditional kebabs are also served at Galeyan Restaurant, where all organic vegetables and meat are provided from the hotel's own farm. After a busy day in the city, you can sip your coffee and relax at the lounge in the spacious garden offering a peaceful ambiance or at Khaldi Café. After a busy day in the city, you can treat yourself at the hotel's pampering spa facilities offering a Turkish bath, sauna, and massage sessions upon request. Selective beauty and wellness treatments are offered. There is a fully-equipped fitness center at the property. A tour desk, ticket service, and luggage storage are also available. Multilingual concierge service is offered for your daily needs.

name: Gönlüferah City Hotel
address: Cekirge 1.Murat Cd. No:20, Bursa 16070
description: With a panoramic view over Bursa, Gonluferah City Hotel offers complimentary private parking and rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features an á la carte restaurant and 24-hour front desk. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning and satellite TV. Each has a minibar and seating area with a coffee table. Every room is elegantly decorated and has a carpeted floor. Gonluferah Hotel offers an on-site restaurant serving Turkish and international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Guests can relax in the lobby bar with a drink or snack. The hotel includes a games room with billiards, darts and table tennis. There is also a sauna for further relaxation. Gonluferah City Hotel is situated 40 km from Uludağda and less than 82 km from Sabiha Gokcen airport.

name: Grand Atakum Hotel
address: Yeni Mh. Ataturk Blv No 183 Atakum, Samsun
description: Situated 200 metres from the coast, this hotel offers air-conditioned guestrooms with balconies and views of the Black Sea and Mount Güngörmez. It has a restaurant that serves international cuisine. Rooms at the Grand Atakum Hotel have parquet floors and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area and Baroque décor. In the morning, the Grand serves a buffet breakfast with fresh fruit and pastries. Atakum Hotel also has a café that offers pizza and regional dishes. The Grand Atakum Hotel is located 12 km from the centre of Samsun and is 35 km from the Samsun-Çarşamba Airport. It has an airport transfer service for guests with disabilities available on request and offers free on-site private parking.

name: Tugcan Hotel
address: Ataturk Bulvari No:89, Gaziantep 27010
description: Come and explore the cultural town Gaziantep from its very heart and stay at the modern Tugcan Hotel, where sophisticated style complements its historic surroundings. Escape your day-to-day life and trade it temporarily for the 5-star luxury of this hotel. Contemporary style and a warm interior characterise this residence and you can enjoy a wide range of facilities here. Savour a drink at the stylish, inviting bar, work up a sweat at the gym or simply indulge in the comfort of your glamorous room. Take advantage of the Business Centre and occupy one of our conference rooms to conduct business. Discover the historic and cultural city centre, which is right outside your door, and its surroundings. With 141 comfortable, elegant rooms and suites, this hotel offers first-class accommodation for various kinds of travellers.

name: Ece Saray Marina Resort
address: 1. Karagozler Mevkii, Fethiye 48300
description: This seafront boutique hotel offers elegant rooms with balconies and sweeping views of Fethiye Bay and Fethiye Marina. The breakfast is served on the topfloor terrace overlooking the Mediterranean. Fine European cuisine with a touch of Turkish flavours is served at Levante Restaurant, along with exclusive wines. Ece Saray Marina Resort offers 6 bars, including a panoramic cigar bar, a patisserie offering ice creams and pastries, and a poolside bar. The large outdoor pool is equipped with water jets and a relaxing hot tub. Guests can relax on the sun loungers, surrounded by the scent of jasmines and pines from the garden. Children can play in Ece Saray Marina’s shallow pool or on the playground, while their parents enjoy a relaxing sauna, aromatherapy or shiatsu massages. For some activity, there is also a fitness centre. Dalaman Airport is about 45 km away, and Ece Saray offers free private parking on site.

name: Lukka Exclusive Hotel - Adult Only
address: Cukurbag Yarimadasi Oteller Bolgesi Bulent Kalkavan Sok. No. 16, Kaş 07580
description: With its own beach, this hotel is located on a rocky cliff in Kaş. Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, it features an outdoor pool and hot tub. All rooms have balconies. Each with a chic décor, the airy rooms at Lukka Hotel include flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. They come with beautifully tiled bathrooms and views of either the sea or flower garden. Guests can swim in the Olympic-sized pool or enjoy snorkelling in the sea. Lukka’s 24-hour tour desk can help arrange rafting and canoe tours, paragliding or safaris. The hotel is an 8-minute drive from the centre of Kaş. Free parking is possible on site.

name: Ayapam Hotel
address: Kale Mahallesi Bahce Sokak No:2/1, Pamukkale 20280
description: This hotel in Pamukkale is a short walk from Hieropolis ruins. It has a terrace restaurant with panoramic views, a Turkish hammam and an outdoor pool. Free parking is available. The bright rooms at the Ayapam Hotel enjoy a modern interior. They have a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a spa bath. The Ayapam’s restaurant serves authentic local cuisine prepared with seasonal ingredients. There is also a bar serving refreshing drinks and exotic cocktails. Guests can relax in the sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

name: Jura Hotels Afyon Thermal
address: Hurriyet Mahallesi Ataturk Bulvari No:16/1 Erkmen, Afyonkarahisar, Afyon 03211
description: Combining a luxurious setting with state-of-the-art spa facilities, this stunning hotel offers a relaxing retreat just 8 km from Afyon’s centre. It boasts thermal pools, separated for men and woman, a seasonal outdoor pool and a 4000 m² spa area which includes a variety of massages. The indoor spaces of Jura Hotels Afyon Thermal are decorated in neutral tones to create a calming environment. Air-conditioned rooms include a satellite LCD TV, minibar, laptop-size safety box, desk. Bathrooms come with a hairdryer. With its elegant décor, Jura Hotels Afyon Thermal Restaurant provides a great atmosphere for breakfasts and dinners. There is also an à la carte restaurant for the guests to enjoy various delicacies. The two on-site bars offers wide range of refreshments and the vitamin bar at the spa area will help you feel healthier than ever. Improve your well-being at Jura Hotels Afyon Thermal's Thermal Spa. Relax in the luxurious hammam, sauna and hot tub and rejuvenate at the fully equipped fitness centre. There are also 5 meeting and banquet facilities on site for your organisations. Kutahya Zafer Airport is 54 km away while Afyon Bus Terminal is locatd 9 km from Jura Hotels Afyon Thermal Cakmak.

name: Belcekiz Beach Club
address: Oludeniz Mah. 227 Sok. No:2A, Ölüdeniz 48340
description: This beachfront hotel enjoys a garden setting on the Turkish Riviera. Just 14 km from Fethiye, it offers spacious 5-star accommodation with pool, mountain and garden views. Private balconies and parquet floors are featured in all air-conditioned rooms at Belcekiz Beach Hotel. Each is equipped with a flat-screen TV, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can enjoy playing tennis, exercise in the gym or play a game of darts in the bar. The hammam offers a welcoming treat after a busy day, just as the refreshing outdoor pools and the sea. The Belcekiz Beach has a buffet-style main restaurant and 3 à la carte restaurants serving Italian, Indian and Thai cuisine. The hotel boasts 5 bars and its own nightclub with regular DJ nights. Belcekiz Beach Hotel offers free parking and a 24-hour reception that can help guests arrange car rentals.

name: Anemon Eskisehir Hotel
address: Camlica Mah.Mustafa Pasa Sok.Tepebasi, 61, Eskişehir 26190
description: Situated in Eskisehir, this hotel features free Wi-Fi, an outdoor and indoor pool, a gym and a spa. The air-conditioned rooms are elegantly furnished and come with satellite TV. Some of Anemon Eskisehir Hotel’s luxurious rooms offer a private hot tub and a seating area. Aia Spa & Wellness Centre at Anemon Eskisehir Hotel offers Far Eastern massage treatments, a sauna and a Turkish bath. Guests can enjoy a fine dining or à la carte menu in Anemon Hotel's restaurant. Drinks and refreshments are served in the hotel’s modern bar. Anadolu Airport is a 10-minute drive from Anemon Eskisehir Hotel. Free parking is possible on site.

name: Grand Atakum Boutique Hotel
address: Mahmutlu, Sapak 1. Sokak 127 /1, Samsun 55850
description: Situated in Mahmutlu, 28 km from Agustos Park, Grand Atakum Boutıque Hotel features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a kids' club and a shared kitchen. The accommodation provides room service, an ATM and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms have a shared bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Grand Atakum Boutıque Hotel rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving African, American and Argentinian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Grand Atakum Boutıque Hotel offers a barbecue. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mahmutlu, like hiking, horse riding and cycling. Grand Atakum Boutıque Hotel provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Speaking Arabic, Azerbaijani, Belarusian and Bosnian at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Denizkizi Park is 28 km from the accommodation, while Gazi Museum is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samsun Çarşamba, 52 km from Grand Atakum Boutıque Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Imren Han Hotel - Special Category
address: Yeni Mecidiye Mah. 1039 Sok. No:26, Alacati 35950
description: Featuring unique architecture with its stone built structure, this hotel is only 3 km from the sandy Ilica Beach. Imren Han Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and an outdoor pool in the green garden. The classically decorated rooms of Imren feature stone walls and wooden floors. They all have a minibar, LCD TV and a private balcony with views. Free Wi-Fi is also included. A Turkish village breakfast with fresh organic products is served every morning. Guests can also enjoy a cup of Turkish tea and a piece of cake at the terrace with olive trees all around. The lively Alacati town centre is 50 metres from the hotel with authentic shops, restaurants and bars. Free private parking is also available on site. Izmir Adnan Menderes is a 1-hour drive away and shuttle service can be arranged upon request.

name: Aydinbey Famous Resort
address: Bogazkent Mah. 33.Sokak, No.51 Bogazkent, Serik, Antalya, Belek 07300
description: Featuring a private blue flag beach, Aydinbey Famous Resort has a seafront location on the Mediterranean coast. The property includes 2 outdoor pools, an indoor pool, water slides, and spa facilities. The bright rooms of Aydinbey are tastefully decorated in warm colours. They all include a TV, air conditioning and a minibar. All rooms have a balcony with sea, pool or garden views. With indoor and outdoor dining options, Famous Restaurant offers breakfast, lunch and dinner in buffet style. You can enjoy selected dishes of Turkish and international cuisine. The à la carte restaurants offer Turkish and Far East cuisine, and seafood. There are also 5 bars serving a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Sports facilities include a tennis court, fitness centre and beach volleyball on site. For relaxation, you can enjoy the sauna and Turkish bath. Antalya city centre is 50 km from the property. Antalya Airport is 42 km away.

name: Mercure Trabzon Hotel
address: Yalincak Mah Devlet Sahil Yolu, Trabzon
description: Mercure Hotel Trabzon located in Yomra Kasustu on the main road of the Black Sea and International Airport is less than 2 miles (4 km) and 500 mt to the Cevahir Shopping center. 213 overlooking the spectacular Black Sea view 29 m2 deluxe rooms including 32 elegantly decorated 50-75 m2 suites. A trendy atmosphere in its own special designed Lobby Lounge, M'Cuisine Restaurant & Teras, decorated with the stylish furniture, cultural touches at the same time modern and new concept rooms.accorhotels.com

name: Clarion Hotel Istanbul Mahmutbey
address: Mahmutbey Mah Peyami Safa Cad No 44, Istanbul 34218
description: The Clarion Hotel Istanbul Mahmutbey in Istanbul, TU near the Mall of Istanbul provides the meeting space and social atmosphere that makes it the perfect place to meet up in person. Our Istanbul hotel offers convenient access to a number of other attractions, including Moi Park, Moi Shane, Tuyap Fair Convention Center, World Trade Center Istanbul and Grand Bazaar. Invite your friends, family and colleagues to your next event in one of our 8 conference rooms, which include the latest technology, a ballroom and 7 meeting halls and can accommodate up to 450 people for banquets and 600 for conferences. After your event, dine at our Safran restaurant and enjoy its impressive ambience, as well as a variety of delicious cuisine, including Turkish, Italian, Mexican and French. Our MAR.TEA.NI Lounge is the perfect place to relax with a drink and toast to the good times afterward. Our hotel in Istanbul offers amenities like free WiFi, an indoor heated pool, a business center and a fitness center. Room amenities include 40-inch TVs, hair dryers, desks and air conditioning. Get together at the Clarion Hotel Istanbul Mahmutbey. Istanbul hotels like ours help you make the most of your time with the people you travel for-book now.Choice Hotels

name: Zeytin Arasi Apart Otel
address: Kucukkoy Mah., Tuzla Mevkii 25, Ayvalik 10410
description: With mountain views, Zeytin Arası Apart Otel is set in Ayvalık and has a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, bar, garden, sun terrace and picnic area. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the aparthotel free of charge. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and slippers. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a fridge. An Asian breakfast is available every morning at Zeytin Arası Apart Otel. In addition to a seasonal outdoor pool, the accommodation also offers a kids pool. The nearest airport is Balikesir Koca Seyit Airport, 43 km from Zeytin Arası Apart Otel.

name: Hawaii Hotel
address: 228. Sk. 3, Marmaris 48700
description: In a prime location, just 15m from Marmaris's beachfront and 1.2km from the resort centre, this friendly hotel was fully refurbished in 2006 and has 96 rooms over 6 floors. The lobby contains lifts, a currency exchange desk and a 24-hour reception. There is also a TV room, a café, meeting room, a bar and a restaurant. Laundry services as well as medical assistance are also on offer (extra charge). Additionally, there is a children's playground, outdoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath, as well as a spa offering treatments.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Hilton Bursa Convention Center & Spa
address: Istanbul Caddesi No:347, Bursa 16210
description: Located close to Bursa city center, historical heritage sites, the business district, and several commercial and industrial parks, the visual striking Hilton Bursa Convention Center & Spa offers splendid views of the majestic Uludag Mountains and is a only short distance from the Intercity Highway, linking the major cities of Ankara, Istanbul and Izmir. Each of the stylish rooms at this contemporary hotel in Bursa are tastefully decorated using a combination of elements from the Ottoman Empire era and contemporary amenities, and feature inspiring views of the Uludag Mountain range. The Hilton Bursa Convention Centre & Spa has extensive banquet and meeting rooms all of which benefit from wireless internet access and the very latest in audio/visual and lighting technology. Hold a grand event in the pillarless, naturally lit 870 sq m ballroom or hold a memorable wedding ceremony or social event in our beautiful outdoor venue. Food lovers at this Bursa hotel will be spoiled for choice. Begin your day with breakfast in the warm and welcoming Brasserie Restaurant, with an all-day dining concept serving delicious and healthy Mediterranean dishes from Turkiye and beyond. Enjoy a pre-dinner cocktail in the stylish Sky Light Bar and marvel at views of Bursa from the Sky Light Restaurant as you enjoy specialities from the tempting international a la carte menu. Keep fit in the complimentary 24-hour Fitness Centre, soak up stunning views of the snowcapped peaks as you swim in the heated indoor swimming pool, or simply indulge yourself with a treatment in our luxury onsite spa with Turkish Hammam. Take a stroll through one of Bursa’s numerous parks and gardens, admire Ottoman Era art in the city's mosques, marvel at Bronze Age artifacts in the archeological museum, or ski at the Uludag Mountains - once known by their ancient name of Mount Olympus - just 45 minutes from the hotel.Hilton

name: Hitit Hotel
address: Sarapci Kuyu Mevkii P.K66 Selcuk-Efes 1, Kusadasi 35920
description: Located in the historical district of Selcuk, Ephesus Hitit Hotel restaurant offers easy access to many local attractions of the city. The hotel has an outdoor pool, air-conditioned rooms and 2 restaurants serving unique delicacies of traditional Turkish cuisine. Free WiFi is accessible throughout the premises. The comfortable rooms have balconies with Seljuk Castle and a soothing mandarin garden views. Each is tastefully furnished in colour schemes and equipped with a TV. They all feature carpeted floors and a private balcony. Guests can choose among various Turkish cuisine and food is prepared from fresh local ingredients. Hadrian Restaurant offers views of the surrounding area. Around-the-clock front desk service is available. Temple of Artemis, one of the seven wonders of the ancient world, is only 2 km from Hotel Hitit. Efes Museum and the Church of Saint Jean are within 1.5 km. Hotel provides free shuttle service from the Seljuk Bus Station on demand, depending on the number of travellers.

name: Yacht Classic Hotel - Boutique Class
address: 1 Karagozler No:24, Fethiye 48300
description: Located in the heart of Fethiye, this boutique seafront hotel offers a swimming pool, a sauna, a Turkish bath and free private parking. Most rooms have spacious balconies, some with sea views. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Rooms at the Yacht Classic Hotel have modern décor and include TV with satellite channels. Guests can enjoy local and Mediterranean cuisine at Mori Restaurant or taste delicious Turkish wine selection at the Skyfall Bar. The hotel also has a Blue Pool bar, which serves a wide range of cocktails. Paragliding is very popular in this area. Babadag where you can do paragliding is 50-minute drive from Yacht Classic Hotel. Famous Butterfly Valley is just 21 km from the Yacht Classic while Lycian Way Trail is 17 km away. The property is 1 km from Fethiye city centre and 3.5 km from Calis Beach. Oludeniz Beach is a 20-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Dalaman Airport, 49 km from Yacht Classic Hotel.

name: Emre Beach & Emre Hotel
address: Cumhuriyet Blv. 60, Marmaris 48700
description: Located right on the shores of the Mediterranean, this hotel features a private beach area, 2 outdoor pools and an indoor pool. There is a spa and wellness centre and WiFi is offered throughout the building. All the air-conditioned rooms at Emre Beach & Emre Hotel include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, desk and a balcony. Bathroom comes with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel’s restaurant serves authentic Turkish cuisine dishes in buffet and à la carte menu alternatives. Pool bar, restaurant bar and terrace bar are all at the service of the guests. You can work out in the fitness centre and relax in the Turkish bath, spa bath or sauna. Water sports facilities are also offered at Emre Beach & Emre Hotel. Dalaman Airport is 100 km from the site. Marmaris town centre is less than a 5-minute drive away.

name: Anemon Ordu Hotel
address: Tasbasi Mah Atarurk Bulvari No -5, Ordu 52100
description: Anemon Ordu Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Ordu. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. All the necessary facilities, including 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, are at hand. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, slippers, air conditioning, wake-up service. Access to the hotel's fitness center, outdoor pool, fishing, garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. Convenience and comfort makes Anemon Ordu Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Ordu.Agoda

name: Arinnanda Hotel Cesme
address: 3431 Sok. No. 1 Boyalik Mevkii, Cesme 35930
description: Situated 250 metres from the coast, this hotel is only a 10-minute walk from Boyalik Beach. Arinnanda features an outdoor pool with sun loungers, sea view and a green garden. Free Wi-Fi is accessible in all areas. All rooms at Arinnanda Hotel Cesme have air conditioning, satellite TV, minibar, balcony and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. There are exclusive rooms with private terrace and garden. The hotel’s à la carte restaurant serves all day long. Breakfast is offered in buffet style. Alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks can be ordered from the bar. Ilica Beach is 4 km and Alacati town centre is 5 km from Arinnanda Hotel Cesme. Izmir Adnan Menderes Airport is 87 km away.

name: Ciragan Palace Kempinski
address: Ciragan Caddesi 32, Istanbul 34349
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Istanbul, Çırağan Palace Kempinski Istanbul offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. With a fitness centre, the property also features a garden, as well as a terrace. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean and Turkish dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. All rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have sea views. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. Around-the-clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Arabic, German, English and French. Dolmabahce Palace is 1.6 km from the hotel, while Dolmabahce Clock Tower is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 37 km from Çırağan Palace Kempinski Istanbul, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Crowne Plaza Bursa
address: Odunluk Mh. Akpinar Cd., No:17, Bursa 16110
description: Located new city center Nilufer in Bursa, Crowne Plaza Bursa Convention Center & Thermal Spa, surrounded by the biggest shopping malls in the city (Carrefour &Suryapı Marka AVM) behind the hotel and a Gastro Dining Venue Mall (Parkora) next to hotel, by walking distance. The World Luxury Hotel(2014) awarded rooms are elegantly-comfortably decorated; provide services to its guests at Bursa’s largest standard room sizes (37 m2) with a satellite TV, air conditioning, tea/coffee making facilities, iron, free Wi-Fi and pillow menu.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus
address: Ciragan Cad. No. 28, Istanbul 34349
description: Situated along the Bosphorus, this renovated 19th century Ottoman palace features a historic architecture in harmony with luxurious details. An indoor pool and a heated outdoor pool with free parasols and sun loungers are available. The seafront property also has a garden and a spacious terrace with panoramic views of the Bosphorus. Free WiFi and private parking are available on site. Tastefully decorated with fine furnishings, each air-conditioned room offers an iPod docking station and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A minibar, safety deposit box and a desk are also provided. Aqua Restaurant, with its terrace overlooking the Bosphorus, serves Mediterranean cuisine, with Italian and Turkish specialties. Guests can enjoy the breakfast with international flavours in buffet style. Pool grill is an ideal choice for fresh salads, crispy grilled kebabs and tender fresh fish. The Lobby Bar and Lounge is a cozy place for socialization. You can work out in the fitness centre and then relax in the sauna. Guests of this luxurious hotel can also benefit from the exotic atmosphere of the Turkish bath afterwards. Spa therapy and body treatments are also possible. The reception is at your service 7/24, and provides room service. Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus is only a 4-minute walk from one of Istanbul’s lively scenes, Besiktas Square. Ataturk Airport is 25 km from the property while Istanbul Airport is 50 km away.

name: Transatlantik Hotel & Spa
address: Goynuk Mah G. Mustafa Kemal Ataturk Cd., Göynük 07994
description: Designed to resemble a ship, this 5-star resort in Kemer enjoys a long stretch of sandy beach and an amazing pool scene with an aquapark. Personalised spa treatments include exotic massages. Rooms at Transatlantik Hotel & Spa have a light, neutral décor. Each features a spacious seating area with a satellite LCD TV. In addition to water sports you can play tennis and squash, go bowling or even ice skating. The fitness centre provides a state-of-the-art equipment along with a sauna, jacuzzi and Turkish bath. Annual events in the area include Phaselis Art Festival, Turkey Offshore Championship and Kemer Carnival. Special theme nights and entertainment shows are also held at the Queen Elizabeth Elite Hotel. Children can enjoy fun-filled days at the on-site kids club.

name: Lova Hotel Spa
address: Samanli Termal Yolu Cad. No:3, Yalova 77100
description: Located 3 km from city centre, 5 km from IDO Ferry Port. Lova Hotel SPA offers modern rooms with free WiFi. The hotel includes a spa centre for women and a mixed spa centre. Facilities include massage rooms, indoor pools, steam rooms, sauna and a Turkish bath. An outdoor pool and a gym are also available. Nearest beach is located 500 metres away while guests can find shopping centres 700 metres from the property. Featuring carpeted floors, the rooms of Lova Hotel include a LED TV, air conditioning, minibar and an electric kettle. Each room has a balcony with views of the pool or the surrounding nature. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at the hotel. The restaurant offers an à la carte menu for lunch and dinner. You can also enjoy drinks from the cafe located in the lobby area. Cinarcik is 10 km away, while Istanbul is 57 km from the property. Yenikapi-Yalova Ferry Port is 4.5 km away. Free private parking is available on site. Bursa Yenisehir Airport is 65 km away and Sabiha Gokcen Airport is 62 km away via Osmangazi Bridge.

name: Villa Dolunay Apart Hotel
address: Dalyan Mah. Gülpinar Cad. 336 Sok. No 14, Dalaman
description: Our hotel is one of the most beautiful towns of Mugla, Dalyan, surrounded by four sides is in the town green and historic artifacts. We mean to stay to live together with nature, peace means. As the name suggests, represents the Dolunay Apart Hotel and breaks the peace of mind. The world's most clean and beautiful beach located in Dalyan. This beach is known as a beach entry with the famous Caretta Caretta turtles. Pool or mountain view rooms has a capacity of x and above. All rooms have balconies and air conditioning are standard. 5 minutes distance from Dalyan town center  VRBO

name: Bayir Diamond Hotel & Convention Center Konya
address: Musalla Baglari Mah., Nalcaci Cad. No 100 Selcuklu, Konya
description: Boasting a swimming pool and a spa centre with sauna and hammam, Bayır Diamond Hotel & Convention Center also offers a hot tub to relax in after a busy day. Sportive guests can also stay in shape at the on-site fitness centre. Private parking is available at the property while WiFi is accessible throughout. Air conditioned, all rooms at Bayır Diamond offers flat-screen TV with satellite channels, iPod dock, DVD player and city views. Certain rooms and suites have a dining area and ironing facilities. Private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. Spa bath is also featured in some units. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast area every morning. There is also an à la carte restaurant, serving a variety of dishes. 24-hour front desk is offered while guests can also take advantage of airport transfer service at a surcharge. Business centre is featured to keep up with your work during your stay. Alaaddin Hill is 2.8 km from the property.

name: Balikcilar Hotel
address: Mevlana Karsısı No:2 Karatay, Konya 42020
description: Located opposite the Mevlâna Tomb in Konya, Balıkcılar Otel offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private balcony. It features a spa area with hammam, massage rooms and a gym. The air-conditioned rooms of Otel Balıkcılar are decorated with wooden furniture and warm, natural colours. All rooms have a minibar, satellite TV, and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a seating area. Balıkcılar Otel’s restaurant offers authentic Turkish cuisine. Guests can enjoy panoramic views of the city, while having a drink at the rooftop bar. A breakfast buffet is served daily. The reception of Balıkcılar Otel is open 24/7. The hotel also offers a TV corner, a games room with billiards tables, and a gift shop. Balıkcılar Otel is a 13-minute walk from the Tombstone Museum and Archaeological Museum. Konya Airport is 12 km from the hotel, and the nearest bus station is 8 km away.

name: Tasigo Eskisehir
address: Dede mah Haktanir sok No 1, Eskişehir
description: Tasigo Eskisehir, which is located walking distance to historical Odunpazarı Houses and some important museums, has a unique location with the panoramic view of the city. Free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk are available in this environmentally friendly green and thermal hotel. Air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, telephone, safe box and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Views of the city and the garden can be enjoyed from the rooms. Hotel's restaurants serve a selection of dishes, from Turkish and world cuisine with special presentations. There are 3 bars in the hotel, which serves a variety of beverages and refreshments. Tasigo Eskisehir features indoor and outdoor pools, spa&wellness facilities, and a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy all the benefits of natural and curative thermal water. In Tasigo Eskisehir's Spa, located on 2500 m² area, hotel offers thermal pools, thermal hot tubs, Turkish baths, Finnish steam baths, saunas and a shock pool. The hotel has 7 halls in total for conferences, seminars, workshops, launches, business meetings or private organizations. Historic Odunpazarı Houses are located 300 metres away. Eskisehir Train Station is 3 km from the property. Eskisehir Airport is 7.5 km away.

name: Bn Hotel Thermal & Wellness
address: Igdir Mahallesi, Igdir Sokak, No.585A, Mersin (Icel) 33115
description: Situated in Mersin, 15 km from Mersin Bus Station, BN Hotel Thermal & Wellness features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a terrace and a bar. The hotel has an indoor pool, sauna, karaoke and a kids' club. At the hotel rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a mountain view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. The rooms have a safety deposit box. At BN Hotel Thermal & Wellness you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Pizza cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. The spa and wellness centre at the accommodation features a hammam and a hot spring bath. You can play table tennis, darts and tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. BN Hotel Thermal & Wellness provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Staff at the hotel are always available to provide advice at the reception. Mersin Train Station is 18 km from BN Hotel Thermal & Wellness, while Mersin Congress Center is 18 km from the property. The nearest airport is Adana, 87 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Side Star Elegance
address: Kumkoy Mevkii, Side
description: Located nearby the beachfront, Side Star Elegance Hotel - Ultra All Inclusive has spa facilities and outdoor pools. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and balcony. The rooms at Side Star Elegance Hotel - Ultra All Inclusive come with modern furnishings. They all feature a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. The minibar is filled with sof drinks and beer everyday. You can taste local and international dishes at the buffet restaurant. There are also 4 à la carte restaurants: Italian, Turkish, Chinese and seafood. By making a reservation, guest can enjoy a complimentary meal at the à la carte restaurants once. The bars serve refreshing drinks. Spa facilities include a Turkish bath, sauna and a fitness room; massage services can also be provided. There is also a children’s playground. Only 1.8 km to Side town centre, Side Star Elegance Hotel - Ultra All Inclusive is 63 km from Antalya Airport. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Sunsan Hotel
address: Hasan Mevsuf Caddesi 31, Çanakkale 17100
description: Sunsan Hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Canakkale. Providing a bar, the property is located within 8.2 km of Canakkale Archaeological Museum. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a balcony with a sea view. Each room is fitted with air conditioning and a TV, and certain rooms at Sunsan Hotel have pool view. A continental, Italian or American breakfast is available daily at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and gluten-free options can also be requested. Mart Stadium is 10 km from Sunsan Hotel, while Canakkale Clock Tower is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Canakkale Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Reis Thermal Otel
address: Karahayit Mah. 151 Sok 1 A, Pamukkale 20800
description: Set around an extensive outdoor pool, Reis is a modern hotel situated 5 km from the travertine terraces of Pamukkale. It features an indoor thermal pool, free Wi-Fi access and free private parking. Air-conditioned rooms and apartments at Reis Thermal Otel open out onto balconies and come with a seating area. Each room includes en suite bathrooms with a mini thermal pool. Guests can enjoy traditional Anatolian specialities at the restaurant of the hotel and sip local spirits. Outdoor dining is possible thanks to on site barbecue facilities. Popular nearby attractions include the remains of Laodicea ad Lycum and the necropolis of Hierapolis, a notorious UNESCO World Heritage Site, situated a 10-minute drive from the hotel Reis.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul Esentepe
address: Esentepe Mahallesi Buyukdere Caddesi No. 117 Sisli, Istanbul
description: Stay in style at DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul Esentepe. Our modern hotel boasts an excellent location, just minutes from Istanbul city center. Next to the metro station, we’re within easy reach of the Taksim Square, Grand Bazaar, Bosphorus Coast, Zorlu Performing Arts Center and Cevahir Shopping Mall. Unwind in a stylish guest room, featuring elegant décor and complimentary WiFi, or upgrade to a spacious suite for a separate living area, second bathroom and balcony. When you get hungry, delight your senses with an international a la carte menu and warm ambience at our Zeytinyali restaurant, or dine in-room with Room Service. Rejuvenate at our health club, complete with steam room and sauna. Take a refreshing dip in the indoor swimming pool, unwind at our traditional Turkish bath or enjoy a workout at the modern fitness center. If you’re here on business, stay productive at our Business Center, with computers and printing services, or host a meeting with us. Our six meeting rooms offer the latest technology and A/V equipment, while our largest event space can accommodate up to 320, perfect for conferences and special occasions. We offer 24-hour concierge service, underground car parking and a valet service, free of charge.Hilton

name: Antmare Hotel
address: Alacati Mah. 18000, Sok. No. 28, Alacati 35937
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 35 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and facials. You can soak up the sun at the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and an indoor pool. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Property Location With a stay at Antmare Hotel in Cesme, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Ilica Beach and Alacati Marina. This beach hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Alaçatı Çarşı and 6.3 mi (10.1 km) from Boyalık Beach. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:30 AM to 11 AM. name: Hampton by Hilton Gaziantep
address: Incilipinar Mahallesi,Muammer Aksoy, Gaziantep 27090
description: Welcome to Hampton by Hilton Gaziantep, ideally located in the centre of Gaziantep, within easy reach of the airport, historical site, museums and major business centers. It is situated at 12.4 miles (20 km) from Gaziantep Airport, 0.6 miles (1 km) from Gaziantep train station and 1.9 miles (3 km) from the famous Gaziantep Citadel. Discover handicrafts, clothing and spices in the lively markets south of the Citadel and savor traditional baklava as you sip an aromatic Turkish coffee. Guests can enjoy fantastic connectivity to the airport via the bus terminal, situated just behind the hotel. Take in wonderful city views from your inviting guest room at this hotel in Gazientep. Stay connected with free WiFi, work in comfort at the ergonomic desk, refresh in the invigorating power shower and get a great night’s sleep in the comfy bed. There is a hot breakfast included when you stay at this welcoming Gaziantep hotel. The relaxed Hub lounge area is the perfect place to enjoy a coffee, light meal or drink at any time of the day or night. Buy snacks and any travel essentials you might have forgotten in our 24-hour convenience store. Work out with the latest exercise equipment in the free, 24-hour fitness room. Print and fax documents in the work zone, and plan a meeting or training seminar for up to 20 people in the conference room.Hilton

name: S3 Seahorse Beach Club & Hotel
address: Ölüdeniz Mah. Belcegiz Mevkii No. 69, Ölüdeniz 48300
description: Offering a restaurant, Seahorse Beach Club is located in Oludeniz. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. There is also an electric kettle. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and slippers. Extras include a safety deposit box and bed linen. At Seahorse Beach Club you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk. The property offers free parking. The bed and breakfast is just a few steps from Oludeniz Nature Reserve and Beach, 600 metres from Belcekiz Beach and 2.6 km from Lycian Way Trail. Dalaman Airport is 60 km away.

name: Side Star Beach
address: Selimiye Mah P K 99, Side 07330
description: Facing a blue-flagged beach on the Mediterranean Sea, this comprehensive hotel is situated a 10-minute walk from Side Archaeological Site. Facilities include 2 pools, an extensive spa and water-sport equipment. Stylish rooms at Side Star Beach open out onto private balconies, some overlooking the sea or the pool area. They all include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and are fitted with wooden floors. Guests can work-out in the well-equipped gym or benefit from holistic treatments at the spa, featuring massages and a traditional Turkish hammam. An on-site bike rental helps exploring the hotel’s surroundings. Specialities from the Antalya Province and a varied menu of international classic dishes are offered at the restaurant. Outdoor dining is made possible on the large terrace by the pool or at the panoramic bar. Free private parking is available.

name: Spa Hotel Colossae Thermal
address: Karahayit 1, Pamukkale
description: Featuring thermal pools, an outdoor swimming pool and a spa centre, this eco-friendly hotel offers comfortable accommodation just 4 km from the ancient city of Hierapolis. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the hotel. There is also a heliport on site. The air-conditioned rooms of Spa Hotel Colossae Thermal are tastefully decorated with colourful beddings and carpets. They all feature balconies. Some rooms also offer a private sauna and a hot tub. At Colossae Thermal, guests can choose from a variety of dishes in the elegant restaurant. Unique tastes of Turkish cuisine are served as an open buffet with no or very few vegetarian options. Delicious drinks are available at the hotel’s bars. Guests can relax with a Turkish bath or get tanned at the solarium. A range of massages can also be enjoyed at the spa centre. Pamukkale is only 5 km from Spa Hotel Colossae Thermal with its famous travertines. Denizli Cardak Airport is 70 km away.

name: Montebello Deluxe Hotel
address: Belcekz Mah., Ölüdeniz 48000
description: Montebello Hotel is situated by Belcekız Beach in Oludeniz (Blue Lagoon), just 400 meters from the National Park of Oludeniz Lagoon & Beach. It features an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi in public areas. The air-conditioned rooms feature a balcony with a view of the pool area or the countryside surrounding Oludeniz. Each offers satellite TV and a minibar. Guests can enjoy regional meals in the restaurant or al fresco on the terrace. The bar offers refreshing beverages and snacks. The Montebello also has a 24-hour front desk and free parking on site. Dalaman Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Sanliurfa
address: Karakoyunlu Mah 11 Nisan Fuar Cad No:54, Sanliurfa 63100
description: Set in the historical city center of Sanliurfa in Turkiye, the contemporary, 4-star Hilton Garden Inn Sanliurfa hotel is just 15 minutes walk from a variety of historical attractions such as Balikli Gol, the Cave of Abraham and Sanliurfa Castle. The new Shopping centre ‘’Piazza’’ is just 2 minutes walking distance from the hotel. All of our elegant Guest Rooms and Suites feature Garden Sleep System® self adjusting beds, 37-inch LCD TVs and a refrigerator. Stay connected with complimentary internet access at the spacious working area with ergonomic Mirra® chair by Herman Miller and a phone line with voicemail. Hold a meeting at this modern Turkish hotel, where you can choose from 3 flexible meeting spaces or a grand ballroom for larger occasions, all of which feature complimentary wireless internet access. Start the day with a delicious breakfast in the Sumac Grill Restaurant, enjoy a cocktail in our stylish Bar and make use of our convenient Pavilion Pantry®, which offers a variety of snacks, beverages and essentials any time of the day and night. Keep fit while you travel in the complimentary 24-hour Fitness Center by Precor®, swim lengths in the indoor swimming pool or soothe tired muscles in the sauna.Hilton

name: Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori – Adults Only
address: Ciftlik Kargi Koyu, Dutdibi Mevkii 226 Sk. No:4/2, Fethiye 48300
description: Situated in Fethiye, 90 metres from Akmaz Beach, Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The hotel offers an indoor pool, sauna, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, bed linen and a balcony with a garden view. Rooms have a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a patio and some have city views. The rooms at Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only have air conditioning and a wardrobe. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only offers a hammam. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 5-star hotel, and car hire is available. Calis Beach is 1.9 km from the hotel, while Fethiye Marina is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dalaman, 45 km from Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lykiaworld & Linksgolf Antalya
address: Denizyaka Mh. 1 Denizyaka Kamisligol, Side 07600
description: Situated in Denizyaka, a few steps from Denizkent Beach, Lykia World Antalya features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The hotel has an indoor pool, sauna, karaoke and a kids' club. At the hotel, the rooms include a balcony. All rooms in Lykia World Antalya are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available each morning at the property. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 5-star hotel, and car hire is available. The property has an in-house hammam, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking German, English, Russian and Turkish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Aspendos Amphitheatre is 15 km from Lykia World Antalya, while The Land of Legends Theme Park is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 51 km from the hotel.

name: Coordinat Suits
address: 351. Sokak no 3, Izmir 35100
description: Coordinat Suits has city views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Izmir, 10 km from Izmir Clock Tower. Every unit features a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a TV and a fridge. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher. Guests at the apartment can enjoy a continental breakfast. The restaurant at Coordinat Suits serves Turkish cuisine. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of spa facilities, beauty services and a fitness room. Coordinat Suits provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. In addition to a seasonal outdoor pool, the apartment also provides a an indoor play area and shared lounge. Ataturk Museum is 7.1 km from Coordinat Suits, while Kadifekale is 7.3 km away. The nearest airport is Izmir Adnan Menderes, 27 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
